hharryu.name: 錘擊哈利
hharryu.original_desc: This was released in Japanese Arcade's in 1990, and for the NES on November 15th 1991 and sometime in 1992 in Europe.
hharryu.desc: 本作於 1990 年在日本 Arcade 發行，在 NES 上於 1991 年 11 月 15 日發行，並於 1992 年在歐洲發行。

aliensyn.name: 外星人綜合症
aliensyn.original_desc:
Alien Syndrome is a overhead-view run and gun game for one or two players in which a number of Mankind's space ships and bases have been overrun by an alien race, who have taken the human inhabitants hostage.

Players control two soldiers named Ricky and Mary and must fight their way through large eight-way scrolling levels to rescue their captured comrades. Once a set number of hostages have been rescued, an exit opens and players can pass through it to fight the end-of-level guardian. Once the guardian is defeated, play moves onto the next stage.

A time-bomb is automatically set at the start of each stage, which must then be completed before the bomb's timer runs down. Failure to finish the level in time results in the death of the player characters. Weapon upgrades and maps of the current level are available at certain points and are accessed via hatchways in the wall.

Alien Syndrome consists of 6 full stages plus a 7th final mini-stage, consisting solely of a fight to the death against the game's final, massive guardian.
aliensyn.desc:
《外星人綜合症》是一款適合一到兩名玩家的俯視視角跑槍遊戲，其中一些人類的太空飛船和基地已被外星人佔領，他們將人類居民劫持為人質。

玩家控制兩名名叫瑞奇和瑪麗的士兵，必須在大型八向滾動關卡中殺出一條血路，以營救被俘的戰友。一旦解救了一定數量的人質，出口就會打開，玩家可以通過它與末日守護者戰鬥。一旦守護者被擊敗，遊戲就會進入下一個階段。

每個階段開始時都會自動設置一個定時炸彈，必須在炸彈計時器耗盡之前完成該任務。未能及時完成關卡會導致玩家角色死亡。當前級別的武器升級和地圖可在某些點獲得，並可通過牆上的艙口訪問。

《異形綜合症》由 6 個完整階段和第 7 個最終迷你階段組成，其中僅包含與遊戲最後的大型守護者的殊死搏鬥。

aburner.name: 後燃燒器
aburner.original_desc:
After Burner is another 3-D Sega game rendered with their superb sprite-scaling technology; this time putting the player into the seat of a powerful jet fighter.

A number of colorful, fast-moving environments await the player, as he or she takes on the hordes of enemy planes intent on the player's destruction.
aburner.desc:
After Burner 是世嘉另一款採用其精湛的精靈縮放技術渲染的 3-D 遊戲；這次讓玩家坐在一架強大的噴氣式戰鬥機的座位上。

許多色彩繽紛、快速移動的環境等待著玩家，玩家將與成群結隊的敵機對戰，這些敵機一心要消滅玩家。

unsquad.name: 聯合國中隊
unsquad.original_desc: U.N. Squadron / Area 88 is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up and is based on the Manga series of the same name. The game features characters from the original Manga and their mission is to battle their way through enemy-packed levels to stop a terrorist group known as 'Project 4'.
unsquad.desc: 《聯合國中隊 / 88 區》是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，改編自同名漫畫系列。該遊戲以原版漫畫中的角色為特色，他們的任務是通過敵人密布的關卡，阻止名為“Project 4”的恐怖組織。

grdians.name: 守護者：電神魔界II
grdians.original_desc: A beat-'em-up developed by Winky Soft with 8 selectable characters and lots of special moves.
grdians.desc: 由 Winky Soft 開發的清版遊戲，有 8 個可選角色和大量特殊動作。

vsav2.original_name: Vampire Savior 2 : The Lord of Vampire
vsav2.name: 吸血鬼救世主2：吸血鬼之王
vsav2.original_desc: Fifteen characters fight to end the reign of Jedah, the Vampire Savior and save their own souls!
vsav2.desc: 十五個角色為結束吸血鬼救世主吉達的統治並拯救自己的靈魂而戰！

mk2.name: 真人快打11
mk2.original_desc:
Mortal Kombat II is a direct sequel to the 1992 original featuring new fighters (increasing the character roster from 7 to 12) and improved graphics. 

As with its predecessor, MKII's matches are divided into rounds, with victory awarded to the first player to win two rounds. At the point of defeat, the losing fighter will become dazed and the winner is given the opportunity to execute a 'finishing move'. 

Some of the standard fighting moves (moves shared by all characters) have now been expanded or enhanced. A crouching punch has been added and the 'roundhouse kick' is more powerful and now knocks opponents across the screen. Also, the difference in hit boxes between high and low kicks is now more marked. 

Additionally, returning characters gain new special moves and MKII marks the first appearence of multiple Fatalities - as well as additional, non-lethal finishing moves - in the series. In addition to the Fatalities of its predecessor, MKII offers 'Babalities' (turning a defeated opponent into a crying baby), 'Friendships' (a non-malicious interaction, such as dancing or giving a gift to the defeated opponent) and stage-specific Fatalities (the winner uppercutting their opponent into an abyss below, spikes above, or a pool of acid in the background). 

Each character still shares generic attributes - speed, power, jump height and airtime - albeit with differing hit boxes. The sequel drops the points system of its prequel in favour of a consecutive win tally.
mk2.desc:
《真人快打 II》是 1992 年原作的直接續作，其中包含新的戰士（將角色名單從 7 名增加到 12 名）和改進的圖像。

與前作一樣，MKII 的比賽分為幾輪，第一個贏得兩輪比賽的玩家將獲得勝利。失敗時，失敗的戰士會變得茫然，而勝利者有機會執行“終結技”。

一些標準的戰鬥動作（所有角色共享的動作）現在已經得到擴展或增強。增加了蹲姿拳，“迴旋踢”更加強大，現在可以將對手擊倒在屏幕之外。此外，高踢和低踢之間的擊球範圍差異現在更加明顯。

此外，回歸的角色獲得了新的特殊動作，MKII 標誌著多個死亡事件以及額外的非致命終結動作在該系列中的首次出現。除了前作的致命性之外，《MKII》還提供了“Babalities”（將被擊敗的對手變成哭泣的嬰兒）、“友誼”（非惡意互動，例如跳舞或向被擊敗的對手贈送禮物）和階段特定的致命性（獲勝者將對手打入下面的深淵、上面的尖刺或背景中的酸池）。

每個角色仍然共享通用屬性——速度、力量、跳躍高度和飛行時間——儘管命中框不同。續集放棄了前傳的積分系統，轉而採用連續獲勝的方式。

dinou.name: 凱迪拉克和恐龍
dinou.original_desc: The plot is based on the comic Cadillacs and Dinosaurs and takes place in the "City In The Sea" and its neighboring nearby jungle. The story starts 500 years from the 20th century, when an ensemble gang called the Black Marketeers begin hunting the dinosaurs to serve their unknown purpose. The continuous hunting process has made the dinosaurs violent and now they have started attacking villages and people. In order to get things sorted again, mechanic and shaman Jack Tenrec, diplomat and explorer by profession Hannah Dundee, friend and engineer Mustapha Cairo, and mysterious Mess O'Bradovich have decided to teamp up against the evil deeds of the Black Marketeer. The protagonists reach "the City in the Sea" where they suspect the whole hunting network being operating from.
dinou.desc: 該情節基於漫畫《凱迪拉克與恐龍》，發生在“海上之城”及其附近的叢林中。故事從 20 世紀 500 年前開始，當時一個名為“黑市商人”的團伙開始獵殺恐龍，以達到其未知的目的。持續的狩獵過程使恐龍變得暴力，現在它們開始攻擊村莊和人類。為了讓事情重新得到解決，機械師兼薩滿傑克·坦雷克、外交官兼探險家漢娜·鄧迪、朋友兼工程師穆斯塔法·開羅和神秘的梅斯·奧布拉多維奇決定聯手對抗黑市商人的邪惡行為。主角們到達了“海上之城”，他們懷疑整個狩獵網絡就是從那裡運作的。

pow.name: P.O.W.：戰俘
pow.original_desc:
Prisoners of War is a horizontally-scrolling run 'n' gun platform game for one or two players in which Special Forces soldiers escape from a POW camp and must fight their way through enemy territory to reach the extraction point and rescue. 

The escaping POWs fight primarily using hand-to-hand combat, but limited-use knives and sub-machine guns can be retrieved from fallen enemy soldiers. The game consists of three action buttons for punching, kicking and jumping. There are also three special attacks performed by pressing two buttons simultaneously: a jump kick (jump, then kick), a back punch (jump and punch simultaneously) and a headbutt (punch and kick simultaneously).

The controls change when wielding a weapon; the knife is thrown by pressing the punch button, but can preserved by using kicks. When wielding the machine gun, players can fire it by pressing the kick button, or can conserve its ammo by pressing the punch button to gun-whip enemies from close-range.
pow.desc:
《戰俘》是一款水平滾動的跑槍平台遊戲，適合一到兩名玩家，其中特種部隊士兵從戰俘營中逃脫，必須殺出一條血路穿過敵方領土才能到達撤離點並進行營救。

逃跑的戰俘主要通過肉搏戰進行戰鬥，但可以從倒下的敵方士兵身上找回有限用途的刀具和衝鋒槍。遊戲由拳、踢、跳三個動作按鈕組成。同時按下兩個按鈕還可以執行三種特殊攻擊：跳踢（跳躍，然後踢）、後拳（同時跳躍和拳擊）和頭撞（同時拳擊和踢）。

揮舞武器時控制會發生變化；通過按下拳擊按鈕可以扔出刀子，但可以通過踢來保存。揮舞機槍時，玩家可以通過按下踢鍵來發射機槍，也可以通過按下沖孔按鈕來節省彈藥，從近距離用槍鞭打敵人。

puzloopu.name: 拼圖循環
puzloopu.original_desc:
Puzz Loop is a puzzle game for one or two players in which different coloured marbles continually roll down a spiral path towards a central goal line.

Players control a rotating cannon situated at the center of the spiral and must stop the line of marbles from reaching the goal by shooting matching coloured marbles into the line. If three or more marbles of the same colour are matched, they will disappear.

In addition to standard marbles, bonus marbles occasionally appear that will, for example, temporarily slow down the rate the marbles' advance, or cause all marbles of a certain colour to be destroyed. Also, providing there is a clear line of sight, unwanted marbles can be fired straight out of the play area to prevent them from adding to the advancing line.

All marbles must be destroyed to complete a level. The game is over once the marbles are pushed over the goal threshold.
puzloopu.desc:
Puzz Loop 是一款適合一兩個玩家的益智遊戲，其中不同顏色的彈珠沿著螺旋路徑不斷滾向中心球門線。

玩家控制位於螺旋中心的旋轉大砲，必須通過向彈珠線發射匹配顏色的彈珠來阻止彈珠線到達目標。如果三個或更多相同顏色的彈珠相匹配，它們就會消失。

除了標準彈珠之外，偶爾也會出現獎勵彈珠，例如，它們會暫時減慢彈珠的前進速度，或者導致某種顏色的所有彈珠被摧毀。此外，如果視線清晰，不需要的彈珠可以直接從遊戲區域發射出去，以防止它們添加到前進的路線中。

必須摧毀所有彈珠才能完成關卡。一旦彈珠被推過球門門檻，遊戲就結束了。

chinagat.name: 中國門
chinagat.original_desc: China Gate is a 2D side-scrolling beat 'em-up game with platform elements for one or two players. The game offers a roster of three characters to choose from who have to recover a stolen book. These are the monkey man Gocoo, pig man Hakai and bird man Gojou. There are 3 buttons, one to jump, another to attack and another for power-ups. There is a limited time to defeat the numerous enemies that appear and jump through the platforms to harm the player. At the end of each level there is final boss. It is possible to obtain power-ups like beams that neutralize all the visible enemies of the screen.
chinagat.desc: China Gate 是一款 2D 橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，具有適合一到兩名玩家的平台元素。遊戲提供了三個角色的名單供您選擇，誰必須找回被盜的書。他們是猴人Gocoo、豬人Hakai和鳥人Gojou。有 3 個按鈕，一個用於跳躍，另一個用於攻擊，另一個用於強化。在有限的時間內擊敗出現的眾多敵人並跳過平台來傷害玩家。每個級別的最後都有最終的老闆。可以獲得像光束這樣的能量提升，可以消滅屏幕上所有可見的敵人。

ecofghtr.name: 生態戰士
ecofghtr.original_desc: Eco Fighters is a horizontal shooter, where the player controls a ship with a rotating gun. As suggested by both its titles, the game has an "eco-friendly" theme. It was also developed by the same team from two Mega Man arcade titles, The Power Battle and The Power Fighters.
ecofghtr.desc: Eco Fighters 是一款水平射擊遊戲，玩家用旋轉槍控制一艘船。正如兩個遊戲的標題所暗示的那樣，該遊戲有一個“環保”主題。它也是由兩個洛克人街機遊戲《The Power Battle》和《The Power Fighters》的同一團隊開發的。

captavnu.name: 美國隊長和復仇者聯盟
captavnu.original_desc: A side-scrolling beat'em up (punctuated with occasional shoot'em up sections) in which one or more players take on the role of either Captain America, Iron Man, Vision, or Hawkeye as they prepare to do battle with Red Skull and his henchmen. Each player character has a different weapon or power that can be used throughout the game to assist them in combat. Captain America uses his shield, Iron Man uses his repulsor rays, Vision uses his solar beam and Hawkeye uses his bow and arrows. There are also additional superheroes such as Quicksilver, Sub-Mariner, Wonder Man, and The Wasp who appear at certain points in the game to assist the player characters. Some of the super-villain foes that await the heroes are Klaw, The Living Laser, Whirlwind, The Grim Reaper, The Wizard, The Controllers, The Mandarin, The Juggernaut (from X-Men), Ultron and Crossbones. The game consists of all five stages.
captavnu.desc: 一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲（偶爾會有射擊遊戲部分），其中一名或多名玩家扮演美國隊長、鋼鐵俠、幻視或鷹眼，準備與紅骷髏及其追隨者戰鬥。每個玩家角色都有不同的武器或力量，可以在整個遊戲中使用來協助他們進行戰鬥。美國隊長使用他的盾牌，鋼鐵俠使用他的排斥射線，幻視使用他的太陽光束，鷹眼使用他的弓箭。還有其他超級英雄，如快銀、水手、神奇俠和黃蜂女，他們會在遊戲中的某些時刻出現來協助玩家角色。等待英雄的一些超級反派敵人包括克勞、活激光、旋風、死神、巫師、控制者、滿大人、劍聖（來自 X 戰警）、奧創和交叉骨。遊戲由所有五個階段組成。

1942.original_desc:
"1942" is a vertically-scrolling shoot-em-up set in the Pacific theater during World War II, in which the goal is to reach Tokyo and destroy the entire Japanese air fleet.
The player pilots a plane, the "Super Ace" and has to shoot down waves of enemy planes while avoiding incoming enemy fire and performing a limited number of rolls to evade enemy planes and shots.
During the game, waves of red enemy planes periodically appear. If the player manages to destroy a red wave, a power-up will be dropped and can be picked up to win either increased power (doubling the player's guns from two to four), a smart bomb that destroys all on-screen enemy planes the instant it's collected, two wingmen planes that flank the plane and increase firepower, or simply extra points.
At the end of each stage, the 'Super Ace' lands on an aircraft carrier and bonus points are awarded based on player performance. "1942" differs from other games in that its levels are numbered in reverse order.
1942.desc:
《1942》是一款以二戰期間太平洋戰區為背景的垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，目標是到達東京並摧毀整個日本空軍艦隊。
玩家駕駛一架名為“超級王牌”的飛機，必須擊落一波又一波的敵機，同時避免敵人的火力襲來，並進行有限次數的翻滾來躲避敵機和射擊。
遊戲過程中，會周期性出現一波又一波的紅色敵機。如果玩家成功摧毀了紅色波浪，就會掉落並拾取一個強化道具來贏得增強的威力（將玩家的槍支從兩門增加到四門）、一枚智能炸彈（收集後立即摧毀屏幕上的所有敵機）、兩架側翼飛機並增加火力，或者只是額外積分。
每個階段結束時，“超級王牌”都會降落在航空母艦上，並根據玩家的表現獎勵積分。《1942》與其他遊戲的不同之處在於它的關卡是按倒序編號的。

liquidk.name: 液體兒童
liquidk.original_desc: Hippo, a hippopotamus (possibly a platypus actually, given his appearance), lives happily with his friends and his girlfriend Tamasun in Woody Lake, until one day, suddenly, an evil fire demon appears, wreaking havoc on Woody Lake and kidnapping his girlfriend and friends. Thanks to the power given to him by the spirit of the lake, Hippo gains the ability to create and throw water bombs, with which he extinguishes fire and defeats his enemies. Hippo begins his adventure to rescue his friends and his girlfriend Tamasun and defeat the fire demon to bring peace back to Woody Lake.
liquidk.desc: 河馬（Hippo）是一隻河馬（從外表來看，實際上可能是鴨嘴獸），和他的朋友以及女友塔瑪森（Tamasun）在伍迪湖幸福地生活著，直到有一天，突然，一隻邪惡的火魔出現，在伍迪湖肆虐，並綁架了他的女友和朋友。由於湖水之靈賦予他的力量，河馬獲得了製造和投擲水彈的能力，他可以用水彈來撲滅火焰並擊敗敵人。河馬開始了他的冒險之旅，拯救他的朋友和女友塔瑪森，並擊敗火魔，為伍迪湖帶來和平。

macross.name: 超時空要塞超時空要塞
macross.original_desc:
Super Spacefortress Macross is a vertically-scrolling shoot'em up based on the 1984 theatrical film in the Macross franchise, commonly known in English as Macross: Do You Remember Love?. Players control the VF-1 Valkyrie fighters of ace pilots Max Jenius and (in two-player games only) Hikaru Ichijyo in combat against the Zentradi.

The game consists of seven levels, mostly based on action scenes from the film, including confrontations over Macross City, in the rings of Saturn, the surface of the devastated Earth, and the final battle against Boddole Zer.

Gameplay is similar to Raiden: the Valkyrie can transform into one of three different modes by collecting the appropriate power-up: in Fighter mode, the ship fires a spread shot, Gerwalk mode has a narrow but powerful laser that passes through enemies, and Battroid mode features homing missiles. The intensity of the attacks can be upgraded in three stages through another power-up. There are also smart bombs to pick up that clear most enemies off the screen with one shot. Each level ends with a boss battle. Besides shooting down the hordes of enemies, picking up medals and rare Minmay dolls also increases the score. In two-player mode, both players take on the enemy simultaneously. Between levels, cutscenes recreate scenes from the film to illustrate the storyline.
macross.desc:
《超時空要塞》是一款垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，改編自 1984 年的《超時空要塞》系列電影，英文通常稱為“超時空要塞：你記得愛嗎？”。玩家控制王牌飛行員 Max Jenius 和（僅限兩人遊戲）一條光 (Hikaru Ichijyo) 的 VF-1 瓦爾基里 (VF-1 Valkyrie) 戰鬥機與 Zentradi 作戰。

遊戲由七個關卡組成，大部分基於電影中的動作場景，包括超時空要塞、土星環、滿目瘡痍的地球表面的對抗，以及與博多·澤爾的最後一戰。

遊戲玩法與雷電類似：瓦爾基里可以通過收集適當的能量來轉變為三種不同模式之一：在戰鬥機模式下，飛船會發射散彈，格沃克模式具有狹窄但強大的激光，可以穿過敵人，而蝙蝠機器人模式則具有尋的導彈。攻擊強度可以通過另一種能力提升分三個階段升級。還有智能炸彈可以一擊清除屏幕上的大多數敵人。每個級別都以老闆之戰結束。除了擊落成群的敵人之外，拾取獎牌和稀有的敏美娃娃也會增加分數。在雙人模式中，兩名玩家同時對抗敵人。在關卡之間，過場動畫重現了電影中的場景來說明故事情節。

mrdo.name: 杜先生！
mrdo.original_desc:
Mr. Do! is a colourful and addictive maze game in which the player takes on the role of the eponymous Mr. Do, a circus clown, who must clear each level of either cherries or monsters. The game's single screen levels are made up of tunnels surrounded by a colourful, soil-like substance. This soil can be dug through to create new tunnels, allowing Mr. Do to escape his enemies and to reach the many cherries that litter the levels. A number of apples are also scattered around each level, and Mr. Do can push them along tunnels (to block and/or kill monsters) or can tunnel beneath them to drop them onto the heads of any pursuing enemies. Mr. Do himself can also be killed by a falling apple.

Mr. Do is armed with a 'Powerball' that can be fired down a tunnel, it will then bounce around the tunnels until it either returns to Mr. Do, or comes into contact with, and kills, one of the level's monsters. The Powerball regenerates immediately the first time you use it, but takes longer each time it is used to return to your hands. As each level progresses, the monsters themselves start to dig tunnels of their own in their pursuit of Mr. Do. Monsters can also push the apples.

Each screen has a doorway through which the monsters enter the level. Once all of the monsters have appeared, the doorway will turn into a 'prize', (ice cream, biscuits, etc.). If Mr. Do collects the prize, the 'Alphamonster' and his three 'Muncher' henchmen will appear. The Alphamonster may be in the EXTRA box at the top of the screen or be moving around the screen. The Alphamonster and the Munchers cannot be easily crushed under apples because they tend to eat them. They can be killed individually with the Powerball or by killing the Alphamonster itself, at which point any remaining Munchers will turn into apples.

After every three levels, there is a brief intermission in which a tune is played and a large, animated Mr. Do appears, together with some of the game's monsters. The time to complete each level and the preferred method (monsters, cherries, Alphamonsters, or Diamond) is shown. The paths in the first level resemble a 'D', after this each level's tunnels resemble a digit, ('2', '3', '4' etc.) up to '0' for level 10.

A level can be completed any one of several different ways: either by collecting all of the on-screen cherries; by killing all of the monsters, by completing the EXTRA box, or by collecting the diamond. The latter appears only very occasionally ('Special' awards an extra credit).
mrdo.desc:
杜先生！是一款色彩繽紛、令人上癮的迷宮遊戲，玩家在遊戲中扮演同名的馬戲團小丑 Do 先生，必須清除每個關卡中的櫻桃或怪物。遊戲的單屏關卡由隧道組成，隧道周圍環繞著色彩繽紛的土壤狀物質。可以挖掘這些土壤來創建新的隧道，讓 Do 先生逃離他的敵人，並到達散落在關卡中的許多櫻桃。每個關卡周圍還散佈著許多蘋果，Do 先生可以沿著隧道推動它們（以阻止和/或殺死怪物），也可以在它們下面挖隧道，將它們扔到任何追擊敵人的頭上。多先生本人也可能被掉落的蘋果砸死。

Mr. Do 配備了一個“強力球”，可以沿著隧道發射，然後它會在隧道中彈跳，直到返回到 Mr. Do 身邊，或者接觸到並殺死關卡中的一個怪物。強力球在您第一次使用時會立即再生，但每次使用時需要更長的時間才能回到您的手中。隨著每個關卡的進展，怪物們自己開始挖掘自己的隧道來追捕 Do 先生。怪物也可以推蘋果。

每個屏幕都有一個門口，怪物通過該門口進入關卡。一旦所有怪物都出現，門口就會變成“獎品”（冰淇淋、餅乾等）。如果 Do 先生領取了獎品，“Alphamonster”和他的三個“Muncher”追隨者將會出現。Alphamonster 可能位於屏幕頂部的額外框中或在屏幕上移動。阿爾法怪物和咀嚼者不容易被蘋果壓死，因為它們傾向於吃蘋果。它們可以用強力球單獨殺死，也可以通過殺死阿爾法怪物本身來殺死，此時任何剩餘的咀嚼者都會變成蘋果。

每三個關卡之後，會有一個短暫的間歇，其中會播放一首曲子，一個巨大的動畫 Mr. Do 會與遊戲中的一些怪物一起出現。顯示完成每個級別的時間和首選方法（怪物、櫻桃、阿爾法怪物或鑽石）。第一層中的路徑類似於“D”，此後每一層的隧道類似於數字（“2”、“3”、“4”等），直到第 10 層的“0”。

一個關卡可以通過幾種不同的方式中的任何一種來完成：或者通過收集屏幕上的所有櫻桃；或者通過收集屏幕上的所有櫻桃。殺死所有怪物、完成額外盒子或收集鑽石。後者僅偶爾出現（“特殊”授予額外學分）。

exedexes.name: 前任
exedexes.original_desc:
Exed Exes is an arcade vertical shooter developed by Capcom. It was licensed to Memetron and released outside of Japan in the arcades as Savage Bees Memetron (licensor to the game). It uses similar hardware to Capcom's 1942, but it is more of a spiritual successor to Capcom's earlier shooter Vulgus. It takes place in a science fiction alien hive where you must pilot your ship through many stages protected by insects, some as large as your craft, and some even larger.

What made Exed Exes stand apart from other shooters, besides the high resolution graphics for its time, and the detailed use of parallax scrolling to indicate depth, was the fact that it was one of the earliest vertical shooters to allow for two player simultaneous play. Rather than waiting for one player to take his turn, two players could enjoy the game at the same time, and even work cooperatively to get further along in the game.
exedexes.desc:
Exed Exes是Capcom開發的一款街機垂直射擊遊戲。它獲得了 Memetron 的授權，並以 Savage Bees Memetron（遊戲許可方）的名義在日本境外的街機廳發行。它使用與 Capcom 的 1942 類似的硬件，但它更像是 Capcom 早期射擊遊戲 Vulgus 的精神繼承者。它發生在科幻小說中的外星蜂巢中，您必須駕駛您的飛船通過許多受昆蟲保護的階段，有些與您的飛船一樣大，有些甚至更大。

Exed Exes 之所以能從其他射擊遊戲中脫穎而出，除了當時的高分辨率圖形以及詳細使用視差滾動來指示深度之外，還在於它是最早允許兩名玩家同時玩的垂直射擊遊戲之一。兩名玩家可以同時享受遊戲，甚至可以合作，在遊戲中取得進一步的進展，而不是等待一個玩家輪到他。

citycon.name: 連接城市
citycon.original_desc: The player controls a small red car and dripping paint must jump between platforms to paint them in.  Oil cans are collected and used to shoot at:  police, taxis, ambulances and jeeps; that roam the levels. Catch 3 balloons to advance multiple levels.  Cats must be avoided at all costs.
citycon.desc: 玩家控制一輛紅色小車，滴下的油漆必須在平台之間跳躍以將其塗上。收集油罐並用於射擊：警察、出租車、救護車和吉普車；漫遊關卡。抓住 3 個氣球即可晉級多個關卡。必須不惜一切代價避免養貓。

robocop.name: 機械戰警
robocop.original_desc:
RoboCop - The Future of Law Enforcement is a single player, side-scrolling platform shoot-em-up based on the 1987 movie of the same name. The game's story mirrors that of the film, with former cop Murphy, now a half-human cyborg called 'RoboCop', on a quest to bring down the evil OCP corporation.

RoboCop features nine levels of action, with two of the game's nine stages being into-the-screen target ranges, in which players can try to accrue bonus points and earn extra health. Wooden crates occasionally bar RoboCop's progress, but these can be punched to remove them. Marked crates can be smashed to reveal one of three Weapon power-ups; Three-way Gun, Dual Laser and the incredibly powerful Cobra Gun.

The film's incidental music plays throughout the game and RoboCop's speech is sampled directly from the original film.
robocop.desc:
《機械戰警 - 執法的未來》是一款基於 1987 年同名電影的單人橫向捲軸平台射擊遊戲。遊戲的故事與電影的故事相似，前警察墨菲現在是一個被稱為“機械戰警”的半人機器人，致力於打倒邪惡的 OCP 公司。

《機械戰警》具有九個動作關卡，遊戲的九個關卡中有兩個關卡位於屏幕目標範圍內，玩家可以在其中嘗試累積獎勵積分並獲得額外的生命值。木箱偶爾會阻礙機械戰警的前進，但可以通過打孔將其移除。打碎標記的板條箱可以顯示三種武器強化道具之一；三向槍、雙激光和極其強大的眼鏡蛇槍。

電影的附帶音樂貫穿整個遊戲，機械戰警的演講直接取自原電影。

bogeyman.name: 柏忌莊園
bogeyman.original_desc:
You play as a young ghost hunter boy who runs around a haunted house. Your objective is to destroy with your sword all the crystal balls that are in the house, you must go through all the floors and go through the doors guided by the map at the top of the screen in a time limit without getting caught by the ghosts, frankenstein, witches and other creepy creatures. With the help of your magic glove can freeze ghosts for a short period of time to later hit them with the sword.

Once you've destroyed all the crystal balls, the haunted house starts falling apart, and you must run for your life towards the exit to win the stage. You can transform into a super hero, entering through the flashing door to grab special items.
bogeyman.desc:
你扮演一個年輕的幽靈獵人男孩，在鬼屋裡跑來跑去。你的目標是用你的劍摧毀房子裡的所有水晶球，你必須在規定的時間內穿過所有樓層並通過屏幕頂部地圖引導的門，而不被鬼魂、弗蘭肯斯坦、女巫和其他令人毛骨悚然的生物抓住。在魔法手套的幫助下，可以在短時間內凍結幽靈，然後用劍攻擊它們。

一旦你摧毀了所有的水晶球，鬼屋就會開始分崩離析，你必須逃命地跑向出口才能贏得舞台。您可以變身為超級英雄，通過閃爍的門進入並獲取特殊物品。

mhavoc.name: 大浩劫的冒險
mhavoc.original_desc:
Major Havoc is a vector-based shoot-em-up and platform game in which the evil Vaxxian Empire overran the galaxy many years ago. Most of humanity was enslaved and abducted to the Vaxxian home world, although a few human scientists managed to escape. The Vaxxian Empire has long since collapsed but numerous Vaxxian space stations, all blindly controlled and defended by robots, still remain in the galaxy, mindlessly following their original, pre-programmed orders.

The small band of scientists who initially escaped have cloned the great human hero, 'Major Havoc' and tasked him with flying his 'Catastrofighter' through a wormhole in space so that he may lead a clone army against the dreaded Vaxxian robots and to liberate the remnants of humanity by destroying the enemy reactors. The player controls Major Rex Havoc, the leader of this band of clones.

The game is broken down into two distinct gameplay genres. The first is a shoot-'em-up in which the player controls Major Havoc's spaceship against the numerous robot ships that defend the enemy reactors. The ships are encased in a force-field shield which must first be shot and depleted before the ship itself can be destroyed.
mhavoc.desc:
Major Havoc 是一款基於矢量的射擊遊戲和平台遊戲，邪惡的 Vaxxian 帝國多年前佔領了銀河系。儘管少數人類科學家設法逃脫，但大多數人類被奴役並被綁架到瓦克斯家園世界。瓦克西亞帝國早已崩潰，但無數由機器人盲目控制和防禦的瓦克西亞空間站仍然留在銀河系中，盲目地遵循其最初的、預先編程的命令。

最初逃脫的一小群科學家克隆了偉大的人類英雄“大浩劫”，並指派他駕駛“災難戰鬥機”穿過太空蟲洞，這樣他就可以領導一支克隆人軍隊對抗可怕的瓦克西亞機器人，並通過摧毀敵方反應堆來解放人類殘餘。玩家控制雷克斯·浩劫少校，他是這支克隆人隊伍的首領。

該遊戲分為兩種不同的遊戲類型。第一個是射擊遊戲，玩家控制浩劫少校的宇宙飛船，對抗保衛敵方反應堆的眾多機器人飛船。這些船隻被包裹在力場護盾中，在船隻本身被摧毀之前，必須首先射擊並耗盡該護盾。

kangaroo.name: 袋鼠
kangaroo.original_desc:
A platform game in which the player controls a mother Kangaroo who must climb through the treetops trying to rescue her captured son. Numerous monkeys, the kidnappers of her child, roam the levels set on stopping the player's progress. The monkeys constantly throw apples at the Kangaroo which must either be avoided (either by ducking or jumping, depending on the height of the approaching apple), or punched away, the latter of which allows the Kangaroo to punch the apple back towards the attacking monkey.

If the player stalls for too long or does not punch either an apple or a monkey, a giant ape will appear and steal the Kangaroo's boxing gloves, leaving the player temporarily defenseless. The gloves are returned after a short time.

Fruit and vegetables litter the levels and can be picked up for bonus points. Each level also has a bell hanging from one of its platforms, which can be punched to make fruit and vegetable items appear. The game consists of 4 different stages, once these are completed the game begins again with an increased level of difficulty.
kangaroo.desc:
在一款平台遊戲中，玩家控製袋鼠媽媽，她必須爬過樹頂，試圖營救被俘的兒子。許多猴子，她孩子的綁架者，在關卡中徘徊，阻止玩家前進。猴子不斷地向袋鼠扔蘋果，袋鼠必須要么躲避（通過躲避或跳躍，具體取決於接近的蘋果的高度），要么用拳頭擊打，後者允許袋鼠將蘋果擊回攻擊猴子。

如果玩家停滯太久或者沒有打蘋果或猴子，一隻巨猿就會出現並偷走袋鼠的拳擊手套，讓玩家暫時失去防禦能力。不久後手套被歸還。

水果和蔬菜散落在關卡中，撿起來可以獲得獎勵積分。每層的一個平台上都懸掛著一個鈴鐺，敲擊鈴鐺就會出現水果和蔬菜。遊戲由 4 個不同的階段組成，一旦完成這些階段，遊戲就會以更高的難度重新開始。

mbombrd.original_name: Muscle Bomber Duo : Ultimate Team Battle
mbombrd.name: 肌肉轟炸機二人組：終極團隊戰鬥
mbombrd.original_desc:
Professional wrestling experienced a sudden increase in popularity during the early 1980s, where many professional wrestling organizations were started all over the world. A severe rivalry existed among the organizations.

In order to resolve this conflict, 8 organizations combined to form the Capcom Professional Wrestling Association (CPWA), led by Victor Ortega, the CPWA?s first champion.

One day, Ortega suddenly vanished. He was considered to be the axis of the sport and his unexpected disappearance caused the CPWA to enter an age of confusion and disorder. The BPWA, a dark underground wrestling organization, chose to take advantage of this opportunity and began moving. With "Fighters of Muscle Bomber = Destiny" as the theme, the CPWA chief executives decided to hold a world tour called the ?Crash Carnival,? to decide the new king of the CPWA.

The gong that determines the new ?Master of Muscle Bomber? is sounded?
mbombrd.desc:
職業摔跤在20世紀80年代初突然流行起來，世界各地成立了許多職業摔跤組織。組織之間存在著激烈的競爭。

為了解決這一沖突，8個組織聯合成立了卡普空職業摔跤協會（CPWA），由CPWA首任冠軍維克多·奧爾特加領導。

有一天，奧爾特加突然失踪了。他被認為是這項運動的軸心，他的意外失踪導致CPWA進入了一個混亂和無序的時代。BPWA，一個黑暗的地下摔跤組織，選擇利用這個機會，開始行動。以“肌肉轟炸機的戰士=命運”為主題，CPWA首席執行官決定舉辦一場名為“碰撞嘉年華”的世界巡演。決定CPWA的新任國王。

決定新“肌肉轟炸機大師”的鑼響起？

arknoid2.name: 打磚塊 - 多赫的複仇
arknoid2.original_desc:
Arkanoid - Revenge of DOH © 1987 Taito Corp.

The mysterious enemy known as 'DOH' has returned to seek vengeance on the 'Vaus' space vessel. The player must once again take control of the Vaus and overcome many challenges in order to destroy DOH once and for all. 

An update of the popular 1986 original, Revenge of DOH sees the player battle through 34 rounds, taken from a grand total of 64. Revenge of DOH differs from its predecessor with the introduction of "Warp Gates". Upon completion of a round or when the Break ('B') pill is caught, two gates appear at the bottom left and bottom right of the play area respectively, the Vaus is then taken through one of the gates - the choice will affect which version of the next round is provided.

The game also features two new features for bricks. Notched silver bricks, like normal silver bricks, take several hits to destroy. However, after a short period of time after destruction, they regenerate at full strength. Fortunately, clearing a level does not require that any notched bricks to be destroyed. Also, some bricks move from side to side as long as their left and/or right sides are not obstructed by other bricks.

The game features a mini-boss in the form of a giant brain, which will help you practice for DOH. You must aim for the brain's mouth to defeat it.
arknoid2.desc:
打磚塊 - DOH 的複仇 © 1987 Taito Corp.

被稱為“DOH”的神秘敵人回來了，向“Vaus”太空船報仇。玩家必須再次控制 Vaus 並克服重重挑戰，才能一勞永逸地摧毀 DOH。

《DOH 的複仇》是 1986 年廣受歡迎的原作的更新版，玩家將經歷 34 輪戰鬥（總共 64 輪）。 《DOH 的複仇》與其前作不同，引入了“曲速之門”。完成一輪後或當打破（'B'）藥丸被抓住時，兩個門分別出現在遊戲區域的左下角和右下角，然後 Vaus 通過其中一個門 - 選擇將影響提供下一輪的哪個版本。

該遊戲還具有兩個新的積木功能。有缺口的銀磚和普通的銀磚一樣，需要多次撞擊才會被摧毀。然而，在被破壞後的短時間內，它們就會以全力再生。幸運的是，通關不需要破壞任何有缺口的磚塊。此外，一些磚塊可以從一側移動到另一側，只要它們的左側和/或右側不被其他磚塊阻擋即可。

該遊戲有一個巨大大腦形式的小老闆，它將幫助您練習 DOH。你必須瞄準大腦的嘴巴才能打敗它。

candance.name: 奧斯曼
candance.original_desc:
Osman is a side-scrolling action platforming game produced by Mitchell Corp. that was released exclusively to arcades in 1996. Many ex-Capcom staff including Kouichi Yotsui (credited as Isuke), worked on the original arcade version of Strider and designed Osman as an unofficial sequel to Strider. Yotsui directed both titles.

In contrast to Strider's futuristic Kazakh-Soviet setting, Osman is set in a neon-lit cyberpunk Arabian setting, while Strider Hiryu is replaced by a Middle Eastern protagonist named Kirin who fights without any weapons.The game's bizarre plot supposedly mocks director Kouichi Yotsui's experience at Capcom after Strider.
candance.desc:
《奧斯曼》是一款由 Mitchell Corp. 製作的橫向捲軸動作平台遊戲，於 1996 年專門面向街機發行。包括四井浩一（Isuke）在內的許多前 Capcom 員工都參與了《Strider》的原始街機版本的工作，並將《奧斯曼》設計為《Strider》的非官方續集。四井執導了這兩部電影。

與《Strider》的未來哈薩克-蘇聯設定相反，《奧斯曼》設定在霓虹燈閃爍的賽博朋克阿拉伯背景中，而《Strider Hiryu》則被一位名叫麒麟的中東主角取代，他不使用任何武器進行戰鬥。遊戲的離奇情節據稱是在嘲笑導演四井浩一在《Strider》之後在 Capcom 的經歷。

upndown.name: 上下
upndown.original_desc:
Up'n Down is an abstract racing game viewed in a forced third-person perspective. 

The goal of the game is to collect coloured flags, while avoiding the enemy vehicles and obstacles that litter each course. The flags needed are displayed at the top of the screen and are coloured as follows: Light green, blue, red, olive, dark green, magenta, yellow and black. If the flags are collected quickly enough, bonus points are awarded. Collected flags remain visible on the track but are changed to white in colour.
upndown.desc:
Up'n Down 是一款以強制第三人稱視角觀看的抽象賽車遊戲。

遊戲的目標是收集彩色旗幟，同時避開遍布每條賽道的敵方車輛和障礙物。所需的標誌顯示在屏幕頂部，顏色如下：淺綠色、藍色、紅色、橄欖色、深綠色、洋紅色、黃色和黑色。如果旗幟收集得足夠快，就會獲得獎勵積分。收集到的旗幟在賽道上仍然可見，但顏色變為白色。

qbert.name: Q*伯特
qbert.original_desc: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.
qbert.desc: Q*bert 是一款帶有解謎元素的等距平台遊戲，玩家從第三人稱視角控制名義主角。Q*bert 每場遊戲都從立方體金字塔的頂部開始，並通過對角線從一個立方體跳躍到另一個立方體來移動。落在立方體上會導致它改變顏色，將每個立方體更改為目標顏色可以讓玩家進入下一階段。

ninjakd2.name: 忍者小子 II
ninjakd2.original_desc: This game is known in US as "Rad Action" and "JT 104", outside US as "Ninja Kid-II", and in Japan as 'Ninja-kun - Ashura no Shou' (translates from Japanese as 'Ninja Kid - Chronicle of Ashura').
ninjakd2.desc: 該遊戲在美國被稱為“Rad Action”和“JT 104”，在美國以外被稱為“Ninja Kid-II”，在日本被稱為“Ninja-kun - Ashura no Shou”（日語翻譯為“Ninja Kid - Chronicle of Ashura”）。

aburner2.name: 燃燒器 II 後
aburner2.original_desc:
After Burner is another Sega game rendered with their then-ubiquitous 3-D sprite-scaling technology; this time putting the player into the seat of a powerful F14 Tomcat jet fighter. 

Players must fight their way through 21 colourful, fast-moving stages, shooting down waves of enemy fighters while avoiding the enemy's incoming missiles. The F14 is equipped with a machine gun and a limited number of homing missiles. The gun has infinite ammunition and targeting is achieved by maneuvering the Tomcat so that the targeting cursor situated just in front of the jet is placed over an enemy fighter. 

After Burner's straightforward shoot-em-up gameplay is simple and repetitive, but the game's incredible visuals ensured its success.
aburner2.desc:
《After Burner》是另一款世嘉遊戲，採用當時無處不在的 3D 精靈縮放技術進行渲染；這次將玩家置於強大的 F14 Tomcat 噴氣式戰鬥機的座位上。

玩家必須殺出一條血路，通過 21 個色彩繽紛、快速移動的關卡，擊落一波又一波的敵方戰鬥機，同時躲避敵人的來襲導彈。F14配備機槍和數量有限的尋的導彈。該槍擁有無限彈藥，通過操縱“雄貓”來實現瞄準，從而將位於噴氣式飛機前方的瞄準光標放置在敵方戰鬥機上方。

《After Burner》的簡單射擊遊戲玩法簡單且重複，但遊戲令人難以置信的視覺效果確保了它的成功。

typhoon.name: 阿賈克斯
typhoon.original_desc:
The player has been issued an emergency order. He must save the earth from being conquered by enemy forces. He climbs into his helicopter and prepares for intense aerial combat. Shooting oncoming enemy aircrafts and bombing the enemies below, he tries to make his way through the different stages to reach the enemy base. When he finishes the first stage, he is transported to his next mission by ab aircraft carrier. He hops into his jet fighters, tanks, ships, helicopters, and aircraft carriers. The player must also be aware of unseen enemies and surprise attacks.

Different kinds of power ups can be obtained throughout the game. These include:
'3' 3-Way: Bullets fire forward, right, and left.
'L' Laser: Player can shoot double lasers.
'T' Triple: Missiles are fired that spread out three ways in front.
'V' Vulcan: Rapid bullets are fired in the directions controlled.
'B' Bomb: Air to ground missles which can be upgraded twice.
'O' Orbital: A small drone using the same weaponry as the helicopter which can be otained by clearing a special formation of little red fighters.

There is an additional super weapon that destroys all the enemies on the screen at once. However, use of this weapon is limited.

Ajax contains 2 different types of stages: 2-D and 3-D. In the 2-D stage, the player controls a helicopter. In the 3-D stage, the player commands a jet fighter.

Ajax features some impressive graphics filled with rotation and scaling effects (some may get a little dizzy, though!), a solid soundtrack and excellent game control. Highly recommended for any shoot'em up enthusiast!
typhoon.desc:
該球員已收到緊急命令。他必須拯救地球免遭敵軍征服。他爬上直升機，準備進行激烈的空戰。射擊迎面而來的敵機並轟炸下面的敵人，他試圖通過不同的階段到達敵人的基地。當他完成第一階段後，他將被 ab 航空母艦運送到他的下一個任務。他跳進他的噴氣式戰鬥機、坦克、輪船、直升機和航空母艦。玩家還必須警惕看不見的敵人和突然襲擊。

在整個遊戲過程中可以獲得不同類型的能量提升。這些包括：
'3' 三向：子彈向前、向右、向左射擊。
“L”激光：玩家可以發射雙激光。
“T”三重：發射的導彈在前方向三個方向散開。
“V”火神：快速子彈向受控方向發射。
“B”炸彈：空對地導彈，可升級兩次。
“O”軌道：使用與直升機相同武器的小型無人機，可以通過清除紅色小型戰鬥機的特殊編隊來獲得。

還有一種額外的超級武器，可以一次性消滅屏幕上的所有敵人。然而，這種武器的使用是有限的。

Ajax 包含 2 種不同類型的階段：2-D 和 3-D。在二維階段，玩家控制一架直升機。在 3D 階段，玩家指揮一架噴氣式戰鬥機。

Ajax 具有一些令人印象深刻的圖形，充滿旋轉和縮放效果（但有些可能會有點頭暈！）、堅實的配樂和出色的遊戲控制。強烈推薦給任何射擊遊戲愛好者！

sonic.name: 刺猬索尼克系列
sonic.original_desc:
Segasonic The Hedgehog is a scrolling, isometric racing game for one to three players featuring Sega's legendary mascot, 'Sonic the Hedgehog'. Sonic's nemesis, 'Dr. Robotnik', is once again intent on World domination and is preparing to launch his latest attack from his new island base, Eggman Island.

When 'Sonic', 'Ray', and 'Mighty' drop in to thwart his plans, Robotnik catches them with one of his devious machines. After finding themselves imprisoned in a tower, the trio break free onto the island, and proceed to make their escape and try to defeat Robotnik and his evil plans.

Sega Sonic's gameplay retains elements of the original console games, such as Sonic's ability to jump on the heads of enemies to kill them. The golden rings that Sonic collects are also included. Each level is littered with Dr Robotnik's devious traps; with lava flows, collapsible platforms, locked gates etc. all serving to hamper Sonic's progress.
sonic.desc:
Segasonic The Hedgehog 是一款適合一到三名玩家的滾動式等距賽車遊戲，以世嘉的傳奇吉祥物“刺猬索尼克”為特色。索尼克的宿敵“博士”機器人尼克再次一心想要統治世界，並準備從他的新島嶼基地艾格曼島發起最新的攻擊。

當“索尼克”、“雷”和“強大”前來阻撓他的計劃時，機器人尼克用他的一台狡猾的機器抓住了他們。在發現自己被囚禁在一座塔樓中後，三人逃到了島上，並繼續逃亡並試圖擊敗機器人和他的邪惡計劃。

世嘉索尼克的遊戲玩法保留了原始主機遊戲的元素，例如索尼克能夠跳到敵人的頭上殺死他們。索尼克收集的金戒指也包括在內。每個關卡都佈滿了機器人博士的狡猾陷阱；熔岩流、可折疊的平台、上鎖的大門等都阻礙了索尼克的前進。

samuraia.name: 王牌武士
samuraia.original_desc:
This game is known in Japan as "Sengoku Ace" (translates from Japanese as 'Civil War Ace').

Samurai Aces is the very first game developed by Psikyo (Psikyo was founded in 1992 in Tokyo).

Note: There are 22 different endings!
samuraia.desc:
該遊戲在日本被稱為“戰國王牌”（日語翻譯為“內戰王牌”）。

Samurai Aces 是 Psikyo 開發的第一款遊戲（Psikyo 於 1992 年在東京成立）。

注意：有22個不同的結局！

noboranb.name: 數量
noboranb.original_desc: This game is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up where the player controls a character that has to climb a tree and shoot bug-like enemies. The story is that the princess has been kidnapped by the villains of the Insect World, and Zippy Bug has to rescue her. After shooting the enemies, they drop fruits that the player can collect for extra points, and skulls that are deadly if touched. The player is able to fly for a short time, and every time this is done, one of the letters from the 'I Love You' at the bottom of the screen is used up. The letters regenerate over a small period of time. There are also other items, such as the key, which surrounds the player in a bubble and makes him invulnerable to 1 hit. Another item is a ring which seems to instantly replenish all of the used up 'I Love You' letters. One other item is the hammer, which allows the player to wipe out all the enemies off the screen. There is a boss at the end of each level.
noboranb.desc: 這款遊戲是一款垂直滾動射擊遊戲，玩家控制一個角色，該角色必須爬上樹並射擊類似蟲子的敵人。故事講述公主被昆蟲世界的惡棍綁架，小蟲必須營救她。射擊敵人後，他們會掉落水果，玩家可以收集這些水果以獲得額外積分，還有頭骨，如果觸碰就會致命。玩家可以飛行很短的時間，每次飛行時，屏幕底部“我愛你”的其中一個字母就會被用完。這些字母會在很短的時間內重新生成。還有其他物品，例如鑰匙，它將玩家包圍在氣泡中，使他免受 1 次攻擊。另一件物品是一枚戒指，它似乎可以立即補充所有用完的“我愛你”字母。另一件物品是錘子，它可以讓玩家消滅屏幕上的所有敵人。每個級別的末尾都有一個老闆。

puyopuy2.name: 噗喲噗喲 2
puyopuy2.original_desc: This sequel to Puyo Puyo is, like its predecessor, a game of falling blocks, in which the aim is to combine four or more blocks (Puyos) of the same colour, which then disappear. The remaining Puyos then fall and can produce combos that cause special harmful blocks to appear on the enemy's terrain.
puyopuy2.desc: 《Puyo Puyo》的這款續作與前作一樣，是一款方塊下落遊戲，其目標是將四個或更多相同顏色的方塊 (Puyos) 組合在一起，然後方塊就會消失。剩下的 Puyo 會掉落並產生連擊，導致特殊的有害方塊出現在敵人的地形上。

starcas.name: 星堡
starcas.original_desc:
Star Castle is a 1- or 2-player outer space action game designed with features geared for maximum player appeal: A progressively difficult competitive level and a clearly defined enemy which must be both attacked and avoided at various points in the course of play.

The center of the playfield is occupied by the Star Castle which is programmed to constantly home in on the players' ships. Surrounding the Star Castle are three concentric energy rings of twelve segments each, which serve as both a protective perimeter for the Star Castle and a source of points for the player. Contained within the energy rings are three protective mines which seek out the players' ships and destroy them upon collision. The movements of the mines are programmed to simulate the actions of heat-seeking missiles.

The object of the games of Star Castle is to score the maximum number of points possible. This is accomplished by the combination of three elements:
a) Exploding the ring segments.
b) Exploding the Star Castle.
c) Avoiding the Star Castle's mines. A player's turn is over when his ship has been destroyed. The number of ships per game is set by the operator.

For maximum scoring, a player will want to shoot out sections of the energy rings in order to give him a shot at the Star Castle in the center of the screen. As play progresses, there are 2 facts a player must keep in mind:
1) Exploding all segments in a given ring will cause the entire ring to reappear - thereby eliminating a potential shot at the Star Castle in the center.
2) Exploding the rings in a manner that gives you a shot at the Star Castle will also give the Star Castle a shot at you. The Star Castle is programmed so that its nose always seeks out the player's ship. If there is an open shot at the player, it will take it.

When the Star Castle is hit by a player's missile, it will first implode and then explode with all remaining ring segments. After a one-second delay, the Star Castle will reappear with all three ring segments. If the Star Castle shoots the player, his turn is over.

As play begins, the Star Castle will appear in the center of the screen surrounded by its 3 energy rings. The player's ship appears about halfway up on the right hand edge. By using the control buttons to move forward, right or left, the player maneuvers about the screen using the firing button to launch missiles.

Points are scored by destroying the energy ring segments or the Star Castle itself. Exploding the Star Castle gives an extra ship as well as points. No points are given for the mines that attack the player.

The player's ship can be destroyed in 2 ways: By collision with the mines or by a hit from the Star Castle's torpedo. The mines are launched from the rings and attack the player for approximately ten seconds or until shot. The Star Castle's torpedoes are launched only when there is a clear shot at the player through all 3 rings. At this time the player also has his shot at the Star Castle. Both the Star Castle and the mines get smarter and faster as the game progresses.

The game of STAR CASTLE is not based on time units. The battle rages on until all the players' ships are destroyed. The length of the game depends solely on the skill of the player. It's the age-old challenge of man versus machine.
starcas.desc:
Star Castle 是一款 1 人或 2 人外太空動作遊戲，其功能旨在最大限度地吸引玩家：逐漸困難的競爭級別和明確定義的敵人，必須在遊戲過程中的不同時刻攻擊和躲避。

遊戲場的中心是星堡，它被編程為不斷追踪玩家的飛船。星堡的周圍是三個同心能量環，每個能量環有十二個部分，它們既是星堡的防護邊界，也是玩家的積分來源。能量環內包含三個保護性地雷，它們會尋找玩家的船隻並在碰撞時摧毀它們。地雷的運動經過編程來模擬熱尋導彈的動作。

Star Castle 遊戲的目標是獲得盡可能多的分數。這是通過三個要素的組合來完成的：
a) 爆炸環段。
b) 炸毀星堡。
c) 避開星堡的地雷。當玩家的船隻被摧毀時，他的回合就結束了。每場比賽的船隻數量由運營商設定。

為了獲得最高得分，玩家需要射出能量環的各個部分，以便讓他有機會射中屏幕中央的星堡。隨著遊戲的進行，玩家必須牢記兩個事實：
1) 爆炸給定環中的所有部分將導致整個環重新出現 - 從而消除對中心星堡的潛在射擊。
2) 以讓你射中星堡的方式爆炸環也會讓星堡射中你。星堡的編程使其鼻子始終尋找玩家的飛船。如果球員有空位投籃機會，他就會投籃。

當星堡被玩家的導彈擊中時，它會首先內爆，然後與所有剩餘的環段一起爆炸。一秒延遲後，星堡將重新出現，並帶有全部三個環段。如果星堡射擊了玩家，他的回合就結束了。

遊戲開始時，星堡將出現在屏幕中央，周圍環繞著 3 個能量環。玩家的船出現在右側邊緣的大約一半處。通過使用控制按鈕向前、向右或向左移動，玩家可以使用發射按鈕在屏幕上進行操作來發射導彈。

通過摧毀能量環片段或星堡本身來得分。炸毀星堡可以獲得額外的船隻和積分。攻擊玩家的地雷不會給予任何分數。

玩家的飛船可以通過兩種方式被摧毀：與水雷碰撞或被星堡的魚雷擊中。地雷從環中發射並攻擊玩家大約十秒或直到被射擊。只有當玩家清楚地穿過所有 3 個環時，星堡的魚雷才會發射。此時玩家也可以向星堡出手了。隨著遊戲的進行，星堡和礦井都會變得更加智能和快速。

STAR CASTLE 的遊戲不以時間為單位。戰鬥持續進行，直到所有玩家的船隻被摧毀。遊戲的長度完全取決於玩家的技能。這是人與機器的古老挑戰。

ninjak.name: Ninja (網絡紅人)
ninjak.original_desc:
The Ninja Kids is a horizontally-scrolling hack 'n' slash beat-em-up for up to four players who must defeat a demented cult plotting to summon Satan. A karate sensei sends out his four ninja puppets to combat this looming threat. 

All four ninjas carry different weapons and have different fighting styles. As well as their weapons, each ninja also has a screen-filling magical attack based on one of four elements (earth, fire, wind and water).
ninjak.desc:
《忍者小子》是一款橫向捲軸砍殺格鬥遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家，他們必須擊敗密謀召喚撒旦的瘋狂邪教。空手道老師派出四個忍者木偶來對抗迫在眉睫的威脅。

四名忍者都攜帶不同的武器並具有不同的戰鬥風格。除了武器之外，每個忍者還擁有基於四種元素（土、火、風和水）之一的充滿屏幕的魔法攻擊。

mshvsfj.original_name: Marvel Super Heroes vs. Street Fighter
mshvsfj.name: 漫威超級英雄 vs 街頭霸王
mshvsfj.original_desc:
The second entry in the Marvel Vs. Capcom series, pitting fan favorites from Street Fighter and Marvel heroes against each other!
Spider-Man, Hulk, Captain America and more join the X-Men to team up with and against characters from Street Fighter, now able to use Cross-Over Assists!
mshvsfj.desc:
《漫威大戰》的第二部作品。Capcom 系列，讓粉絲喜愛的《街頭霸王》和漫威英雄相互對戰！
蜘蛛俠、綠巨人、美國隊長等加入 X 戰警，與《街頭霸王》中的角色組隊並對抗，現在可以使用交叉輔助！

dondokod.name: 碗在哪裡？
dondokod.original_desc: Don Doko Don is a platform game where you play a bearded dwarf with a mallet as your only weapon. Very abstract colors, talking trees, cute graphics and sounds. The object is to defeat all the enemies and advance to the next round which reveals more and different enemies.
dondokod.desc: Don Doko Don 是一款平台遊戲，您將扮演一個長著鬍鬚的矮人，並以木槌作為唯一武器。非常抽象的顏色、會說話的樹、可愛的圖形和聲音。目標是擊敗所有敵人並進入下一輪，下一輪會發現更多不同的敵人。

joust.name: 比武
joust.original_desc:
Joust is a platform-based action combat game for one or two-players (with the two-player game offering either team-up OR head-to-head combat; the first time arcade gamers were given this choice) in which each player controls a knight riding on the back of a flying ostrich. 

The object of the game is to progress through platform-based levels by defeating groups of buzzard-riding enemy knights. This is achieved by 'jousting'; both enemy and player knights carry a lance and must fly around the level (actioned by repeatedly hitting the 'Flap' button) trying to oust rival knights from their steeds by ramming them with the lance. This can only be achieved if the attacking rider is above the enemy knight when the lance connects. A collision of equal elevations results in the two knights bouncing off each other, but if a player is lower than their enemy at the instant of contact, they themselves will be knocked from their steed and lose a life. 

A defeated enemy will turn into an egg that falls to the bottom of the screen. This must be quickly collected by players as if the egg lands on a platform and isn't retrieved in time, it will eventually hatch into another enemy knight that must be defeated again. 

Joust features three different types of enemy knights - Bounder, Hunter, and Shadow Lord - with each earning players different points values when defeated. A pterodactyl will appear after a predetermined time to hunt the players. 

Accurately navigating the player Knights can be initially quite difficult as control is strongly affected by both gravity and inertia. Players can lose a life by either being knocked from their steed by an enemy knight, or by falling into the lava pit at the bottom of each level.
joust.desc:
Joust 是一款基於平台的動作格鬥遊戲，適合單人或兩人玩家（兩人遊戲提供組隊或面對面戰鬥；街機遊戲玩家第一次有這種選擇），其中每個玩家控制騎在飛行鴕鳥背上的騎士。

遊戲的目標是通過擊敗一群騎著禿鷹的敵方騎士，在基於平台的關卡中取得進展。這是通過“比武”來實現的；敵人和玩家的騎士都攜帶長矛，必須在關卡中飛行（通過反复點擊“拍打”按鈕來操作），試圖用長矛撞擊對手的騎士，將他們從他們的馬上趕走。只有當長矛連接時攻擊騎手位於敵方騎士上方時才能實現這一點。相同高度的碰撞會導致兩個騎士互相彈開，但如果玩家在接觸的瞬間低於敵人，他們自己就會被從馬上撞下來並失去生命。

被擊敗的敵人會變成一顆雞蛋，掉落到屏幕底部。玩家必須快速收集它，就好像雞蛋落在平台上並且不及時取回一樣，它最終會孵化成另一個必須再次擊敗的敵方騎士。

格鬥具有三種不同類型的敵方騎士 - 邊界騎士、獵人和暗影領主 - 每種騎士在被擊敗時都會為玩家帶來不同的積分值。在預定的時間後翼手龍就會出現來獵殺玩家。

準確地引導玩家騎士一開始可能相當困難，因為控制受到重力和慣性的強烈影響。玩家可能會因為被敵方騎士從馬上撞下，或者掉進每個關卡底部的熔岩坑而失去生命。

pacman.name: 吃豆人
pacman.original_desc: Export release by Bally/Midway for North America. Game developed by Namco and originally known as Puckman in Japan. For more information about the game itself, please see the original Japanese release entry, "Puckman [Upright model]".
pacman.desc: Bally/Midway 向北美出口。由 Namco 開發的遊戲，最初在日本稱為 Puckman。有關遊戲本身的更多信息，請參閱原始日本發行條目“Puckman [Upright model]”。

biomtoy.name: 生物力學玩具
biomtoy.original_desc:
Biomechanical Toy is an eightway-scrolling platform shoot-em-up set in a world of magically-animated toys, in which the magical pendulum that animates the toys has been stolen by the evil 'Scrubby', a criminal once imprisoned for trying to steal the pendulum who has managed to escape and take his revenge. The player takes on the role of Inguz and is tasked with freeing the few remaining good toys that are trapped throughout the stages, while destroying or avoiding the many evil toys that now patrol the kingdom. 

Inguz carries a basic, single-firing pistol, although additional ammo clips can be found throughout the game that upgrade the gun with either extra shot power, automatic firing or exploding bullets. When the gun's current ammo clip is empty, Inguz will take a moment to reload, leaving him vulnerable to attack. Freed toys will give help to Inguz by providing additional firepower for a short time.

Inguz begins each stage and each new life with a full health meter of eighty units, but food can be found that will replenish the meter. The player can lose a life either by running out of health, falling off the bottom of the screen (or into a hazard, such as a lava pit), or by running out of time. Clearing each stage awards bonus points based on both remaining time and health units.

Checkpoints - indicated by red flags - are located at certain points throughout the stages. In the event of losing a life, play restarts from the last checkpoint reached. Objects with Inguz's face on them (such as wooden chests and balloons) release bonus items when shot. 

An abstract, oriental-looking face occasionally forms part of a level's platform which, when shot, releases balloons which can in turn be shot for bonus items. A giant flying hat also occasionally appears and will drop bonus items when shot. Smart Bombs can also be found at certain points that, when run into by Inguz, will damage or destroy all enemy toys on screen.
biomtoy.desc:
《Biomechanical Toy》是一款八向滾動平台射擊遊戲，背景設定在魔法動畫玩具的世界中，其中驅動玩具動畫的魔法鐘擺被邪惡的“Scrubby”偷走了，他是一名罪犯，曾因試圖竊取鐘擺而入獄，但後來成功逃脫並進行了報復。玩家扮演印古茲（Inguz）的角色，並負責釋放被困在各個階段中的少數剩餘好玩具，同時摧毀或避開現在在王國巡邏的許多邪惡玩具。

因古茲攜帶一把基本的單發手槍，儘管在整個遊戲中都可以找到額外的彈藥夾，可以用額外的射擊威力、自動射擊或爆炸子彈來升級槍支。當槍的當前彈藥夾已空時，因古茲將需要一段時間重新裝彈，這使他很容易受到攻擊。釋放的玩具將通過在短時間內提供額外的火力來幫助印古茲。

因古茲在每個階段和每個新生命開始時都會有八十個單位的完整生命值，但可以找到食物來補充生命值。玩家可能會因生命值耗盡、從屏幕底部跌落（或陷入危險，如熔岩坑）或時間耗盡而失去生命。清除每個階段會根據剩餘時間和生命值單位獎勵獎勵積分。

檢查站（以紅旗表示）位於整個階段的某些地點。如果失去生命，比賽將從最後到達的檢查點重新開始。帶有印古茲頭像的物體（例如木箱和氣球）在被射擊時會釋放獎勵物品。

一張抽象的東方面孔偶爾會成為關卡平台的一部分，當該平台被射擊時，會釋放氣球，而氣球又可以被射擊以獲得獎勵物品。巨大的飛帽偶爾也會出現，射擊時會掉落獎勵物品。智能炸彈也可以在某些地方找到，當被印古茲遇到時，會損壞或摧毀屏幕上的所有敵方玩具。

bubsympu.name: 泡泡交響曲
bubsympu.original_desc:
Bubble Bobble II, also known as Bubble Symphony, is the first direct sequel to Taito's 1986 platform classic, "Bubble Bobble" ('Rainbow Islands' was the first official sequel, but played very differently) in which one or two players take on the role of the infamous bubble-blowing dinosaurs who must once again fight their way through a large number of single-screen platform-based levels, trapping monsters with their bubbles before bursting them to destroy the trapped enemies. 

While the game plays identically to its predecessor, several new changes and additions have been made to breathe new life into the classic gameplay. As well as new bonuses, weapons, enemies and characters, players can now create 'Multiple Bubbles'; if the player holds the button down for a few seconds before releasing, up to three bubbles are produced at once.
bubsympu.desc:
《泡泡龍 II》也稱為《泡泡交響曲》，是 Taito 1986 年平台經典遊戲《泡泡龍》的第一部直接續作（《彩虹島》是第一部官方續作，但玩法非常不同），其中一兩個玩家扮演臭名昭著的吹泡泡恐龍的角色，他們必須再次在大量單屏平台關卡中奮力殺出一條血路，用泡泡困住怪物，然後爆破它們以消滅被困的怪物。敵人。

雖然該遊戲的玩法與其前身相同，但進行了一些新的更改和添加，為經典遊戲玩法注入了新的活力。除了新的獎勵、武器、敵人和角色外，玩家現在還可以創建“多個氣泡”；如果玩家按住按鈕幾秒鐘然後鬆開，則一次最多會產生三個氣泡。

cbuster.name: 原油剋星
cbuster.original_desc:
Crude Buster © 1990 Data East.

In the near future, ruthless gangs are the new rulers of the streets. Only a brave duo of seasoned street brawlers can end this terror and return peace to the streets. Don't forget to grab and use anything you can find as a weapon (pipes, stones, signs, cars, even enemies!) to survive this onslaught. Features solid graphics & sound and very fun gameplay mechanics!
cbuster.desc:
原油剋星 © 1990年數據東方。

在不久的將來，殘酷的幫派將成為街道的新統治者。只有經驗豐富的街頭鬥毆者的勇敢二人組才能結束這種恐怖，讓街道恢復和平。不要忘記抓住並使用任何你能找到的東西作為武器（管道、石頭、標誌、汽車，甚至敵人！）來在這場猛攻中生存下來。具有紮實的圖形和聲音以及非常有趣的遊戲機制！

jailbrek.name: 越獄
jailbrek.original_desc:
A mass prison breakout has occurred and the prison warden has been kidnapped in this sideways scrolling shoot-em-up from Konami. The player controls a lonely police officer whose job it is to kill the hordes of escaped convicts and, eventually, rescue the kidnapped warden. Each level also has a number of civilian hostages that also roam the levels and need to be rescued.

The player begins the game with only a pistol, but 2 extra weapons, in the form of a bazooka and a tear gas gun, can be collected. The 'Weapon Select' button cycles through the player's weapons via a display at the bottom of the screen. When the desired weapon is highlighted, pressing the Fire button will select and fire the desired weapon.

Hostages will randomly run across the screen and can be rescued by running into them. Should the player accidentally shoot a hostage, all extra weapons will be lost leaving only the pistol.
jailbrek.desc:
在這款 Konami 推出的橫版捲軸射擊遊戲中，發生了大規模越獄事件，典獄長被綁架。玩家控制一名孤獨的警察，他的任務是殺死成群的逃犯，並最終營救被綁架的典獄長。每個關卡還有許多平民人質，他們也在關卡中徘徊並需要營救。

玩家開始遊戲時只攜帶一把手槍，但可以收集 2 種額外的武器，即火箭筒和催淚瓦斯槍。“武器選擇”按鈕通過屏幕底部的顯示屏循環選擇玩家的武器。當所需的武器突出顯示時，按“開火”按鈕將選擇並開火所需的武器。

人質會隨機跑過屏幕，遇到他們就可以獲救。如果玩家不小心射殺了人質，所有額外的武器都會丟失，只剩下手槍。

tumblep.name: 翻滾流行
tumblep.original_desc:
Tumble Pop is a platform game for one or two players in which the aim is to clear each level of enemies by sucking them into - then ejecting them from - a portable vacuum-cleaner. 

Holding down the fire button sucks the enemies into the cleaner, releasing the button causes them to be expelled back out. Ejected enemies act as projectiles that can damage and kill any other on-screen enemies that they collide with. All enemies must be killed before players can progress to the next stage. 

Throughout the game, letters of the alphabet randomly appear in bubbles. These can be collected to eventually spell the word "TUMBLEPOP". Once this has been achieved players are transported to a time-limited bonus level, giving them the opportunity to earn bonus points and extra lives.
tumblep.desc:
Tumble Pop 是一款適合一到兩名玩家的平台遊戲，其目的是通過將敵人吸入便攜式吸塵器，然後將其彈出來清除各個級別的敵人。

按住開火按鈕會將敵人吸進清潔器中，鬆開按鈕會使他們被驅逐出去。被彈出的敵人會像射彈一樣傷害並殺死屏幕上與其碰撞的任何其他敵人。玩家必須殺死所有敵人才能進入下一階段。

在整個遊戲中，字母表中的字母隨機出現在氣泡中。收集這些可以最終拼寫出“TUMBLEPOP”這個詞。一旦實現這一點，玩家就會被傳送到一個有時間限制的獎勵級別，讓他們有機會獲得獎勵積分和額外的生命。

rtype2.name: R-Type II
rtype2.original_desc:
The sequel to the hugely successful original finds the evil Bydo Empire once again intent on the destruction of all mankind in this sideways scrolling, six-level shoot-em-up.

The innovative weapons system of the original game - the 'Beam Weapon' and 'Force Pod' - make a welcome return and remain unchanged for the sequel.

The tight, demanding gameplay and high emphasis on correct usage of the weapons system also return - although the sequel is, if anything, even more demanding than its already unforgiving predecessor; with more durable enemies and trickier level design. 

R?Type II features three new weapon shot types: 
Green - Search Laser - fires semi-homing lasers that can bend at 45Â° angles. 
Grey - Shotgun Laser - fires large shells that travel a short distance before exploding powerfully. 
Scatter Bomb - drops bombs to the ground; when these explode, the explosion scatters forwards along the ground. This is a supporting weapon that can be equipped instead of missiles.

In addition to the new weapons, R-type II's Beam Weapon has received an upgrade. As with the first game, holding down the fire button makes a power gauge fill up, releases the button then unleashes a powerful plasma shot. For the sequel, however, continuing to hold down the button causes the gauge to charge up further. This 'double-charged' gauge flashes blue and red and releases an even more powerful plasma burst.
rtype2.desc:
在這款獲得巨大成功的原作的續作中，邪惡的拜多帝國再次意圖毀滅全人類，這是一款橫向捲軸、六關射擊遊戲。

原版遊戲的創新武器系統——“光束武器”和“原力艙”——迎來了回歸，並在續作中保持不變。

緊張、高要求的遊戲玩法以及對武器系統正確使用的高度重視也回歸了——儘管續集比其已經無情的前作要求更高。具有更持久的敵人和更棘手的關卡設計。

R?Type II 具有三種新的武器射擊類型：
綠色 - 搜索激光 - 發射可彎曲 45° 角的半尋的激光。
灰色 - 霰彈槍激光 - 發射大型砲彈，在猛烈爆炸之前移動一小段距離。
分散炸彈 - 將炸彈投擲到地面；當它們爆炸時，爆炸會沿著地面向前擴散。這是可以代替導彈裝備的輔助武器。

除了新武器之外，R-type II 的光束武器也得到了升級。與第一款遊戲一樣，按住開火按鈕會使能量計充滿，釋放按鈕然後釋放強大的等離子射擊。然而，在續作中，繼續按住按鈕會導致儀表進一步充電。這種“雙重充電”儀表會閃爍藍色和紅色，並釋放出更強大的等離子爆發。

cawingu.name: 航母航空聯隊
cawingu.original_desc:
Carrier Air Wing / U.S. Navy is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up for one or two players set in the 1990s, a decade of great change marked by growing friendships between old enemies and never before seen levels of co-operation between powerful nations of the world. However, in 1997, using new weapons designed in secrecy, the Middle Eastern country of 'Rabu' threatens to destroy this new and fragile peace. 

Players chose to pilot any one of three different jet fighters and must battle their way through ten enemy-packed stages. Each fighter has a fuel bar which is full at the start of each stage but gradually decreases, additional fuel is lost each time the fighter takes damage from an enemy.
cawingu.desc:
《Carrier Air Wing / U.S. Navy》是一款適合一到兩名玩家的橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，背景設定在 20 世紀 90 年代，這是一個發生了巨大變化的十年，其標誌是宿敵之間的友誼日益加深，以及世界強國之間前所未有的合作水平。然而，1997年，中東國家“拉布”使用秘密設計的新武器威脅要破壞這一新的脆弱和平。

玩家可以選擇駕駛三種不同的噴氣式戰鬥機中的任何一種，並且必須在十個充滿敵人的關卡中殺出一條血路。每個戰鬥機都有一個燃料棒，在每個階段開始時都是滿的，但逐漸減少，每次戰鬥機受到敵人傷害時都會損失額外的燃料。

shaolins.name: 踢球者
shaolins.original_desc: Kung-fu player jumps around multiple level boards, kicking opponents and collecting power-ups and bonus items. Player defeats by way of three kicks the board "boss" and advances to the next level.
shaolins.desc: 功夫玩家在多個關卡中跳躍，踢對手並收集能量提升和獎勵物品。玩家通過三踢棋盤“老大”的方式擊敗並晉級到下一個級別。

flicky.name: 輕快
flicky.original_desc:
Flicky is a side-scrolling platform game in which the player controls 'Flicky', a flightless bird who must collect her lost chicks - called 'chirps' - and guide them safely to the exit, represented as a door with Flicky's name shown above it. 

Flicky must watch out for the house cats that emerge from cat-flaps and start roam the levels, as any contact with a cat results in the loss of a life. Any chicks that are touched by a cat will be separated from Flicky and must again be retrieved.
flicky.desc:
Flicky 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，玩家控制“Flicky”，一隻不會飛的小鳥，它必須收集丟失的小雞（稱為“chirps”），並引導它們安全到達出口，出口代表一扇門，上面顯示了 Flicky 的名字。

Flicky 必須留意從貓瓣中出現並開始在樓層中漫遊的家貓，因為與貓的任何接觸都會導致生命損失。任何被貓碰觸的小雞都會與 Flicky 分開，並且必須再次被找回。

rushatck.name: 綠色貝雷帽
rushatck.original_desc:
Depending on which title you use, and how you interpret it, this game is about a guy who a)rushes in before attacking b)attacks Russians (this was the mid-80s, when the US helped bin Laden do the same), or c)wears a rather goofy hat. One way or another, this arcade conversion arms you with a knife and sends you on a kamikaze mission against hordes of enemy fighters.

There are four distinct sections of gameplay, taking in a Missile Base, a Harbour, a Bridge, and an enemy Prison Camp. Extra weapons with limited ammunition can be collected along the way, which will make the task a lot easier. The level is divided into 3 horizontal levels, which can be moved between either by jumping or using ladders, and this gives a chance to avoid the more threatening mobs of enemy fighters
rushatck.desc:
根據你使用的標題以及你如何解釋它，這個遊戲是關於一個人a）在攻擊之前衝進去b）攻擊俄羅斯人（這是80年代中期，當時美國幫助本拉登做同樣的事情），或者c）戴著一頂相當愚蠢的帽子。無論如何，這款街機轉換遊戲會為你配備一把刀，並派你執行神風特攻隊任務，對抗成群的敵方戰士。

遊戲有四個不同的部分，包括導彈基地、港口、橋樑和敵人的監獄營地。沿途可以收集彈藥有限的額外武器，這將使任務變得更加容易。該關卡分為 3 個水平關卡，可以通過跳躍或使用梯子在各個關卡之間移動，這樣就有機會避開更具威脅性的敵方戰士。

galaga88.name: 顯示的是88年
galaga88.original_desc:
Galaga '88 is an updated version of the old favorite, "Galaga", with more invaders and more player firepower. Galaga '88 gives players a chance to once again repel the invaders from the Galagan Kingdom. One or two players can try their hand at fighting the invaders. This time the Galagans have four more allies, each with unique weapons and defenses that a player must overcome. 

By destroying special enemies or obstacles the player can get 'items'. When a player has two items, they can warp to another dimension to confront more Galagan ships with new strategies. In the Challenging Stages (labelled in this game as 'That's Galactic Dancin'), the player shoots down as many invaders as possible as the Galagans dance to a waltz, tango, march or jazz tune. 

The player selects single or dual ship power. The objective is to destroy all the Galagan foes in each of the 29 sectors of the galaxy, with each sector more difficult than the last. 

Unique Features: 
More opponents. In addition to Boss, Goei and Zako, the original Galagan crew, Don, Nin, Ban, and Gan have been added. Each of the Galagans has a unique way of challenging the players. 
Different types of ships. Players can choose single or dual ships (if the game option is set for dual and single). When the player retrieves a dual ship from the Boss's tractor beam, it turns into a triple ship with ten times the power of a single ship. 
Challenging Stages. In the 'That's Galactic Dancin' stages, the Galagan invaders dance to a waltz, tango, Sousa march or jazz tune, while the player shoots down Galagans to earn bonus points. 
Warping to a new dimension. By destroying particular enemies or obstacles and capturing two of their items, the player can warp to the next dimension. 
Player challenge. Each dimension has different mix of Galagans with different strategies to be overcome. 
Win back captured ships. The player can win back ships captured in the Boss Galaga's tractor beam. When the player destroys the Boss, the ships are released. If the player retrieves them, the ships become dual ships if they were single and triple if they were dual. 
High Score Mode. Upon completing a game, a player can enter his initials if they are among the top eight scorers on the game.
galaga88.desc:
Galaga '88 是舊款《Galaga》的更新版本，擁有更多的入侵者和更多的玩家火力。加拉加 '88 讓玩家有機會再次擊退加拉加王國的入侵者。一到兩名玩家可以嘗試與入侵者作戰。這次加拉加人又多了四個盟友，每個盟友都擁有玩家必須克服的獨特武器和防禦。

通過摧毀特殊的敵人或障礙，玩家可以獲得“物品”。當玩家擁有兩件物品時，他們可以扭曲到另一個維度，以新策略對抗更多加拉甘船隻。在挑戰階段（在遊戲中標記為“這就是銀河之舞”），玩家隨著加拉甘人隨著華爾茲、探戈、進行曲或爵士樂曲起舞，擊落盡可能多的入侵者。

玩家選擇單船或雙船動力。目標是消滅銀河系 29 個區域中的所有加拉甘敵人，每個區域都比上一個區域更加困難。

獨特的特點：
對手多了。除了 Boss、Goei 和 Zako 之外，還添加了原 Galagan 船員 Don、Nin、Ban 和 Gan。每個加拉加人都有獨特的方式來挑戰玩家。
不同類型的船舶。玩家可以選擇單船或雙船（如果遊戲選項設置為雙船和單船）。當玩家從 Boss 的牽引光束中取回一艘雙船時，它會變成一艘三船，其威力是單船的十倍。
具有挑戰性的階段。在“這就是銀河之舞”階段，加拉甘入侵者隨著華爾茲、探戈、蘇薩進行曲或爵士樂曲起舞，而玩家則擊落加拉甘人以獲得獎勵積分。
扭曲到一個新的維度。通過摧毀特定的敵人或障礙物並捕獲其中的兩個物品，玩家可以扭曲到下一個維度。
玩家挑戰。每個維度都有不同的加拉加人組合，需要克服不同的策略。
贏回被俘獲的船隻。玩家可以贏回被 Boss Galaga 的牽引光束捕獲的船隻。當玩家消滅 Boss 後，船隻就會被釋放。如果玩家取回它們，如果是單船，則船變成雙船；如果是雙船，則船變成三船。
高分模式。完成遊戲後，如果玩家是遊戲得分前八名的玩家，則可以輸入自己的姓名首字母。

boogwing.name: 布吉之翼
boogwing.original_desc:
A superbly playable, humourous and utterly unique shoot-em-up from the Date East stable. The player begins each life in control of a bi-plane with a huge metal hook attached to its rear. This hook can be used to pick up enemies, objects, bombs and vehicles which can then be thrown both at other enemies, and at any walls and doorways that may be barring the player's route.

If the bi-plane takes two hits from enemy forces, it will explode and the player is forced to continue on foot. The on-foot sections play in a vaguely similar fashion to SNK's legendary "Metal Slug" series, but while on foot, the player has no protection from enemy hits and is very vulnerable to attack. As such, a replacement vehicle (which appear in the form of tanks, motorbikes, giant robots, elephants etc.) must be found quickly.

Boogie Wings features highly detailed and completely destructible scenery, with a multitude of background animations making the game feel 'alive' and giving it much of its distinctive character. The game's settings are as original as its gameplay; with museums, fairgrounds, the inside of skyscrapers etc. all making an appearance. Boogie Wings soundtrack is also unique to the genre, with a mixture of well-known jazz and blues tunes accompanying the frenetic on-screen action.
boogwing.desc:
來自 Date East 的一款可玩性極佳、幽默且完全獨特的射擊遊戲。玩家在開始每個生活時都控制著一架雙翼飛機，其後部附有一個巨大的金屬鉤。該鉤子可用於拾取敵人、物體、炸彈和車輛，然後將其扔向其他敵人以及可能阻礙玩家路線的任何牆壁和門口。

如果雙翼飛機受到敵軍兩次攻擊，它就會爆炸，玩家被迫繼續步行。徒步部分的玩法與 SNK 傳奇的《合金彈頭》系列有些相似，但徒步時，玩家無法抵禦敵人的攻擊，並且很容易受到攻擊。因此，必須盡快找到替代車輛（以坦克、摩托車、巨型機器人、大像等形式出現）。

《Boogie Wings》具有高度詳細且完全可破壞的場景，大量的背景動畫使遊戲感覺“充滿活力”，並賦予其許多獨特的特徵。遊戲的設定和遊戲玩法一樣原創；博物館、露天市場、摩天大樓的內部等等都會出現。《Boogie Wings》的配樂在這一類型中也是獨一無二的，混合了著名的爵士樂和布魯斯音樂，伴隨著屏幕上的瘋狂動作。

gunbird2.name: 槍鳥2
gunbird2.original_desc:
Seven warriors are challenged to head on a quest to find three powerful elements of Sun, Moon and Stars. Whoever brings the elements to the Potion God will be rewarded the legendary Almighty Potion and all its magical powers.

There are seven stages in each game loop (two loops total). The first three stages are randomly chosen from possible four. At the second loop, enemies fire denser bullet patterns moving at faster speeds. Stage 2-1 takes place at the only stage not available in 1st loop, instead of the 1-1 counterpart. After completing the first loop with only one player, player can choose one of two choices for a wish with magic potion, with unique ending for each choice. If 1st loop is completed with two players, a combination-specific ending is played.
gunbird2.desc:
七名戰士面臨著尋找太陽、月亮和星星三種強大元素的挑戰。誰將元素帶給藥水之神，誰就將獲得傳說中的全能藥水及其所有神奇力量的獎勵。

每個遊戲循環有七個階段（總共兩個循環）。前三個階段是從可能的四個階段中隨機選擇的。在第二個循環中，敵人會以更快的速度發射更密集的子彈圖案。階段 2-1 發生在第一個循環中唯一不可用的階段，而不是 1-1 階段。在只有一個玩家完成第一個循環後，玩家可以從兩個選項中選擇一個來實現帶有魔法藥水的願望，每個選擇都有獨特的結局。如果第一個循環由兩名玩家完成，則會播放特定於組合的結局。

mario.name: 超級瑪利歐兄弟 驚奇
mario.original_desc:
Mario Bros. is a superb, single-screen platform game in which the legendary "Mario Bros.", Mario and Luigi, must try to rid each level of a number of pests that have infested the waterworks: Shellcreepers (turtles), Sidesteppers (crabs that need to be hit twice) and Fighterflies (flies that can only be attacked when they touch a platform).

Players can jump upwards to hit the platform above them, which will 'flip' any enemies on the above platform onto their backs. The prone enemies can then be kicked into the water to remove them. A 'POW' button also appears on a number of screen; this can be 'butted' by a player, causing all on-screen enemies to flip onto their backs; as well as destroying any enemy fireballs that may be around. Each POW can only be used a maximum of three times. 

As well as the game's enemies, players are also hampered by the huge amount of inertia that comes into play when controlling Mario or Luigi. This is due to the low degree of traction that exists between the Mario brothers and the platforms. On later phases, ice appears on the platforms reducing the amount of traction even further. As the game progresses, water droplets hang below the platforms and freeze into deadly icicles, which will eventually break off and fall.
mario.desc:
《馬里奧兄弟》是一款出色的單屏平台遊戲，其中傳奇的“馬里奧兄弟”馬里奧和路易吉必須嘗試消滅每個關卡中大量出沒水廠的害蟲：貝殼爬行者（海龜）、側步者（需要擊中兩次的螃蟹）和戰鬥機（只有在接觸平台時才會受到攻擊的蒼蠅）。

玩家可以向上跳躍，擊中上方的平台，這會將上方平台上的所有敵人“翻轉”到他們的背上。然後可以將俯臥的敵人踢入水中以將其移走。許多屏幕上還出現“POW”按鈕；這可以被玩家“對接”，導致屏幕上的所有敵人翻轉到背上；以及摧毀周圍可能存在的任何敵人火球。每個 POW 最多只能使用 3 次。

除了遊戲中的敵人之外，玩家在控制馬里奧或路易吉時也會受到巨大慣性的阻礙。這是由於馬里奧兄弟和平台之間的吸引力較低。在後期階段，平台上出現冰，進一步減少牽引力。隨著遊戲的進行，水滴會懸掛在平台下方並凍結成致命的冰柱，最終會脫落並掉落。

dkongo.name: 大金剛
dkongo.original_desc:
EVERYONE'S GOING APE OVER DONKEY KONG!

"HELP! HELP!" cries the beautiful maiden as she is dragged up a labyrinth of structural beams by the ominous Donkey Kong. "SNORT. SNORT" Foreboding music warns of the eventual doom that awaits the poor girl, lest she somehow be miraculously rescued. "But, wait! Fear not, fair maiden. Little Mario, the carpenter, is in hot pursuit of you this very moment"

Throwing fate to the wind, risking life and limb, or worse, little Mario tries desperately to climb the mighty fortress of steel, to save the lovely lady from the evil Mr. Kong. Little Mario must dodge all manner of obstacles - fireballs, plummeting beams and a barrage of exploding barrels fired at him by Donkey Kong.

Amidst me beautiful girl's constant pleas for help, your challenge is to maneuver little Mario up the steel structure, while helping him to avoid the rapid-fire succession of hazards that come his way.

As little Mario gallantly battles his way up the barriers, he is taunted and teased by Donkey Kong, who brazenly struts back and forth, beating his chest in joyful exuberance at the prospect of having the beautiful girl all to himself. It is your job to get little Mario to the top. For it is there, and only there, that he can send the mighty Donkey Kong to hit mortal doom. Leaving little Mario and the beautiful girl to live happily ever after. "SIGH. SIGH.”

So, if you want the most exciting, most fun-filled, most talked about family video game on the market, don't monkey around with anything but the original Donkey Kong.
dkongo.desc:
每個人都在模仿大金剛！

“救命！救命！”當美麗的少女被不祥的大金剛拖上迷宮般的結構梁時，她哭了起來。“哼哼。哼哼” 不祥的音樂警告著這個可憐的女孩最終的厄運，以免她以某種方式奇蹟般地獲救。“但是，等等！不要害怕，美麗的少女。木匠小馬里奧此刻正緊追不捨”

小馬里奧將命運拋在了風中，冒著生命危險，或者更糟的是，小馬里奧拼命地試圖爬上強大的鋼鐵堡壘，從邪惡的孔先生手中拯救可愛的女士。小馬里奧必須躲避各種障礙——火球、垂直落下的光束以及大金剛向他發射的一連串爆炸的木桶。

在我美麗的女孩不斷請求幫助的情況下，你的挑戰是操縱小馬里奧爬上鋼結構，同時幫助他避免他遇到的一系列快速危險。

當小馬里奧英勇地衝過柵欄時，他遭到了大金剛的奚落和戲弄，而大金剛則厚顏無恥地來回走動，一想到自己能擁有這個美麗的女孩，就興奮地拍著胸口。你的任務就是讓小馬里奧登上頂峰。因為只有在那裡，他才能派遣強大的大金剛去毀滅人類。留下小馬里奧和美麗的女孩從此過上幸福的生活。“嘆息。嘆息。”

所以，如果你想要市場上最刺激、最有趣、最受關注的家庭視頻遊戲，除了原版《大金剛》之外，不要再玩其他遊戲了。

bankp.name: 銀行恐慌
bankp.original_desc: Bank Panic is a reaction-based shoot-em-up in which the player takes on the role of a gun-slinging Deputy, who has been charged with protecting the town bank from outlaws.
bankp.desc: 《銀行恐慌》是一款基於反應的射擊遊戲，玩家扮演一名持槍副手，負責保護城鎮銀行免受不法之徒的侵害。

shollow.name: 撒旦空洞
shollow.original_desc:
Satan's Hollow is a 1- or a 2-player game. When playing this game, the Rocket Launcher is under YOUR control. YOU make it move back and forth across the screen to launch Rockets that will eliminate your attackers. These attackers are displayed in groups, called 'racks', across the top of the screen. The first rack is made up of a small number of attackers. The second rack is made up of a larger number of these attackers. And intermixed with the racks of attackers is a rack with only a single fire-breathing Devil's head. 

The attackers and the Devil's Head will try to wipe out your Rocket Launcher. If they do, you lose one player. In emergencies, you have a Shield which goes all around your Rocket Launcher for a short period of time. It is activated by pushing the Shield button on the control console. BUT BE CAREFUL!! This consumes a lot of power and will only last a VERY SHORT TIME! 

Each attacker eliminated will cause a Bridge Section to appear at the lower left corner of the screen EXCEPT: when there is already a Bridge Section there or when you have a Bridge Section in tow under your Rocket Launcher. Pick these Sections up with your Rocket Launcher and move them over to build a Bridge across the gorge at the right side of the screen leading into the land of SATAN. 

When you complete your Bridge into the land of SATAN, you can cross it and do battle with him. If you win you will be rewarded by increased fire power for your Rocket Launcher. If SATAN defeats you, you lose one player. 

As your skill level increases, the number of attackers is increased and the speed that the fire-breathing Devil's Head moves is increased also. 

Bonus Rocket Launchers are awarded to you periodically throughout the game as you reach or pass certain preselected point values. Each attacker has an assigned point value. 

The object of the game is to HAVE FUN while constantly improving your skills as you play, eliminating as many attackers as possible each time to get the highest score.
shollow.desc:
《Satan's Hollow》是一款 1 人或 2 人遊戲。玩這個遊戲時，火箭發射器由您控制。你讓它在屏幕上來回移動來發射火箭，消滅你的攻擊者。這些攻擊者成組顯示，稱為“機架”，顯示在屏幕頂部。第一個機架由少數攻擊者組成。第二個機架由大量此類攻擊者組成。與攻擊者的架子混合在一起的是一個只有一個噴火惡魔頭顱的架子。

攻擊者和魔鬼頭將試圖消滅你的火箭發射器。如果他們這樣做，你就會失去一名球員。在緊急情況下，您有一個護盾可以在短時間內包圍您的火箭發射器。通過按下控制台上的 Shield 按鈕即可激活它。但要小心！這會消耗大量電力，並且只能持續很短的時間！

每個被消滅的攻擊者都會導致橋段出現在屏幕的左下角，除非：當那裡已經有橋段或當您的火箭發射器下方有橋段時。用你的火箭發射器拾取這些部分，然後將它們移過去，在屏幕右側的峽谷上建造一座橋樑，通向撒旦之地。

當你完成通向撒旦之地的橋樑後，你就可以穿過它並與他作戰。如果您獲勝，您將獲得火箭發射器火力增強的獎勵。如果 SATAN 擊敗了你，你就會失去一名玩家。

隨著技能等級的提高，攻擊者的數量會增加，噴火惡魔頭移動的速度也會增加。

當您達到或超過某些預先選定的分值時，在整個遊戲過程中會定期向您獎勵火箭發射器獎勵。每個攻擊者都有一個指定的分值。

遊戲的目標是享受樂趣，同時不斷提高你的技能，每次消滅盡可能多的攻擊者以獲得最高分。

circusc.name: 查理馬戲團
circusc.original_desc:
Circus Charlie is a single-player abstract platform game in which the player must guide the eponymous Charlie through six different circus events. Bonus points can be won by finishing a level as quickly as possible, with further points awarded for collecting any of the money bags that occasionally appear.

Finally, additional bonus points are awarded for completing a level without losing a life. The game is over when all Circus Charlies are lost.

The six different events are:
Ride a lion and jump through fiery hoops and over blazing pots. 
Jump over monkeys while walking a tightrope. 
Bounce on trampolines, avoid fire breathers and sword jugglers. 
Jump on giant, rolling beach balls. 
Ride a horse while avoiding obstacles. 
Trapeze.
circusc.desc:
《查理馬戲團》是一款單人抽象平台遊戲，玩家必須引導同名查理經歷六個不同的馬戲團事件。盡快完成關卡即可贏得獎勵積分，收集偶爾出現的錢袋還可獲得額外積分。

最後，在不失去生命的情況下完成關卡將獲得額外的獎勵積分。當所有馬戲團查理都失敗時，遊戲結束。

這六個不同的事件是：
騎著獅子，跳過火圈，跳過燃燒的鍋。
走鋼絲時跳過猴子。
在蹦床上彈跳，避開噴火者和劍術雜耍者。
跳上巨大的滾動沙灘球。
騎馬的同時避開障礙物。
空中飛人。

vsavu.original_name: Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire
vsavu.name: 吸血鬼救世主：吸血鬼之主
vsavu.original_desc: Jedah, one of the ancient Three Lords of Darkrealm has returned. You play as one of fifteen Darkstalkers. Beat Jedah and take your throne as the Lord of the Darkness.
vsavu.desc: 遠古黑暗領域三領主之一吉達已歸來。你扮演十五名暗黑行者之一。擊敗吉達並奪取黑暗之王的王位。

chasehq.name: 大通總部
chasehq.original_desc:
"Chase H.Q." is a checkpoint-based racing game in which the player takes on the role on an undercover cop called Tony Gibson in this 'Miami Vice' inspired game from Taito. Gibson drives a powerful unmarked police car (resembling a Porsche 911) along with his partner, 'Raymond Broady' and must chase down and apprehend various criminals.

The player has between fifty-five and seventy seconds (depending on the game's 'Dip' settings) to catch up with the fleeing criminal, then the same time period again to repeatedly ram into the criminal's car until it is too damaged to drive. The criminal's car is constantly moving away, so if the player repeatedly crashes or drives too slowly, the criminal will escape and the game ends.
chasehq.desc:
“大通總部。”是一款基於檢查站的賽車遊戲，玩家在這款來自 Taito 的《邁阿密風雲》靈感遊戲中扮演一位名叫托尼·吉布森的便衣警察。吉布森和他的搭檔“雷蒙德·布羅迪”駕駛一輛強大的無標記警車（類似於保時捷 911），必須追捕並逮捕各種罪犯。

玩家有五十五到七十秒的時間（取決於遊戲的“Dip”設置）來追上逃跑的罪犯，然後在同一時間段內反复撞擊罪犯的汽車，直到其損壞嚴重而無法駕駛。罪犯的汽車不斷地遠離，所以如果玩家反复撞車或開得太慢，罪犯就會逃跑，遊戲就會結束。

outrunb.name: 外跑
outrunb.original_desc:
Out Run is a ground-breaking racing game in which the player drives a red Ferrari Testarossa through a number of colourful European locations, trying to reach each end-of-level checkpoint before the tight time limit expires.

Each of the game's stages is packed with civilian traffic that must be carefully avoided, as players try to negotiate the game's twisting, hilly roads. 

At the end of every stage players are presented with a fork in the road, allowing them to chose which route they wish to take next. This was not the first time this feature had appeared (Tatsumi's 1983 racer, TX-1, was the first to introduce forked roads).

As well as being able to choose routes, players could also - via the game's "in-car radio" - choose one of three different catchy tunes to listen to while driving. The songs are 'Magical Sound Shower', 'Passing Breeze' and 'Splash Wave'.
outrunb.desc:
Out Run 是一款開創性的賽車遊戲，玩家駕駛一輛紅色法拉利 Testarossa 穿過歐洲多個色彩繽紛的地點，試圖在嚴格的時間限制內到達每個關卡結束檢查站。

遊戲的每個階段都擠滿了平民交通，玩家必須小心避開，因為玩家試圖通過遊戲中蜿蜒的山路。

在每個階段結束時，玩家都會遇到一個岔路口，讓他們選擇下一步要走的路線。這並不是該功能第一次出現（Tatsumi 1983 年的賽車 TX-1 是第一個引入叉路的賽車）。

除了能夠選擇路線之外，玩家還可以通過遊戲的“車載收音機”選擇三種不同的朗朗上口的音樂之一在駕駛時收聽。這些歌曲是《Magical Sound Shower》、《Passing Breeze》和《Splash Wave》。

elevator.name: 電梯動作
elevator.original_desc: Agent 17 (code name 'Otto') is to secure the top secret documents from the security building. The enemy spies are in pursuit and their orders are to stop him at any cost. Having made it to the top of a 30 story building, Agent 17 has to make his way down to the basement to get to the getaway car and save the documents. Enemy spies are everywhere and the documents are hidden behind the red doors (bonus points awarded). He has to open the door and keep moving. If either of them shoots the lights out there will be a temporary blackout. If Otto finds himself on top of the elevator the player will not be able to control the elevator. If he gets caught in the elevator he is a sitting duck and cannot duck the bullets. By using the escalator he can reach the basement quicker. Otto can defeat his enemy by jump kicking or firing at them. Help Otto to grab all the documents and escape the spies.
elevator.desc: 17 號特工（代號“奧托”）負責保護安全大樓內的絕密文件。敵方間諜正在追擊，他們的命令是不惜一切代價阻止他。到達一棟 30 層建築的頂層後，17 號特工必須下到地下室才能找到逃跑的汽車並保存文件。敵方間諜無處不在，文件隱藏在紅門後面（獎勵積分）。他必須打開門並繼續前進。如果他們中的任何一個把燈射滅，就會出現暫時的停電。如果奧托發現自己在電梯頂部，玩家將無法控制電梯。如果他在電梯裡被夾住，他就成了靶子，無法躲避子彈。通過使用自動扶梯，他可以更快地到達地下室。奧托可以通過跳踢或射擊來擊敗敵人。幫助奧托奪取所有文件並逃脫間諜的追捕。

lethalth.name: 致命雷霆
lethalth.original_desc:
A simple shoot-em-up with multiple endings based on your performance in each level. Your guns build up power and get stronger as you tap the fire button rapidly, but the power gauge will drain if you stop tapping the button. 

After charging up enough power, you can press the bomb button for a smart bomb attack which uses up the whole power gauge. With more power it creates a bigger explosion. 

Power-ups switch your weapon to fire different projectiles, like lasers that spread out at right angles, and a flamethrower that reaches farther with more power.
lethalth.desc:
一款簡單的射擊遊戲，根據您在每個關卡中的表現，有多個結局。當你快速點擊開火按鈕時，你的槍會增加力量並變得更強，但如果你停止點擊按鈕，力量表就會耗盡。

充滿電量後，您可以按下炸彈按鈕進行智能炸彈攻擊，該攻擊會耗盡整個電量表。力量越大，它就會產生更大的爆炸。

能量提升可以切換你的武器來發射不同的射彈，比如以直角擴散的激光，以及威力更大、射程更遠的火焰噴射器。

nemo.name: 尼莫
nemo.original_desc:
One night, as Nemo sleeps, he is visited in a dream by the King of Slumberland, who invites Nemo to come and play with the King's daughter, the Princess. Nemo finds himself unable to find the Princess however, so he and 'Flip', a strange companion who also turns up in the dream, decide to explore Slumberland and find the king.

Nemo is a colourful and abstract platform shoot-em-up set in the dream world of Slumberland, a surreal world in which childrens' toys are running amok and must be destroyed. Nemo is armed with a magical staff that emits a burst of magic to destroy the many enemies, some of which require multiple hits. A number of power-ups also appear at regular intervals to aid Nemo in his quest through seven tough stages.
nemo.desc:
一天晚上，當尼莫熟睡時，夢鄉國王在夢中拜訪了他，並邀請尼莫來和國王的女兒公主一起玩耍。然而尼莫發現自己無法找到公主，因此他和同樣出現在夢中的奇怪夥伴“小翻”決定探索斯林百蘭並尋找國王。

《尼莫》是一款色彩繽紛、抽象的平台射擊遊戲，背景設定在夢鄉的夢幻世界中，這是一個超現實的世界，兒童玩具在其中橫行，必須予以摧毀。尼莫配備了一根魔法杖，可以發射魔法爆發來消滅許多敵人，其中一些敵人需要多次攻擊。許多能量提升也會定期出現，以幫助尼莫完成七個艱難階段的任務。

digdug.name: 你挖了
digdug.original_desc: Dig Dug is single screen action game in which the player must dig horizontal and vertical tunnels to reach and eliminate the underground-dwelling monsters living there. This is achieved by either inflating them with an air pump until they explode, or by dropping rocks onto them.
digdug.desc: Dig Dug 是一款單屏動作遊戲，玩家必須挖掘水平和垂直的隧道來到達並消滅居住在那裡的地下怪物。這是通過用氣泵給它們充氣直到爆炸，或者向它們扔石頭來實現的。

blswhstl.name: 花哨的東西
blswhstl.original_desc: The planet Meru is on the attack by the Iva forces. A plea for help has reached Twinbee and you must guide him through a perilous journey through a colorful world fighting to restore peace. This vertically scrolling shoot'em up game features colorful anime-style graphics, lots of power-ups and a fun challenge.
blswhstl.desc: 梅魯星球正遭受伊瓦軍隊的攻擊。Twinbee 收到了求助信，你必須引導他踏上一段危險的旅程，穿越這個多彩的世界，為恢復和平而奮鬥。這款垂直滾動射擊遊戲具有色彩繽紛的動漫風格圖形、大量的能力提升和有趣的挑戰。

mvsc.original_name: Marvel vs. Capcom : Clash of Super Heroes
mvsc.name: 漫威 vs. 卡普空：超級英雄的衝突
mvsc.original_desc: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes is the fifth Marvel Comics-licensed fighting game by Capcom and the third game in the Marvel vs. Capcom series. In contrast to X-Men vs. Street Fighter and Marvel Super Heroes vs. Street Fighter, the game features characters from numerous Capcom franchises such as Mega Man and Strider, rather than just Street Fighter characters. The game takes place within the Marvel comic continuity, as Professor Charles Xavier calls out for heroes to stop him before he merges with the consciousness of Magneto and becomes the being known as Onslaught, the final boss. The game was developed in late 1997 and first released in January 1998.
mvsc.desc: 《Marvel vs. Capcom：超級英雄之戰》是 Capcom 的第五款漫威漫畫授權格鬥遊戲，也是 Marvel vs. Capcom 系列的第三款遊戲。與《X 戰警 vs. 街頭霸王》和《漫威超級英雄 vs. 街頭霸王》相比，該遊戲的角色來自眾多 Capcom 特許經營遊戲，例如《洛克人》和《Strider》，而不僅僅是《街頭霸王》角色。遊戲發生在漫威漫畫的連續性中，查爾斯·澤維爾教授在他與萬磁王的意識融合併成為被稱為“猛攻”的最終boss之前呼喚英雄來阻止他。該遊戲於1997年底開發，並於1998年1月首次發布。

gunforc2.name: 槍砲部隊II
gunforc2.original_desc:
Gun Force II is a 2D side-scrolling science fiction themed run and gun game and sequel to GunForce. The game plays very similar to the later game Metal Slug.

The player controls a special soldier with two heavy guns that can jump an climb platforms.
