While playing the player encounters and has to kills or destroy various enemies including mutants, soldiers, vehicles and aliens. Additional weapons like flamethrowers and lasers can be picked up while playing. While making progress it is possible to mount vehicles, like mechs, motorbikes, tanks and flying crafts. Some music in this game is directly recycled (and remixed) from the earlier shoot 'em up game Air Duel, another Irem game.
gunforc2.desc:
《Gun Force II》是一款 2D 橫向捲軸科幻主題跑槍遊戲，也是《GunForce》的續作。該遊戲的玩法與後來的遊戲《合金彈頭》非常相似。

玩家控制一名擁有兩把重槍的特種士兵，可以跳躍攀登平台。在玩遊戲時，玩家會遇到並必須殺死或摧毀各種敵人，包括變種人、士兵、車輛和外星人。玩遊戲時可以拾取火焰噴射器和激光等其他武器。在取得進展的同時，可以安裝車輛，如機甲、摩托車、坦克和飛行器。該遊戲中的一些音樂直接從早期的射擊遊戲 Air Duel（另一款 Irem 遊戲）中回收（並重新混合）。

ldrun2.original_name: Lode Runner II - The Bungeling Strikes Back
ldrun2.name: Lode Runner II - 邦格林的反擊
ldrun2.original_desc: Your commando runs around a vertical maze of tunnels made of brick and dirt. Use your blaster to dig holes, collect gold nuggets, and escape to the next level.
ldrun2.desc: 你的突擊隊在由磚塊和泥土組成的垂直迷宮般的隧道中奔跑。使用你的爆能槍挖洞，收集金塊，然後逃到下一個關卡。

outfxies.name: 狡猾的人
outfxies.original_desc: A platform 'versus' shoot'em up in which either one player (playing against the computer) or two players (playing against each other) attempt to destroy each other by any means necessary. The levels themselves are interesting and varied, with airships, planes etc. providing a detailed and highly interactive backdrop in which the players do battle. That interactivity is increased further with the introduction of destructible sections which, when blown up, can often open up new areas or rooms. Each level is littered with a variety of weapons that can be picked up and utilized by the player(s). Graphically, Outfoxies employed superb sprite scale and rotation techniques that elevated the already fun gameplay still further. The aeroplane level, for instance, dips and sways, bringing problems of inertia and gravity to the platform action. Also; the in-game camera zooms in and out of the level, depending on how far away the two opponents are from each other. Playable characters range from a monkey to a pair of psychotic school children, with each character choice offering the player different aptitudes (the monkey can jump higher, for example). A fun enough game in one-player mode, Outfoxies really came into its own when two human protagonists took part.
outfxies.desc: 一種“對戰”射擊遊戲的平台，其中一名玩家（與計算機對戰）或兩名玩家（相互對戰）試圖以任何必要的方式消滅對方。關卡本身有趣且多樣，飛艇、飛機等為玩家提供了詳細且高度互動的戰鬥背景。隨著可破壞部分的引入，這種交互性進一步增強，當這些部分被炸毀時，通常可以打開新的區域或房間。每個關卡都散佈著各種可供玩家拾取和使用的武器。從圖形上看，Outfoxies 採用了精湛的精靈縮放和旋轉技術，進一步提升了本已有趣的遊戲玩法。例如，飛機水平面會傾斜和搖擺，給平台動作帶來慣性和重力問題。還;遊戲中的攝像機會根據兩個對手之間的距離來放大和縮小關卡。可玩的角色範圍從一隻猴子到一對精神病學童，每種角色選擇都為玩家提供了不同的能力（例如，猴子可以跳得更高）。《Outfoxies》是一款足夠有趣的單人遊戲，當兩個人類主角參與時，《Outfoxies》真正發揮了自己的作用。

ddtodu.name: 龍與地下城：末日之塔
ddtodu.original_desc: Dungeons & Dragons: Tower of Doom is the first of two video games created by Capcom based on the Dungeons & Dragons tabletop role-playing game. The game was also released on the Sega Saturn, packaged with its sequel, Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara, under the title Dungeons & Dragons Collection, although the Saturn version limited the gameplay to only 2 players. The game is set in the Mystara campaign setting.
ddtodu.desc: 《龍與地下城：末日之塔》是 Capcom 基於《龍與地下城》桌面角色扮演遊戲打造的兩款視頻遊戲中的第一款。該遊戲也在世嘉土星上發布，與其續集《龍與地下城：密斯塔拉之影》一起發布，標題為《龍與地下城合集》，儘管土星版本將游戲限制為僅限 2 名玩家。遊戲以 Mystara 戰役為背景。

bwidow.name: 黑寡婦
bwidow.original_desc: In Black Widow you have to move around a web using two joysticks to control the action. The left joystick moves, while the right joystick fires. "Robotron - 2084" players will feel right at home playing this game, as the controls are identical. You have to defend your little vector spider around her vector web in order to keep out all the deadly bugs. Shoot down bugs and they turn into bonuses. Watch out for eggs, if you see any eggs, then you should quickly push them off the web before they hatch. Other enemies include mosquitoes, beetles, and hornets.
bwidow.desc: 在《黑寡婦》中，你必須使用兩個操縱桿來控制動作，在網上移動。左操縱桿移動，而右操縱桿點火。《Robotron - 2084》玩家在玩這款遊戲時會有賓至如歸的感覺，因為控件是相同的。你必須在矢量網周圍保護你的小矢量蜘蛛，以阻止所有致命的錯誤。擊落錯誤，它們就會變成獎金。小心雞蛋，如果你看到任何雞蛋，那麼你應該在它們孵化之前迅速將它們從網上推出。其他天敵包括蚊子、甲蟲和黃蜂。

dimahoo.name: 迪馬胡
dimahoo.original_desc: The game is set in a futuristic environment with dragons, little turtles with lasers on their back, and little green goblins with red eyes. The player picks one of four friends to travel with. The two characters fly through the levels in the game and collect items. Each item has a point value and the points are used to fill up a chart at the end. The items include: food, swords, armors, boots, etc. Towards the end of the game, the bosses become incredibly hard. The fast backgrounds create a confusing state of mind for the player.
dimahoo.desc: 遊戲設定在一個未來的環境中，有龍、背上有激光的小烏龜和紅眼睛的小綠妖精。玩家選擇四個朋友中的一個一起旅行。兩個角色飛過遊戲中的關卡並收集物品。每個項目都有一個分值，這些分用於在最後填充圖表。這些物品包括：食物、劍、盔甲、靴子等。遊戲接近尾聲時，boss 變得異常艱難。快速的背景會給玩家帶來混亂的心理狀態。

punishru.name: 懲罰者
punishru.original_desc: A Capcom arcade beat-em-up game similar to games like Double Dragon featuring the Marvel character The Punisher. Nick Fury is also a playable character in this game.
punishru.desc: 一款 Capcom 街機格鬥遊戲，類似於《雙截龍》等以漫威角色懲罰者為主角的遊戲。尼克·弗瑞也是這款遊戲中的一個可玩角色。

cabal.name: 陰謀
cabal.original_desc:
Cabal is a war themed shoot-em-up with one or simultaneous two-player gameplay in which two unnamed commandos must battle through five different stages - each containing four screens of play - to reach and defeat an evil dictator.

The game is an into-the-screen shooter with the action viewed from an over-the-shoulder perspective. The commandos can move left and right to avoid incoming fire while the enemies themselves are targeted by moving an on-screen cross-hair over them and pressing fire. If the fire button is held down, the commando remains static, allowing for more accurate targeting of the cross-hair. While static, the commandos are vulnerable to incoming enemy fire.

Initially, the commandos are armed with only a standard single-shot gun (albeit with unlimited-ammunition) and a limited number of grenades, but additional grenades and weapon power-ups can be earned as play progresses.

As well as enemy troops, vehicles such as tanks, armoured cars and helicopters also appear and take numerous shots to destroy. When destroyed or killed, some on-screen targets release points bonuses and weapon power-ups that drop to the bottom of the screen and can be picked up by the commandos. Weapon power-ups include additional grenades, a rapid-fire machine and an automatic shotgun, which has a slightly lower firing rate but has a larger targeting cross-hair, allowing it to strike a wider area with each shot.

Each of the game's screens is littered with buildings and barricades that can also be destroyed. This removes enemy cover as well as earning players bonus points.
cabal.desc:
Cabal 是一款戰爭主題射擊遊戲，提供單人或雙人同時遊戲，兩名無名突擊隊員必須通過五個不同的階段（每個階段包含四個遊戲屏幕）進行戰鬥，以到達並擊敗邪惡的獨裁者。

該遊戲是一款屏幕射擊遊戲，從過肩視角觀看動作。突擊隊員可以左右移動以避免來襲火力，而敵人本身則通過將屏幕上的十字線移動到敵人身上並按下火力來瞄準。如果按住開火按鈕，突擊隊員將保持靜止，從而可以更準確地瞄準十字線。雖然處於靜止狀態，但突擊隊員很容易受到敵人火力的攻擊。

最初，突擊隊員僅配備標准單發槍（儘管彈藥無限）和數量有限的手榴彈，但隨著遊戲的進行，可以贏得額外的手榴彈和武器強化道具。

除了敵軍之外，坦克、裝甲車和直升機等車輛也會出現，並需要多次射擊才能摧毀。當被摧毀或殺死時，一些屏幕上的目標會釋放點數獎勵和武器強化道具，這些獎勵和武器強化道具會掉落到屏幕底部，可供突擊隊員拾取。武器升級包括額外的手榴彈、速射機和自動霰彈槍，其射速稍低，但具有更大的瞄準十字線，使其每次射擊能夠打擊更廣泛的區域。

遊戲的每個屏幕上都散佈著也可以被摧毀的建築物和路障。這可以消除敵人的掩護並為玩家贏得獎勵積分。

galmedes.name: 加爾梅德斯
galmedes.original_desc:
Galmedes is a vertical scrolling shooter arcade game released only in Japan.. The ship has two types of attack: the standard firing weapon and a charge attack. Once the player collects all three weapons, the player can select any of those weapons during combat.

On the alien planet of Gaston, a dictator named Gildy rose to absolute power. Gildy started a plan to take over his home solar system, but upon doing so, he decided to spread his influence. After conquering his home galaxy, the next galaxy that Gildy planned on invading was the Galmedes Galaxy. In response, the unified forces of the planets of the Galmedes Galaxy have created a powerful space fighter known as the LEPTON (Launched Electro-Projectile Thermal Osmotic Nullifier). Two pilots, Foo and Bar, are selected to launch the LEPTON fighters against the invading Gastonian Forces.
galmedes.desc:
Galmedes 是一款僅在日本發行的垂直捲軸射擊街機遊戲。該船有兩種攻擊類型：標準射擊武器和衝鋒攻擊。一旦玩家收集了所有三種武器，玩家就可以在戰鬥中選擇其中任何武器。

在外星加斯頓星球上，一位名叫吉爾迪的獨裁者掌握了絕對權力。吉爾迪開始了一項接管他家鄉太陽系的計劃，但在這樣做之後，他決定傳播他的影響力。在征服了自己的家鄉星系之後，吉爾迪計劃入侵的下一個星係是加爾梅德斯星系。作為回應，加爾梅德斯星系行星的統一力量創造了一種強大的太空戰鬥機，稱為輕子（發射電射彈熱滲透消除器）。福和巴爾這兩名飛行員被選中發射輕子戰鬥機對抗入侵的加斯托尼亞軍隊。

hitice.name: 打冰
hitice.original_desc:
Welcome to no holds barred hockey brought to you by the Video Hockey League.  It's the Reds versus the Blues, the VHL's biggest rivalry.

The same hockey rules apply, pass the puck around around the ice rink and shoot it past the opposite goalie to score. You can also check your opponent just like real hockey, only each character has their own bone-crushing way of checking, each with maximum impact and zero tolerance for your well-being.  Players can also start fights with one another to really spice things up.

For an additional credit, players can purchase a 'power drink' that will make them 'Skate Faster and Shoot Harder' at the start of the period for one minute.

Now get to the action and DROP THAT PUCK!
hitice.desc:
歡迎來到視頻曲棍球聯盟為您帶來的無拘無束的曲棍球。這是紅隊對陣藍隊，VHL 最大的對手。

同樣的曲棍球規則也適用，將冰球繞過冰場並將其射過對面的守門員即可得分。你還可以像真正的曲棍球一樣檢查你的對手，只是每個角色都有自己的令人碎骨的檢查方式，每種方式都對你的健康產生最大的影響和零容忍。玩家還可以互相打鬥，讓事情變得更有趣。

為了獲得額外的積分，玩家可以購買“能量飲料”，這將使他們在比賽開始時“滑得更快，射得更猛”一分鐘。

現在開始行動，扔掉冰球！

mgcrystl.name: 魔法水晶
mgcrystl.original_desc:
Magical Crystals is a maze/shooter game, developed and published by Kaneko, which was released in 1991 (also licensed to Atlus). 
The player impersonate a magician going through a set of mazes suspended in the air; the goal of the game is to rescue the pixies trapped inside the magical crystals. The game has a total of 6 worlds. Each world is divided into 3 acts and has a boss fight and a bonus stage at the end.
mgcrystl.desc:
Magical Crystals 是一款迷宮/射擊遊戲，由 Kaneko 開發和發行，於 1991 年發布（也授權給 Atlus）。
玩家扮演一位魔術師，穿過一組懸浮在空中的迷宮；遊戲的目標是營救被困在魔法水晶中的小精靈。遊戲一共有6個世界。每個世界分為 3 幕，並有一場 Boss 戰和最後的獎勵階段。

galaga.name: 他們展示
galaga.original_desc:
Galaga is a single-screen shoot-em-up in which the player controls a 'Fighter' spaceship and must defend the home planet against the on-coming hordes of alien invaders called "Galagans". The Fighter can only move left and right along the bottom of the screen. 

Galagans fly onto the screen in a variety of formations before forming troop lines at the top of the screen. Once all troop lines are formed the Galagans separate and start attacking the player's Fighter in ones, twos and threes. The top-line Boss Galaga need to be shot twice before they are destroyed.
galaga.desc:
《Galaga》是一款單屏射擊遊戲，玩家控制一艘“戰鬥機”宇宙飛船，必須保衛家園，抵禦即將到來的外星入侵者“加拉加人”。戰鬥機只能沿著屏幕底部左右移動。

加拉加人以各種編隊飛到屏幕上，然後在屏幕頂部排成隊伍。一旦所有隊伍都形成，加拉加人就會分開並開始以一、二、三的方式攻擊玩家的戰鬥機。頂線 Boss 加拉加需要被射擊兩次才能被摧毀。

outzone.name: 外區
outzone.original_desc: A vertically scrolling run and gun game, in which the player controls a soldier who must fight his way through 7 increasingly difficult levels. At the end of each level a boss must be defeated before the player can progress any further.
outzone.desc: 一款垂直滾動的跑槍遊戲，玩家控制一名士兵，必須通過 7 個難度不斷增加的關卡。在每個關卡結束時，玩家必須先擊敗 Boss，然後才能繼續前進。

wow.name: 世界巫師
wow.original_desc:
Wizard of Wor is a maze-based shoot-em-up featuring one or co-operative two-player gameplay. In a two-player game, player one controls yellow Worriors while player two controls blue Worriors. Players are also able to shoot each other's Worriors, earning bonus points and causing the other player to lose a life. Team-oriented players can successfully advance through the game by standing back-to-back and firing at anything that comes at them.

Each single-screen dungeon consists of a grid forming walls and corridors. There are doors situated at the left and right edges of the screen that are inter-connected, making the dungeon wrap around. Whenever a door is used by a player or monster, it deactivates for a short period, making it impassable. A small radar display indicates the positions of all active monsters.
wow.desc:
Wizard of Wor 是一款基於迷宮的射擊遊戲，具有單人或兩人合作遊戲玩法。在兩人遊戲中，玩家一控制黃色勇士隊，而玩家二控制藍色勇士隊。玩家還可以射擊對方的武士，獲得獎勵積分並導致對方喪生。以團隊為導向的玩家可以通過背靠背站立並向任何攻擊他們的東西開火來成功地在遊戲中前進。

每個單屏地牢都由網格形成的牆壁和走廊組成。屏幕左右邊緣有門相互連接，使地牢環繞起來。每當玩家或怪物使用一扇門時，它就會在短時間內停用，使其無法通過。小型雷達顯示屏指示所有活動怪物的位置。

captcomu.name: 突擊隊長
captcomu.original_desc: Captain Commando is set in a crime-ridden future in the year 2026, where a superhero named Captain Commando, assisted by his three faithful Commando Companions rise up to protect the Earth and all the Galaxy from a gang of super-powered criminals.
captcomu.desc: 《突擊隊隊長》的故事背景設定在 2026 年，一個犯罪猖獗的未來，一位名叫《突擊隊隊長》的超級英雄在三位忠實的突擊隊同伴的協助下，挺身而出，保護地球和整個銀河系免受一夥超能力罪犯的侵害。

actfancr.name: Act-Fancer：Cybernetick 超級武器
actfancr.original_desc: A platform game with shoot'em up elements where you play as a robot that can transform into a more powerful robot by collecting power-ups.
actfancr.desc: 一款帶有射擊元素的平台遊戲，您將扮演一個機器人，通過收集能量道具可以變身為更強大的機器人。

journey.name: 旅行
journey.original_desc:
The Play mode begins when either the 1-PLAYER or the 2-PLAYER START button is pressed. The Play mode ends when all of your performers have been eliminated. When this happens, GAME OVER is written across the center of the monitor screen.

ON THE SCREEN: The game is made up of groups of 5 sequences for each rack. When play begins, all the performers run onto the screen and jump aboard their transport ship, the Scarab. The Scarab then lifts off and heads for a point in space that is at the center of a grouping of five planets. (The song that is played in the background during this scene is 'Lights'.) Each group member's instrument is on a different planet.

At the beginning of each sequence, when a 2-PLAYER game has been selected, the game tells which player is up.
journey.desc:
當按下 1-PLAYER 或 2-PLAYER START 按鈕時，遊戲模式開始。當所有表演者都被淘汰後，播放模式結束。發生這種情況時，顯示器屏幕中央會顯示“GAME OVER”（遊戲結束）。

屏幕上：遊戲由每個機架的 5 個序列組組成。當比賽開始時，所有表演者跑到屏幕上並跳上他們的運輸船聖甲蟲。然後聖甲蟲升空並前往太空中位於五個行星組中心的一點。（這個場景中背景播放的歌曲是“Lights”。）每個小組成員的樂器都位於不同的星球上。

在每個序列開始時，當選擇了 2 人遊戲時，遊戲會告訴哪個玩家在場。

simpsn2p.name: 辛普森一家
simpsn2p.original_desc:
A jewel heist gone wrong sees Mr Burns's sidekick, Smithers, kidnapping Maggie and making his escape. Between one and four players take on the role of either Homer, Marge, Lisa, or Bart in this colorful, horizontally-scrolling beat-em-up from Konami. Each Simpsons character possesses an attacking move specific to them; Marge is armed with a vacuum cleaner, Lisa has a skipping rope, Bart has his skateboard, and Homer fights with his fists. The players must battle their way through a variety of Simpsons-themed levels - such as Springfield and Krustyland - fighting goons, thugs, zombies, drunks, firemen, and several Simpsons regulars. Many Simpsons characters that don't appear as enemies have 'cameo' scenes in the game (Otto working at a burgerstand in Krustyland, for example). The archetypal 'boss' character awaits the players at the end of every stage. The game ends with a final showdown with the evil Mr. Burns in his luxurious mansion.

The Simpsons was designed to Konami's typically-high production standards and was, like the 'Ninja Turtles' games that appeared a couple of years' earlier, very faithful to its source material. The colorful, smoothly-animated sprites captured the spirit of the legendary cartoon superbly, and the game's many humorous touches were timed to perfection.
simpsn2p.desc:
一場珠寶搶劫案出了差錯，伯恩斯先生的助手史密瑟斯綁架了瑪吉並逃跑。在這款來自 Konami 的色彩繽紛的水平滾動格鬥遊戲中，一到四名玩家扮演 Homer、Marge、Lisa 或 Bart 的角色。每個辛普森一家的角色都擁有自己特有的攻擊動作；瑪吉拿著吸塵器，麗莎拿著跳繩，巴特拿著滑板，荷馬則用拳頭戰鬥。玩家必須在各種辛普森一家主題的關卡中殺出一條血路——比如斯普林菲爾德和庫斯蒂蘭——與暴徒、暴徒、殭屍、醉漢、消防員和幾名辛普森一家的常客戰鬥。許多不以敵人身份出現的《辛普森一家》角色在遊戲中都有“客串”場景（例如，奧託在 Krustyland 的漢堡攤工作）。典型的“老闆”角色在每個階段結束時等待著玩家。遊戲以在邪惡的伯恩斯先生的豪華宅邸中進行最後的對決而結束。

《辛普森一家》的設計符合科樂美典型的高製作標準，並且與幾年前推出的“忍者神龜”遊戲一樣，非常忠實於其源材料。色彩繽紛、動畫流暢的精靈完美地捕捉了傳奇卡通的精神，遊戲中的許多幽默元素也恰到好處。

monsterb.name: 怪物狂歡
monsterb.original_desc:
MONSTER BASH is a fascinating cartoon theme game featuring colorful graphics in three exciting scenes of hunt-and-hide adventure. Light-hearted, suspenseful music and audio sounds add to the fun, and heighten player interest and intrigue.

DRACULA'S HOUSE
The player-hero of the game is LITTLE RED, a wily, red-headed boy who chases Dracula throughout his five-story haunted house. Up and down staircases and through Warp Doors leading to secret passageways, Little Red zaps defending bats while attempting to light candles in certain rooms. When a candle is lit a Magic Sword is energized with mystical powers. Little Red must touch the flashing Magic Sword to gain SuperZap power... only a SuperZap will defeat the sly Dracula.

FRANKENSTEIN'S CASTLE
Little Red enters the eerie castle of the hulking Frankenstein. He pursues Frankenstein around his six-story castle while avoiding the fierce Wolfmen.  The tricky Wolfmen can be zapped, but be careful, they can duck under the zap and attack Little Red. Fewer candles are now available to be lit. Warp doors to secret passageways can be used only when they flash. Special jump-down zones allow Little Red to jump down several levels at once, eliminating any Wolfmen in the way as he descends, but Frankenstein can only be defeated with a SuperZap.

CHAMELEON MAN'S GRAVEYARD
The greatest challenge yet... to dispatch the sneaky Chameleon Man and his horde of Spiders.  Entering the spooky graveyard, Little Red finds that only one candle is available for lighting which is found in a crypt guarded by giant Spiders. Chameleon Man changes his color to match that of the background and thus becomes invisible. Little Red must pass over one of the Color-Change Spots to change the background color making Chameleon Man visible again. Chameleon Man can do away with Little Red with a flick of his long tongue. Chameleon Man can only be done in with a SuperZap.
monsterb.desc:
MONSTER BASH 是一款引人入勝的卡通主題遊戲，在三個令人興奮的狩獵和隱藏冒險場景中具有色彩繽紛的圖形。輕鬆、懸疑的音樂和音效增添了樂趣，並提高了玩家的興趣和好奇心。

德古拉之家
遊戲的玩家英雄是“小紅”，一個狡猾的紅發男孩，他在德古拉的五層鬼屋裡追趕他。上下樓梯，穿過通往秘密通道的扭曲門，小紅一邊試圖在某些房間點燃蠟燭，一邊消滅正在防禦的蝙蝠。當蠟燭點燃時，魔法劍就會充滿神秘的力量。小紅必須觸摸閃爍的魔法劍才能獲得 SuperZap 力量……只有 SuperZap 才能擊敗狡猾的德古拉。

弗蘭肯斯坦城堡
小紅進入了巨大的弗蘭肯斯坦的怪異城堡。他在六層城堡周圍追擊弗蘭肯斯坦，同時避開兇猛的狼人。狡猾的狼人可以被電擊，但要小心，他們可以躲在電擊下攻擊小紅。現在可供點燃的蠟燭越來越少。通往秘密通道的曲速門只有在閃爍時才能使用。特殊的跳下區域允許小紅一次跳下幾層，在他下降時消除任何擋在路上的狼人，但弗蘭肯斯坦只能用超級電擊來擊敗。

變色龍人的墓地
迄今為止最大的挑戰是……消滅狡猾的變色龍人和他的蜘蛛群。進入陰森恐怖的墓地，小紅發現只有一根蠟燭可以用來照明，而蠟燭是在巨型蜘蛛守衛的墓穴裡找到的。變色龍人會改變自己的顏色以匹配背景，從而變得隱形。小紅必須越過其中一個變色點來改變背景顏色，使變色龍人再次可見。變色龍人只要輕輕一抖長舌頭就能幹掉小紅。變色龍人只能用 SuperZap 來消滅。

gaunt2p.name: 挑戰
gaunt2p.original_desc:
Gauntlet is a maze-based shoot-em-up for up to four players. Heavily influenced by classic fantasy conventions, players take on the role of either Thor the Warrior, Thyra the Valkyrie, Merlin the Wizard, or Questor the Elf and must play cooperatively as they explore and fight their way through the enemy-packed mazes. Competitive play is encouraged as players must fight for the limited amount of food, treasure, magic potions and power-up items that litter the dungeons. 

Each of Gauntlet's four characters have different strengths and weaknesses: Thyra has the strongest armour, Thor is best at hand-to-hand combat, Questor has the fastest speed and Merlin has the most powerful magic attacks. The object of the game is simply to survive as long as possible while exploring Gauntlet's mazes in search of treasure, food, magic potions and, ultimately, the exit that leads to the next dungeon. 

The potions - shown as blue bottles - that litter the levels offer either improved character abilities (such as 'speed' or 'extra shot power') or can be used as a 'smart bomb', destroying some or all of the on-screen monsters. Potions are also the only way to kill the game's 'Death' character that appears in many of the stages. Magic potions can be kept and used at the player's discretion by pressing 'Magic' button, although each potion can only be used once. 

The first seven mazes are always the same, but from level 8 onwards, players will find themselves on any one of over a hundred different mazes. If players survive for long enough, the mazes will be repeated in a different order. How long a player lasts depends upon the player's 'health' level. Health continually depletes as time progresses and further health is lost by contact with various monsters or their projectiles. Health can be replenished by consuming the food found in the mazes or by inserting more credits. The many treasure chests that litter the levels can be plundered for points, and collecting treasure increases a player's score multiplier when two or more players are playing the game.
gaunt2p.desc:
Gauntlet 是一款基於迷宮的射擊遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家。深受經典奇幻慣例的影響，玩家扮演戰士托爾、女武神塞拉、巫師梅林或精靈探索者等角色，並且必須合作探索並在充滿敵人的迷宮中殺出一條血路。鼓勵競爭性遊戲，因為玩家必須爭奪地牢中散落的有限數量的食物、寶藏、魔法藥水和能量提升物品。

Gauntlet的四個角色各有不同的優點和缺點：Thyra擁有最強的盔甲，Thor最擅長肉搏戰，Questor擁有最快的速度，Merlin擁有最強大的魔法攻擊。遊戲的目標只是在探索 Gauntlet 的迷宮中盡可能長時間地生存，尋找寶藏、食物、魔法藥劑，並最終找到通往下一個地牢的出口。

關卡中散佈的藥水（顯示為藍色瓶子）可以提高角色能力（例如“速度”或“額外射擊威力”），也可以用作“智能炸彈”，摧毀部分或全部屏幕上的怪物。藥水也是殺死遊戲中許多關卡中出現的“死亡”角色的唯一方法。玩家可以通過按下“魔法”按鈕來保留和使用魔法藥水，儘管每種藥水只能使用一次。

前七個迷宮總是相同的，但從第 8 級開始，玩家會發現自己身處一百多個不同迷宮中的任何一個。如果玩家生存足夠長的時間，迷宮就會以不同的順序重複。玩家能堅持多久取決於玩家的“健康”水平。隨著時間的推移，生命值會不斷消耗，並且由於與各種怪物或其射彈接觸，生命值會進一步損失。可以通過消耗迷宮中找到的食物或插入更多積分來補充生命值。關卡中散落的許多寶箱可以用來獲取積分，當兩個或更多玩家玩遊戲時，收集寶藏會增加玩家的分數乘數。

slammasu.name: 週六晚大滿貫大師賽
slammasu.original_desc: A 1-on-1 fighting game in which players choose from 10 different wrestlers and take to the ring to try and defeat their larger-than-life opponents. Each wrestler has an assortment of moves, including his own special 'super slam'. The object of the game is to win and defend the championship by pinning or putting a submission hold on your opponent.
slammasu.desc: 一款一對一的格鬥遊戲，玩家從 10 名不同的摔跤手中進行選擇，並走上擂台嘗試擊敗他們的傳奇對手。每個摔跤手都有各種各樣的動作，包括他自己特殊的“超級滿貫”。遊戲的目標是通過壓製或壓制對手來贏得併衛冕冠軍。

gunlock.name: 槍槍
gunlock.original_desc: Vertically scrolling shoot 'em up released in 1993 as Rayforce in the Arcade. The subsequent home versions released in 1995 for Sega Saturn were titled 'Layer Section' in Japan, and 'Galactic Attack' in the US and Europe.
gunlock.desc: 垂直滾動射擊遊戲於 1993 年在街機廳以 Rayforce 的形式發布。1995 年為 Sega Saturn 發布的後續家庭版本在日本稱為“Layer Section”，在美國和歐洲稱為“Gactic Attack”。

s1945.name: 前鋒1945
s1945.original_desc: In 1945, the second world war ended. Soon, there was peace, but an organization of high-ranking military officers from all over the world form a global army known as CANY. Their mission was to conquer the world. CANY activity was found in areas like the Soviet Union, America, Japan, and even Germany. It is revealed that CANY had weapons never seen before from rockets to mechanical walkers. The world quickly formed a group of pilots and planes called the Strikers whose mission is to rid of CANY from the world.
s1945.desc: 1945年，第二次世界大戰結束。很快，世界和平了，但來自世界各地的高級軍官組成了一支名為 CANY 的全球軍隊。他們的使命是征服世界。CANY的活動遍布蘇聯、美國、日本，甚至德國等地區。據透露，CANY擁有從火箭到機械助行器等前所未見的武器。世界迅速組建了一群名為“前鋒”的飛行員和飛機，其使命是將CANY從世界上除掉。

chplft.name: 劈砍者
chplft.original_desc: The player assumes the role of a combat helicopter pilot. The player attempts to save hostages being held in prisoner of war camps in an unnamed enemy country. The player must collect the P.O.W.s, transport them safely to the nearby friendly base, all the while fighting off hostile tanks and other enemy combatants. There are a total of 32 hostages per level. To rescue more than 20 will advance the player to the next level.
chplft.desc: 玩家扮演戰鬥直升機飛行員的角色。玩家試圖拯救被關押在一個不知名敵國戰俘營中的人質。玩家必須收集戰俘，將他們安全運送到附近的友軍基地，同時擊退敵方坦克和其他敵方戰鬥人員。每級共有 32 名人質。營救超過 20 名玩家即可進入下一關。

vigilntu.name: 義務警員
vigilntu.original_desc:
A sequel to Irem's legendary 1984 beat-em-up, "Kung-Fu Master", Vigilante sees the hero's girlfriend, Madonna, kidnapped by a gang of thugs and driven away in the back of their van. The vigilante must fight through five enemy-packed levels to rescue his girlfriend. As with "Kung-Fu Master", a tough guardian enemy awaits the player at the end of each level. The guardians must be defeated as quickly as possible as their energy bars will replenish in between the player's attacks.

A weapon, in the form of Nunchakas, can occasionally be found and picked-up; adding to the player's 'kick' and 'punch' fighting moves. Some of the game's many enemies are also armed, with either clubs, chains, knives or guns. The game ends once Madonna is rescued.
vigilntu.desc:
作為 Irem 1984 年傳奇格鬥遊戲《功夫大師》的續集，《俠客》中主角的女友麥當娜被一夥暴徒綁架，並在貨車後座被趕走。義務警員必須通過五個充滿敵人的關卡才能營救他的女朋友。與《功夫大師》一樣，在每個關卡的最後都有一個強大的守護敵人等待著玩家。必須盡快擊敗守衛者，因為他們的能量條會在玩家攻擊之間補充。

偶爾會發現並拾取雙節棍形式的武器；增加玩家的“踢”和“拳”戰鬥動作。遊戲中的許多敵人中的一些也配備了武器，有棍棒、鎖鏈、刀子或槍。一旦麥當娜被救出，遊戲就結束了。

tron.name: 創
tron.original_desc:
Tron is a 1- or 2-player game set inside the 'Tron' computer, and is based on the ground-breaking Disney movie of the same name.

Tron consists of twenty-two stages - or 'phases' - of play. Each phase consists of four separate games called "domains", all of which must be completed before moving on to the next phase. Players can determine the order in which each of the four domains is attempted, but the domain position is random and is only revealed once that domain has been chosen.

The four domains that make up a phase never change throughout the game, although both the difficulty level and number of enemies increases with each subsequent phase. The domains are as follows:

LIGHT CYCLES: The player controls a Light Cycle that leaves a blue light trail in its wake. The aim is to 'box in' the yellow enemy Light Cycles, making them crash into either a cycle trail (theirs or the player's) or a wall. The player must also avoid any collision with either walls or light trails. The joystick controls the direction of the bike and the trigger controls its speed.
I/O TOWER: Destroy the Grid Bugs that emerge from the grid surrounding the tower. The bugs will multiply and fill the entire screen if not stopped. Players must attempt to clear a path to - and enter - the I/O Tower before the timer runs out. The stick controls the movement of the player's character and the spinner controls the direction of fire.
TANK MAZE: Destroy all enemy tanks that are patrolling the maze. The player's tank can fire in all directions and can bounce shots off walls, but can be destroyed by a single shot; while enemy tanks can only fire in the direction of travel but need three shots before they are destroyed. "Recognizer" tanks also feature in later phases; these Do NOT shoot but move quickly and will try to ram the player's tank. The joystick controls the movement of the player's tank and the spinner controls the direction of fire.
MCP CONE: Destroy the blocks in the descending, rotating coloured column to clear a path and move the character up into the light cone above the blocks. A bonus is awarded if all of the blocks are destroyed. The stick controls the movement of the character and the spinner controls the direction of fire.

Bonus lives are awarded periodically throughout the game as specific point scores are reached. Each enemy and item has an assigned point value (see the "SCORING" section for details).
tron.desc:
Tron 是一款以“Tron”計算機為背景的 1 人或 2 人遊戲，改編自開創性的迪士尼同名電影。

Tron 由 22 個遊戲階段（或“階段”）組成。每個階段由四個稱為“域”的獨立遊戲組成，所有這些遊戲都必須完成才能進入下一階段。玩家可以確定嘗試四個域中每個域的順序，但域位置是隨機的，並且只有在選擇該域後才會顯示。

儘管難度級別和敵人數量隨著每個後續階段的增加而增加，但構成一個階段的四個領域在整個遊戲中永遠不會改變。域如下：

光循環：玩家控制光循環，在其尾跡中留下藍色光跡。目標是“圍住”黃色敵方輕型自行車，使它們撞上自行車道（他們的或玩家的）或牆壁。玩家還必須避免與牆壁或光跡發生任何碰撞。操縱桿控制自行車的方向，扳機控制自行車的速度。
I/O 塔：消滅從塔周圍的網格中出現的網格蟲。如果不加以阻止，這些錯誤將會成倍增加並填滿整個屏幕。玩家必須在計時器耗盡之前嘗試清除通向並進入 I/O 塔的路徑。搖桿控制玩家角色的移動，旋轉器控制射擊方向。
坦克迷宮：摧毀所有在迷宮中巡邏的敵方坦克。玩家的坦克可以向各個方向開火，並且可以從牆壁上彈開射擊，但可以被單次射擊摧毀；而敵方坦克只能向行進方向開火，但需要三槍才能被摧毀。“識別器”坦克也將在後期階段亮相；它們不會射擊，但會快速移動並嘗試撞擊玩家的坦克。操縱桿控制玩家坦克的移動，旋轉器控制射擊方向。
MCP CONE：摧毀下降、旋轉的彩色柱中的塊以清理路徑並將角色向上移動到塊上方的光錐中。如果所有方塊都被摧毀，則會獲得獎勵。搖桿控制角色的移動，旋轉器控制射擊方向。

在整個遊戲過程中，當達到特定分數時，會定期獎勵生命獎勵。每個敵人和物品都有一個分配的分值（有關詳細信息，請參閱“得分”部分）。

trackfld.name: 超級奧林匹克
trackfld.original_desc:
Track & Field © 1983 Konami.

Track & Field is an athletics-themed action game for up to four players, who compete against each other in six track and field-based disciplines. 

The game controls consist of two run buttons (one for each 'leg' of the athlete) and one 'Action' button. Players must hit the two run buttons alternately to build up speed and use action button to jump or throw.

In each event, there is a qualifying time or minimum score threshold that the player must achieve to advance to the next event. failing to qualify (in one heat for track events or in three attempts in the other events) will reduce the players' number of lives by one, the game is over once all lives are lost.

Track & Field can accommodate up to four players, who compete in pairs in the running events and individually in the others. If there are fewer than four players, the remaining slots are played by the computer (or player "CPU"). In all multiplayer heats, however, the relative performance of the players has no effect on the game and advancing is based solely on reaching qualifying times and targets.

The six events are:

100M DASH - Run as fast as possible.
LONG JUMP - Run to the take-off board then choose angle of jump (42 is the optimum angle).
JAVELIN - Run to the line then choose angle of throw (43 is the optimum angle).
110M HURDLES - Run and time jumps over the hurdles.
HAMMER THROW - As the athlete spins faster and faster, time release of hammer and angle of throw (45 is the optimum angle).
HIGH JUMP - The athlete will run to the bar; just as he reaches it, use Action button to start the jump and hold down the action button to reduce the angle of climb, i.e. you start going straight up at 90 degrees if you tap the button just once. Use run buttons while in the air to gain extra height.
trackfld.desc:
田徑&複製； 1983年科樂美。

Track & Field 是一款以田徑為主題的動作遊戲，最多可容納四名玩家，他們在六個田徑項目中相互競爭。

遊戲控制由兩個跑步按鈕（運動員的每條“腿”各一個）和一個“動作”按鈕組成。按鈕。玩家必須交替點擊兩個奔跑按鈕來加快速度，並使用動作按鈕來跳躍或投擲。

在每項賽事中，玩家必須達到資格時間或最低分數閾值才能晉級下一場賽事。未能獲得資格（在田徑項目的一場預賽中或在其他項目的三場嘗試中）將減少球員的資格。生命數減一，一旦所有生命都消失，遊戲就結束。

田徑場最多可容納四名運動員，他們在跑步比賽中雙人比賽，在其他比賽中單獨比賽。如果玩家少於四人，則剩餘的老虎機由計算機（或玩家“CPU”）玩。然而，在所有多人預賽中，選手的相對錶現對比賽沒有影響，晉級完全取決於達到資格賽時間和目標。

這六項活動分別是：

100M DASH - 盡可能快地運行。
跳遠 - 跑向起跳板，然後選擇跳躍角度（42 度是最佳角度）。
標槍 - 跑到罰球線，然後選擇投擲角度（43 度是最佳角度）。
110M 跨欄 - 奔跑並跨越障礙。
鏈球投擲 - 隨著運動員旋轉得越來越快，鏈球的釋放時間和投擲角度（45 度是最佳角度）。
跳高——運動員跑向橫桿；當他到達目的地時，使用“動作”按鈕開始跳躍，並按住“動作”按鈕以減小爬升角度，即，如果您只點擊一次按鈕，您就會開始以 90 度的角度直線上升。在空中使用跑步按鈕可以獲得額外的高度。

goldnaxe.name: 金斧战士
goldnaxe.original_desc:
Golden Axe is a sideways scrolling beat-em-up set in a traditional fantasy world, in which up to three warriors take up arms to rescue the kidnapped King and his Queen from the evil Death Adder.

The game's three different playable characters are an Amazonian warrior named Tyris Flare, a Barbarian hero named Ax Battler, and a Viking dwarf named Gilius Thunderhead. Each character has a special attack move that is activated by pressing both JUMP and ATTACK at the same time. Also, double-tapping the joystick right or left will make the character charge and smash into opponents.
goldnaxe.desc:
《Golden Axe》是一款以傳統奇幻世界為背景的橫向捲軸清版遊戲，最多三名戰士拿起武器從邪惡的死亡蝰蛇手中營救被綁架的國王和王后。

遊戲的三個不同的可玩角色是亞馬遜戰士泰里斯·弗拉爾、野蠻人英雄斧戰士和維京矮人吉利烏斯·雷頭。每個角色都有一個特殊的攻擊動作，可以通過同時按下“跳躍”和“攻擊”來激活。此外，向右或向左雙擊操縱桿將使角色衝鋒並撞向對手。

rastanu.name: 真相
rastanu.original_desc: Rastan saga known in North America simply as Rastan, is a 1987 hack and slash platform arcade game developed and published by Taito.
rastanu.desc: Rastan saga 在北美簡稱為 Rastan，是一款 1987 年由 Taito 開發和發行的砍殺平台街機遊戲。

macrossp.name: 超時空要塞Plus
macrossp.original_desc: Macross Plus is a 2D vertically scrolling shooter, based on the Macross anime. The player can choose one from 3 characters: Isamu Dyson in his YF-19, Guld Bowman in his YF-21, and an unnamed female pilot in the VF-11. Gameplay is very straightforward - player flies forward and shoot enemies. He has gun, bombs and missiles (press shot to release missile attack - they have special homing system). The player can collect power-ups dropped by special enemies.
macrossp.desc: 《超時空要塞 Plus》是一款 2D 垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，基於超時空要塞動漫。玩家可以從 3 個角色中選擇一個：駕駛 YF-19 的伊薩姆·戴森 (Isamu Dyson)、駕駛 YF-21 的古爾德·鮑曼 (Guld Bowman)，以及駕駛 VF-11 的未透露姓名的女飛行員。遊戲玩法非常簡單 - 玩家向前飛行並射擊敵人。他有槍、炸彈和導彈（按下射擊以釋放導彈攻擊 - 他們有特殊的尋的系統）。玩家可以收集特殊敵人掉落的能量道具。

trojan.name: 木馬
trojan.original_desc: The game consist of six stages, where the player will face the usual series of small fry enemies, as well as a sub-boss at the middle of each stage and a boss at the end. The player is allowed to start the game at any of the six stages. However, the player must play through the entire game again after defeating the final boss, Achilles, in order to see the true ending (similarly to Ghosts'n Goblins). The player can continue after a game over depending on the dip switch settings.
trojan.desc: 遊戲由六個階段組成，玩家將面對通常的一系列小敵人，以及每個階段中間的次 Boss 和最後的 Boss。玩家可以在六個階段中的任何一個階段開始遊戲。然而，玩家必須在擊敗最終boss阿喀琉斯後再次通關整個遊戲，才能看到真正的結局（類似於Ghosts'n Goblins）。遊戲結束後，玩家可以根據撥碼開關設置繼續遊戲。

invaders.name: 太空侵略者
invaders.original_desc:
The most influential video game of all time. A single player moves an armed 'base' to the left or right along the bottom of the screen and fires at the endless waves of aliens that tirelessly parade across the screen towards earth.
There are 4 buildings (shields) at the bottom of the screen behind which the player can hide, but these will eventually be destroyed by enemy missiles or by direct contact with the invaders themselves. Player shots will also destroy shields.
The descent of the aliens accelerates as they are eliminated, making them more difficult to hit. A flying saucer will fly across the top of the screen at regular intervals and can be fired for extra points.
invaders.desc:
有史以來最有影響力的視頻遊戲。單個玩家沿著屏幕底部向左或向右移動武裝“基地”，並向不知疲倦地穿過屏幕向地球行進的無數外星人開火。
屏幕底部有 4 個建築物（盾牌），玩家可以躲在後面，但這些建築物最終會被敵方導彈或與入侵者直接接觸而摧毀。玩家射擊也會摧毀護盾。
當外星人被消滅時，他們的下降速度會加快，使他們更難被擊中。飛碟會定期飛過屏幕頂部，並且可以發射飛碟以獲得額外分數。

karnov.name: 卡爾諾夫
karnov.original_desc: Karnov is a 2-D, platform style game. You control Karnov through 9 scenes. Each of these scenes gives you piece of a map (except the first scene). Get all the pieces of the map and you get to the treasure. Your journey won't be easy though. You will be going through some rough environment such as towns, forests, oceans, and caves. To further make your travels a hazard, different enemies attempt to end Karnov's life prematurely and prevent him from getting to the treasure. To aid Karnov in his adventures, he has certain items that he can draw from his inventory. In addition, there are other items that can make Karnov a potent foe of those wishing to harm him. You must complete each scene in order to advance to the next scene. All in a days work of a hearty explorer.
karnov.desc: Karnov 是一款 2D 平颱風格遊戲。您可以通過 9 個場景來控制卡諾夫。每個場景都會為您提供一張地圖（第一個場景除外）。獲得地圖上的所有碎片，你就可以找到寶藏。但你的旅程並不容易。你將經歷一些惡劣的環境，如城鎮、森林、海洋和洞穴。為了進一步使你的旅行變得危險，不同的敵人試圖過早結束卡諾夫的生命並阻止他獲得寶藏。為了幫助卡諾夫進行冒險，他可以從庫存中提取某些物品。此外，還有其他物品可以使卡爾諾夫成為那些想要傷害他的人的強大敵人。您必須完成每個場景才能進入下一個場景。這一切都是一位熱心探險家一天的工作。

rygar.name: 背板
rygar.original_desc: Rygar is a classic game for many home consoles. It also has an Arcade version that plays different than the home console versions.
rygar.desc: Rygar 是許多家用遊戲機的經典遊戲。它還有一個街機版本，其玩法與家用遊戲機版本不同。

mspacman.name: 吃豆人女士
mspacman.original_desc:
In this, the first proper sequel to Namco's legendary pill eating maze game, players must once again run around a number of mazes, eating all of the pills that are scattered throughout. The ever-present ghosts (Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Sue) return to hamper the player's progress. The infamous 'Power Pills' are also present and correct, with four appearing in each maze. 

Namco introduced a number of changes and enhancements over the original game. The first difference is in the main character. For the first time in video-game history, the game's lead character was female. Ms. Pac-Man is almost identical to the original character with two main differences; she wears a bow in her 'hair', and is also wearing lipstick. 

Another change from the original is that the bonus fruit items are no longer static but now move randomly around the mazes. 

Ms Pac-Man features four different maze layouts, which alternate every two to four rounds:
mspacman.desc:
在這款南夢宮傳奇吃藥丸迷宮遊戲的第一部續作中，玩家必須再次在多個迷宮中奔跑，吃掉散落在各處的所有藥丸。始終存在的幽靈（Blinky、Pinky、Inky 和 Sue）回來阻礙玩家的進度。臭名昭著的“強力藥丸”也存在且正確，每個迷宮中出現四個。

南夢宮對原版遊戲進行了許多更改和增強。第一個區別在於主角。該遊戲的主角是女性，這在電子遊戲歷史上還是第一次。吃豆人女士與原版角色幾乎相同，但有兩個主要區別：她的“頭髮”上戴著蝴蝶結，還塗著口紅。

與原版相比的另一個變化是獎勵水果不再是靜態的，而是在迷宮中隨機移動。

吃豆人女士有四種不同的迷宮佈局，每兩到四輪交替一次：

bubbles.name: 氣泡
bubbles.original_desc: In Bubbles you control a cartoon soap bubble inside a large sink. The object of the game is clean out the sink. You can safely scrub away ants, grease, and crumbs all the time. But sponges, roaches, brushes, and razor blades are deadly to a small bubble. Don't worry too much though, because your bubble grows in size as it swallows up the dirt in the sink. When it gets big enough it will be able to hit brushes and sponges (but still not razors).
bubbles.desc: 在“泡泡”中，您可以控制大水槽內的卡通肥皂泡。遊戲的目標是清理水槽。您可以隨時安全地擦掉螞蟻、油脂和麵包屑。但海綿、蟑螂、刷子和刀片對於小氣泡來說是致命的。不過不用太擔心，因為氣泡會隨著吞噬水槽中的污垢而變大。當它變得足夠大時，它將能夠擊中刷子和海綿（但仍然不能擊中剃須刀）。

kchamp.name: 空手道冠軍
kchamp.original_desc:
Karate Champ © 1984 Data East USA.

A seminal 1-on-1 fighting game set over the course of a karate tournament, Karate Champ was the first game of its type and would influence every game of the fighting genre that followed. Karate Champ's control system utilised a somewhat awkward dual joystick control system, with simultaneous joystick manipulation required to execute even the simplest of kicks.
kchamp.desc:
空手道冠軍 © 1984 年美國東部數據。

《Karate Champ》是一款以空手道錦標賽為背景的開創性的一對一格鬥遊戲，是該類型的第一款遊戲，並將影響隨後的格鬥類型遊戲。空手道冠軍的控制系統採用了一種有點笨拙的雙操縱桿控制系統，即使是最簡單的踢腿也需要同時操縱操縱桿。

amidar.name: 阿米達爾
amidar.original_desc:
Amidar is an abstract arcade game in which players must 'colour in' all of the rectangles on the screen. Each level has a number of patrolling enemies called 'Amidars' that must be avoided but players are aided in their task with the inclusion of a JUMP button which, when used, causes all the on-screen enemies to jump, giving the player time to escape. There are only three 'jumps' given per level, however.

On odd-numbered levels, the player's character is a gorilla who eats coconuts; on even-numbered levels, it's a paint roller. The game's enemy Amidars are savages and pigs respectively. Whenever a rectangular portion of the board is cleared (either by collecting all surrounding coconuts, or painting all surrounding edges), the rectangle is coloured in and on the even levels, bonus points are awarded, while on the odd-numbered levels, points are awarded for each coconut eaten. 

If players manage to fill in all four corner rectangles of a board, they are briefly able to kill the enemies by touching them (similar to the 'Power-pill' from Namco's Pac-Man series). Enemies killed in this way fall to the bottom of the screen and recover after a few seconds.

On the even-numbered paint roller levels, the roller cannot move too far from grid rectangles that have already been filled without running out of paint and having to return to completed parts of the map to refresh its supply. When this happens, any painted lines that are not part of a filled rectangle will vanish and must be painted again. This means that the player must build their completed squares around the starting point of the level and spread outwards, rather than completing squares on any part of the board as they can on the odd-numbered Gorilla levels. This makes filling in the corner rectangles to become invincible much more difficult.

In between levels players are given the possibility of earning 5,000 bonus points. Here, an Amidar moves across the top of the screen, by pushing the jump button the Amidar traces a random path down towards the bottom of the screen. If the Amidar reaches a bunch of bananas, a bonus is awarded.
amidar.desc:
Amidar 是一款抽象街機遊戲，玩家必須為屏幕上的所有矩形“著色”。每個關卡都有許多被稱為“Amidars”的巡邏敵人，必須避開它們，但玩家可以通過一個跳躍按鈕來幫助完成任務，使用該按鈕時，屏幕上的所有敵人都會跳躍，讓玩家有時間逃跑。然而，每個級別只給出了三個“跳躍”。

在奇數關卡中，玩家的角色是一隻吃椰子的大猩猩；在奇數關卡中，玩家的角色是一隻吃椰子的大猩猩；在奇數關卡中，玩家的角色是一隻吃椰子的大猩猩。在偶數層，它是一個油漆滾筒。遊戲中的敵人阿米達分別是野人和豬。每當棋盤的一個矩形部分被清除時（通過收集所有周圍的椰子，或者塗上所有周圍的邊緣），該矩形就會被著色，並且在偶數級別上，將獲得獎勵積分，而在奇數級別上，每吃掉一個椰子就會獲得積分。

如果玩家設法填滿棋盤的所有四個角矩形，他們就可以通過觸摸敵人來短暫殺死敵人（類似於 Namco 的吃豆人系列中的“能量藥丸”）。以這種方式殺死的敵人會掉到屏幕底部並在幾秒鐘後恢復。

在偶數編號的油漆滾筒級別上，滾筒不能從已經填充的網格矩形移動太遠，否則油漆就會耗盡，並且必須返回到地圖的已完成部分以刷新其供應。發生這種情況時，任何不屬於填充矩形的繪製線都將消失，必須重新繪製。這意味著玩家必須圍繞關卡起點構建已完成的方塊並向外擴展，而不是像在奇數大猩猩關卡中那樣在棋盤的任何部分完成方塊。這使得填充角矩形變得無敵變得更加困難。

在關卡之間，玩家有可能獲得 5,000 點獎勵積分。在這裡，阿米達在屏幕頂部移動，通過按下跳躍按鈕，阿米達會沿著一條隨機路徑向下移動到屏幕底部。如果阿米達爾到達一串香蕉，就會獲得獎勵。

offroad.name: 鋼鐵俠伊万·斯圖爾特的超級越野
offroad.original_desc:
In his never ending quest for adventure and excitement, man invented off-road racing. These races were then brought before the masses by converting huge sports stadiums into dirt and mud obstacle courses in which off-road 'Ironmen' battled for top honors. 

Now the Leland Corporation brings this fast moving, hard driving sport to the video game arena. 

Ironman Ivan Stewart's Super Off-Road is stadium off-road racing at it's best. One to three players are asked to test their dirt track skills against the best dirt truck driver in the world. 

Contestants compete on eight different tracks with a total of 16 configurations and these courses are packed with enough jumps, bumps, hills, and holes to challenge even the most skillful driver. 

Winning drivers earn 'cash' prizes, and use this 'cash' to 'buff out' their machines. At the end of each race, players take their trucks to the 'Speed Shop' to buy better shocks, tires, engines, and higher top speed. They can also buy nitro packs to help them blast over the jumps and through the mud. 

The 'Convert-a-Credit' feature allows drivers to add to their winnings by using credits as 'cash'. Each additional quarter, when converted, becomes $200,000 in game 'cash' and this additional 'cash' may be used for purchases in the 'Speed Shop'.
offroad.desc:
在對冒險和刺激永無休止的追求中，人類發明了越野賽車。然後，這些比賽通過將巨大的體育場改造成泥土障礙賽而被帶到大眾面前，越野“鐵人”在其中爭奪最高榮譽。

現在，利蘭公司將這種快速移動、艱苦駕駛的運動帶入了視頻遊戲領域。

Ironman Ivan Stewart 的超級越野是最好的體育場越野賽車。一到三名玩家被要求與世界上最好的土卡車司機測試他們的土道技能。

參賽者在 8 條不同的賽道上進行比賽，共有 16 種配置，這些賽道充滿了足夠的跳躍、顛簸、山丘和洞，即使是最熟練的車手也能挑戰。

獲勝的車手可以獲得“現金”獎勵，並用這些“現金”來“打磨”他們的機器。在每場比賽結束時，玩家將他們的卡車帶到“速度商店”購買更好的減震器、輪胎、發動機和更高的最高速度。他們還可以購買硝基包來幫助他們跳躍和穿過泥漿。

“積分兌換”功能允許駕駛員將積分用作“現金”來增加獎金。每增加一個季度，轉換後就會變成 200,000 美元的遊戲“現金”，並且這些額外的“現金”可用於在“Speed Shop”中購買。

cybots.name: 網絡機器人:鋼之瘋狂
cybots.original_desc: Near the end of the 21st century, Earth begins to become overpopulated, leading to many people living in man-made space colonies. The primary army of Earth called "Earth Corps", has been conducting nefarious experiments and their work, along with the actions of the playable characters, will determine Earth's future.
cybots.desc: 臨近 21 世紀末，地球開始人口過剩，導致許多人生活在人造太空殖民地。地球的主要軍隊稱為“地球軍團”，一直在進行邪惡的實驗，他們的工作以及可玩角色的行動將決定地球的未來。

junofrst.name: 朱諾第一
junofrst.original_desc:
Juno First a vertically-scrolling shoot-em-up viewed from a third-person perspective in which players must destroy waves of attacking aliens. Unlike other shooters of the time, the game's enemies don't line up in a gallery formation but instead move freely around the screen. Because of this, the player's ship can move both forwards and backwards (in addition to left and right).

As well as the attacking aliens a spherical 'space capsule' occasionally appears on-screen and if shot, it releases an enemy astronaut that can then be captured. This must be done within a set time, however, with the screen having  a red tint for the period in which rescue is possible. During the capture phase, every enemy the player shoots is worth an additional 200 points. 

As a last resort players also have the option to 'warp' to another random part of the play area. This is highly risky as it may place the player's ship in a position more dangerous than the one it left. Players are allowed three warps per level.

Starting formations vary from stage to stage and the aliens mutate into more dangerous forms the longer they survive. To complete a level all aliens must be destroyed.
junofrst.desc:
《Juno First》是一款從第三人稱視角觀看的垂直滾動射擊遊戲，玩家必須摧毀一波又一波的外星人攻擊。與當時的其他射擊遊戲不同，遊戲中的敵人不會排成長廊陣型，而是在屏幕上自由移動。正因為如此，玩家的飛船可以向前和向後移動（除了左右移動之外）。

除了攻擊外星人之外，屏幕上偶爾還會出現一個球形“太空艙”，如果被射擊，它會釋放出一名敵方宇航員，然後可以將其捕獲。然而，這必須在設定的時間內完成，在可以救援的時間內屏幕呈紅色。在捕獲階段，玩家射中的每個敵人都會額外獲得 200 分。

作為最後的手段，玩家還可以選擇“扭曲”到遊戲區域的另一個隨機部分。這是非常危險的，因為它可能會將玩家的飛船置於比離開時更危險的位置。每個級別允許玩家進行 3 次扭曲。

起始形態因階段而異，外星人生存的時間越長，就會變異成更危險的形態。要完成一個關卡，必須消滅所有外星人。

rtypeleo.name: R-Type Leo
rtypeleo.original_desc:
R-Type Leo is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up and is the third and final arcade release of this classic series (although numerous console-only sequels would follow, see 'Series' for details).

Mankind are currently at peace with their former adversaries, the Bydo Empire, and have taken the opportunity to undertake a massive project called 'Project Paradise'. This involved the construction of an artificial terrestrial-like planet called 'Eden', created as a safe haven should humanity once again find itself under threat. However, soon after construction is completed, 'Major' - the bio-computer system responsible for maintaining Eden - malfunctions, taking control of the planet's defences and launching an attack on mankind. It is up to the newly-developed 'R-9 Leo' fleet to fly in and stop Major's assault on its creators.

R-Type Leo deviates from the gameplay style of its predecessors by removing the use of both the 'Force Pod' and the 'Wave Cannon'. The new weapons are called 'Force Bits' (later identified in "R-Type Final" as "Psy Bits") and the 'Bit Shot'. The three 'Force Bit' weapon types are:
Red - Claw Laser: a powerful horizontal laser beam and horizontal traverse wave
Blue - Mirror Laser: fires multiple, ricocheting lasers.
Green - Search Laser LRG: fires semi-homing lasers that can bend at 90 degree angles.

Unlike previous 'Bit' devices, the 'Force/Psy Bits' are capable of firing either forwards or backwards (their direction dictated by the movement of the ship itself). Finally, the 'Wave Cannon' is replaced by a 'Bit Shot', in which the Psy Bits detach from the ship and collide with the nearest enemy. The Bits can only do this for a limited time before running out of energy, and must be recalled to the ship to recharge.

R Type Leo consists of 6 stages and is the first game in the series to allow 2 players to play simultaneously.
rtypeleo.desc:
《R-Type Leo》是一款水平滾動射擊遊戲，是這個經典系列的第三個也是最後一個街機版本（儘管隨後會出現許多僅限主機的續集，請參閱“系列”了解詳細信息）。

人類目前與他們的前對手拜多帝國和平相處，並藉此機會開展了一項名為“天堂計劃”的大規模項目。這涉及到建造一個名為“伊甸園”的類地行星，作為人類再次發現自己受到威脅時的避風港。然而，建造完成後不久，“少校”——負責維護伊甸園的生物計算機系統——出現故障，控制了星球的防禦並向人類發起攻擊。新開發的“R-9 Leo”機隊需要飛來阻止少校對其創造者的攻擊。

R-Type Leo 與前作的遊戲風格不同，取消了“Force Pod”和“Wave Cannon”的使用。新武器被稱為“Force Bits”（後來在“R-Type Final”中被稱為“Psy Bits”）和“Bit Shot”。三種“Force Bit”武器類型是：
紅爪激光：強大的水平激光束和水平橫波
藍色 - 鏡面激光：發射多束跳彈激光。
綠色 - 搜索激光 LRG：發射可彎曲 90 度角的半尋的激光。

與之前的“Bit”裝置不同，“Force/Psy Bits”能夠向前或向後發射（其方向由船舶本身的運動決定）。最後，“波炮”被“比特射擊”取代，其中心靈比特從船上分離並與最近的敵人碰撞。比特只能在能量耗盡之前在有限的時間內執行此操作，並且必須將其召回船上進行充電。

R Type Leo 由 6 個階段組成，是該系列中第一款允許 2 名玩家同時玩的遊戲。

puyopuya.name: 噗喲噗喲
puyopuya.original_desc:
Puyo Puyo is an incredibly addictive and original puzzle game in which players must form chains of four or more beans (known as 'Puyos') of the same colour to make to disappear.

Players can hinder their opponent by forming Puyo combinations; a successfully formed chain removes some some of the player's Puyos and causes 'junk' Puyos to fall into the opponent's play area. As these Junk Puyos are transparent, they cannot be used to form a chain and can only be destroyed when a nearby chain is created.
puyopuya.desc:
Puyo Puyo 是一款非常令人上癮的原創益智遊戲，玩家必須將四個或更多相同顏色的豆子（稱為“Puyos”）組成鏈才能使其消失。

玩家可以通過形成Puyo組合來阻礙對手；成功形成的鏈條會移除玩家的一些 Puyo，並導致“垃圾”Puyo 落入對手的遊戲區域。由於這些垃圾 Puyo 是透明的，因此它們不能用來形成鏈，只能在創建附近的鏈時將其銷毀。

shangon.name: 超級挂機
shangon.original_desc:
Super Hang-On is a checkpoint-based racing game and is the sequel to the acclaimed "Hang-On", released two years earlier. As with the prequel, players take control of a superbike and must race over twisting road-based circuits, avoiding rival bikers and trying to reach the end-of-stage checkpoint before the time limit expires.

For the sequel, Sega introduced the hilly, undulating roads that had been executed so superbly in 1986's "Out Run". The gameplay was further enhanced with the introduction of the 'turbo' button. Upon reaching the bike's maximum speed of 280kph, players could press and hold the turbo and push the bike up to 324kph - something that was necessary to beat the game's extremely tight time limits. This had to be used carefully, however, as the increase in speed made the bike harder to control and accelerating at the wrong time would invariably see a head-on collision with either rival bikers or the road-side objects that litter the stages.

Players could chose to race on any one of four courses: Africa, Asia, America and Europe. Africa is the easiest and shortest of the four, with each subsequent course becoming both more demanding - with tighter bends and more aggressive rival racers - and having a greater number of stages to have to beat. Africa, for example, is made up of only six stages, while the hardest course, Europe, has eighteen stages.
shangon.desc:
Super Hang-On 是一款基於檢查站的賽車遊戲，是兩年前發布的廣受好評的“Hang-On”的續集。與前傳一樣，玩家控制一輛超級摩托車，必須在蜿蜒的公路賽道上比賽，避開競爭對手的摩托車手，並試圖在時間限製到期之前到達賽段結束的檢查站。

在續作中，世嘉引入了在 1986 年的《Out Run》中表現出色的丘陵起伏道路。“渦輪”按鈕的引入進一步增強了遊戲玩法。當自行車達到 280 公里/小時的最高速度時，玩家可以按住渦輪並將自行車推至 324 公里/小時 - 這是打破遊戲極其緊迫的時間限制所必需的。然而，這一點必須謹慎使用，因為速度的增加使自行車更難控制，並且在錯誤的時間加速總是會與競爭對手的自行車手或散落在舞台上的路邊物體發生正面碰撞。

玩家可以選擇在非洲、亞洲、美洲和歐洲四個球場中的任何一個進行比賽。非洲是四個賽道中最容易、最短的一個，隨後的每一個賽道都變得更加苛刻——有更緊的彎道和更具侵略性的競爭對手——並且有更多的賽段需要克服。例如，非洲僅由六個賽段組成，而最難的賽道歐洲則有十八個賽段。

uccops.name: 臥底警察
uccops.original_desc:
Undercover Cops is a horizontally-scrolling beat-em-up for up to three players in which Dr. Clayborn and his henchmen have taken control of the city. Police Commissioner Gordon has called on three of New York's Finest undercover cops: Bubba, an ex-professional football player; Flame, a former Miss America; and Claude, a retired philosophy teacher. They must fight every lackey and vanquish Dr. Clayborn in order to restore law and order to the city. 

Besides the usual human thugs, players fight strange mole creatures and mutants with jet packs and blades for hands. Players can never use enemy weapons, but the stages contain objects that can be picked up and used instead, These include burning oil drums, steel girders, concrete columns that shatter on impact, boxes of hand grenades and giant fish. 

As well as the standard punch and kick moves, each character also has a special attack. This move is more powerful than standard attacks but each time a special attack is executed, some of the player's health is lost.

Player characters can eat mice, frogs, birds and snails to restore their health. The game consists of five stages with a powerful enemy boss character waiting at the end of each one.
uccops.desc:
《臥底警察》是一款水平捲軸格鬥遊戲，最多可容納三名玩家，克萊伯恩博士和他的追隨者控制了這座城市。警察局長戈登召集了三名紐約最優秀的臥底警察：布巴，一名前職業橄欖球運動員；弗萊姆，前美國小姐；克勞德是一位退休哲學老師。他們必須與每一個走狗戰鬥並擊敗克萊伯恩博士，以恢復城市的法律和秩序。

除了常見的人類暴徒之外，玩家還可以使用噴氣背包和雙手刀片與奇怪的鼴鼠生物和變種人作戰。玩家永遠無法使用敵方武器，但舞台上包含可以拾取和使用的物體，其中包括燃燒的油桶、鋼樑、撞擊時破碎的混凝土柱、手榴彈盒和巨型魚。

除了標準的拳打腳踢動作外，每個角色還有特殊的攻擊方式。此動作比標準攻擊更強大，但每次執行特殊攻擊時，玩家都會損失一些生命值。

玩家角色可以吃老鼠、青蛙、鳥類和蝸牛來恢復健康。遊戲由五個階段組成，每個階段的最後都有一個強大的敵方頭目角色等待著。

asteroid.name: 小行星
asteroid.original_desc:
Asteroids is a legendary, genre defining game - in an era replete with genre-defining classics - in which a single player takes control of a spaceship trapped in the middle of an asteroid belt. A number of large, slow-moving asteroids drift randomly around the play area and must be shot by the player. When shot, the asteroids will break into a number of smaller pieces which must also be shot until eventually, all of the asteroids and fragments will be destroyed and the next wave begins. 

Asteroids introduced real-world physics to video games for the first time, with speed and inertia all adding to the player's problems. As well as the inertia of the player's ship - forcing the player to allow for the ship slowing down and speeding up whenever the Thrust button was utilized - shot asteroids would often send fragments flying in seemingly random directions, and at varying and unpredictable speeds. 

As well as the ever-present asteroids, flying saucers also make a regular appearance. These move horizontally and diagonally around the screen, firing at the player's ship, and must be quickly destroyed. They are destroyed when hit by the player's shot, when hit by a saucer's shot or when they collide with an asteroid.
asteroid.desc:
《小行星》是一款傳奇的、定義流派的遊戲——在一個充滿流派定義經典的時代——其中一個玩家控制一艘被困在小行星帶中間的宇宙飛船。許多大型、緩慢移動的小行星在遊戲區域隨機漂移，必須由玩家射擊。當被射擊時，小行星將分裂成許多較小的碎片，這些碎片也必須被射擊，直到最終所有小行星和碎片都將被摧毀，下一波開始。

《小行星》首次將現實世界的物理學引入到電子遊戲中，速度和慣性都增加了玩家的問題。除了玩家飛船的慣性（迫使玩家在使用推力按鈕時允許飛船減速和加速）之外，射擊的小行星通常會以看似隨機的方向、以變化且不可預測的速度發射碎片。

除了始終存在的小行星之外，飛碟也經常出現。它們在屏幕上水平和對角移動，向玩家的飛船開火，必須迅速摧毀。當它們被玩家的射擊擊中、被飛碟的射擊擊中或與小行星相撞時，它們就會被摧毀。

nslasher.name: 夜間殺手
nslasher.original_desc: A horror-themed brawler where three elite fighters, an American cyborg monster hunter, a European vampire hunter, and an Asian martial arts expert, must save humanity from an army of monsters, mutants, and the undead.
nslasher.desc: 一款以恐怖為主題的亂鬥遊戲，三名精英戰士、一名美國機器人怪物獵人、一名歐洲吸血鬼獵人和一名亞洲武術專家，必須從怪物、變種人和不死族的大軍手中拯救人類。

sinistar.name: 星星
sinistar.original_desc:
Your intergalactic crystal-mining mission takes you to the antipodes of the known universe. But your parametric DeepSpace scanner faithfully displays the sector of the galaxy you presently occupy (including an area fully three parsecs across, no less)! 

Keep the galaxy safe for all its sinizens! Fiendish Worker ships from the planet Sporg will attempt to fabricate a Sinistar from the remains of derelict planetoids in your very sector. You must not let them do this for two reasons: 
1) These planetoids contain the life-sustaining crystals that your civilization requires for its vital technologies. 
2) With the eminently unstable Sinistar in their possession, the Sprogites can lay waste to any civilization in your sector. You alone stand in their way. 

You must mine the sinisite crystals. Williams has equipped you with the latest heuristic electret cannon technology. All you need to do is aim at a planetoid and shoot. Now collect your motherlode! 

In fact, only with sinisite can you manufacture sinibombs to eradicate the Sinistar. But you must also rebuff the Workers and disintegrate their even more aggressive comrades-at-arms, the evil skelomorphic Warriors! Intelligent beings everywhere depend on your courage, your dedication, your reserve, your shrewd command of tactical invention! It's up to you, space cadet!
sinistar.desc:
您的星際水晶開採任務將帶您前往已知宇宙的對立面。但是您的參數深空掃描儀忠實地顯示您當前佔據的星系扇區（包括整整三秒差距的區域，不少於）！

確保銀河系中所有人類的安全！來自 Sporg 星球的惡魔工人飛船將嘗試用你們所在星區的廢棄小行星的殘骸製造出一艘 Sinistar。您不能讓他們這樣做，原因有兩個：
1) 這些小行星含有你們文明的重要技術所需的維持生命的晶體。
2) 憑藉極不穩定的星星，幼蟲們可以摧毀你所在星區的任何文明。你一個人擋著他們的路。

你必須開採紫矽石晶體。威廉姆斯為您配備了最新的啟發式駐極體炮技術。您所需要做的就是瞄準小行星並射擊。現在收集你的母礦！

事實上，只有用sinisite才能製造sinibombs來消滅Sinistar。但你也必須拒絕工人並瓦解他們更具侵略性的戰友，邪惡的骷髏戰士！世界各地的智慧生物都依賴於你的勇氣、你的奉獻、你的儲備以及你對戰術發明的精明指揮！這取決於你，太空學員！

crimfgt2.name: 犯罪鬥士
crimfgt2.original_desc:
Crime Fighters is a beat-em up arcade game where your job is to rescue several women that have been kidnapped by a crime boss and clean up the streets by pummeling as many gang members as possible with your bare hands, as well as anything else you might possibly discover. You will travel through eight levels throughout the city, in locations that range from subways to the docks. 

At the end of every stage is a fight with a boss character, many of whom happen to be knockoffs of famous horror movie antagonists like Freddy Kruger and Jason Voorhees. Scoring is handled by a system wherein you simply get a point for every enemy you kill. Occasionally examples of cartoon physics pop up, such as when your character gets squashed flat by a moving steamroller or a falling billboard.
crimfgt2.desc:
《Crime Fighters》是一款清版街機遊戲，您的任務是營救幾名被犯罪頭目綁架的婦女，並通過徒手毆打盡可能多的幫派成員來清理街道以及您可能發現的其他任何東西。您將穿越整個城市的八個樓層，地點從地鐵到碼頭。

每個階段的最後都會與一個 Boss 角色進行戰鬥，其中許多角色恰好是弗雷迪·克魯格和傑森·沃希斯等著名恐怖電影對手的翻版。評分是由一個系統處理的，您只需殺死每個敵人即可獲得一分。偶爾會出現卡通物理的例子，例如當你的角色被移動的壓路機或掉落的廣告牌壓扁時。

s1945iii.name: 前鋒1945 III
s1945iii.original_desc: Year 1999, fall. The countless super minimum machine group 'nano-machine', which came flying, invaded the principal weapon and military terminals of each country from outer space and began multiplication. This weapon group which is automated with the 'nano-machines' repeated attack with non discrimination and the metropoles of each country were in a devastating state. A fear of the extensive nuclear warfare with the strategy nuclear missile error morphism hit the world!!! Barely the unit of each country which prevents the invasion of the 'nano- machine' is summoned because of the unmanned weapon eradication maneuvers. So, fighting with the weapons of the entire world was not enough. The Strikers start the attack on the enemy center! By the way of the time of half a century, new legend of special force STRIKERS now starts!
s1945iii.desc: 1999年，秋天。飛來的無數超極小機械群“納米機械”，從外太空侵入各國的主要武器和軍事終端，開始繁衍。這個由“納米機器”自動化的武器集團無差別地反復攻擊，各國大都市都陷入了毀滅性的狀態。一場對大規模核戰爭的恐懼與戰略核導彈錯誤態射襲擊了世界！由於無人武器消滅演習，幾乎沒有召集各國阻止“納米機器”入侵的部隊。所以，用全世界的武器來戰鬥是不夠的。前鋒們開始向敵方中心發起攻擊！時隔半個世紀，特種部隊STRIKERS的新傳奇就此開啟！

stmblade.name: 風暴之刃
stmblade.original_desc:
Storm Blade is a military themed vertical scrolling shoot 'em up game where you take control of either Lucky J. Striker in his F14 Tomcat, Alex in his MiG-29 Fulcrum, Camel Yuki Anderson in her AV-BB Harrier II or old man Isoroku Kaionji in his Zero Fighter Kamikaze Special. Each with their own weapons patrons.

As you make progress and fight of various planes, helicopters, tanks, static guns, ships and bosses power-ups come available. Power-ups cans can be collected from destroyed enemies and increase your firepower. These come in two forms: a normal power-up (P) and a super power-up (F). There are also a limited number of super bombs available that do a vast amount of damage. Destroyed enemies sometimes drop additional super bombs (B). The game can be played solo or with a friend.
stmblade.desc:
Storm Blade 是一款軍事主題的垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，您可以控制駕駛 F14 Tomcat 的 Lucky J. Striker、駕駛 MiG-29 Fulcrum 的 Alex、駕駛 AV-BB Harrier II 的 Camel Yuki Anderson 或駕駛零式戰鬥機 Kamikaze Special 的老人 Isoroku Kaionji。每個人都有自己的武器贊助人。

當你取得進步並與各種飛機、直升機、坦克、靜態槍、船隻和頭目進行戰鬥時，就會獲得能量提升。可以從被摧毀的敵人身上收集能量罐並增強你的火力。它們有兩種形式：普通強化 (P) 和超級強化 (F)。還有數量有限但能造成巨大傷害的超級炸彈。被摧毀的敵人有時會掉落額外的超級炸彈（B）。該遊戲可以單獨玩，也可以與朋友一起玩。

nibbler.name: 衝剪機
nibbler.original_desc: A maze game where you control Nibbler the snake to eat food around the maze. With each food you eat, Nibbler gets bigger. Complete each level by eating all the food on the screen. You lose a life if Nibbler hits his own body.
nibbler.desc: 一款迷宮遊戲，您可以控制蛇 Nibbler 在迷宮周圍吃食物。隨著你吃下的每一種食物，Nibbler 都會變大。通過吃掉屏幕上的所有食物來完成每個級別。如果尼布勒撞到自己的身體，你就會喪命。

wbmlb.name: 怪物之地的神奇男孩
wbmlb.original_desc:
Wonder Boy in Monster Land is a multi-directional scrolling platform hack 'n' slash game with RPG elements, in which the game's hero, Wonder Boy, has seen his home of Wonderland invaded by the evil 'MEKA Dragon' and its army of minions. 

At the start of the game Wonder Boy is unarmed, but the mayor of Wonder Land (as it was known before the invasion) gives him a short sword to help him in his quest. Wonder Boy has a life meter represented as a series of red hearts and whenever he sustains damage, the hearts deplete. When all the hearts are depleted, Wonder Boy dies and the game ends. As well as the life meter, there is also an Hourglass Timer at the top of the screen; whenever this runs out, Wonder Boy loses some life. The Timer can be refilled by collecting hourglasses or by visiting hospitals or taverns.
wbmlb.desc:
《Wonder Boy in Monster Land》是一款帶有 RPG 元素的多向捲軸平台砍殺遊戲，遊戲的英雄 Wonder Boy 目睹了他的仙境家園被邪惡的“MEKA Dragon”及其爪牙大軍入侵。

遊戲開始時，神奇男孩手無寸鐵，但仙境市長（在入侵之前眾所周知）給了他一把短劍來幫助他完成任務。神奇男孩的生命表由一系列紅心表示，每當他受到傷害時，紅心就會耗盡。當所有的心都耗盡時，神奇男孩就會死亡，遊戲結束。除了生命表外，屏幕頂部還有一個沙漏計時器；每當這用完時，神奇男孩就會失去一些生命。計時器可以通過收集沙漏或訪問醫院或酒館來補充。

ldrun4.original_name: Lode Runner IV - Teikoku Karano Dasshutsu
ldrun4.name: 逃離帝國
ldrun4.original_desc: The subtitle of this game translates from Japanese as 'Escape From the Empire'.
ldrun4.desc: 該遊戲的副標題從日語翻譯為“逃離帝國”。

nrallyx.name: 新拉力賽X
nrallyx.original_desc:
New Rally-X is a scrolling, overhead mazed-based racing game in which the player drives a racing car around a maze and must collect ten yellow flags before the car's fuel runs out. In-game opponents consist of red enemy cars that pursue and try to ram into and destroy the player's car. The enemy cars are faster moving than the player's vehicle. 

The player's car automatically moves in whichever direction the joystick is pushed and if it runs into a wall, it will turn automatically and continue moving. To disrupt the chasing enemy cars a smoke-screen can be activated that trails behind the player's car, causing any pursuing vehicles to crash. Activating the smoke screen uses a small amount of fuel, however, so players must be careful to not overuse it.

Each maze also has rock formations and crashing into these will result in the loss of a player car. A radar display to the right-hand side of the playing area shows the relative positions of the flags, rocks and enemy vehicles. 

In addition to the standard ten flags, each maze also contains a special flag (indicated by the letter "S"). If collected, the value earned for the round's remaining flags doubles from 100 to 200 points. If the player dies before the end of that round, the flag value is set back to 100 points and the double bonus is lost. 

The mazes also contain a 'lucky flag'. This is marked with the letter 'L' and - providing there are still standard flags remaining - awards the player extra points for remaining fuel, after which the round will continue as normal. Upon completion of a round, bonus points are awarded based on how much fuel the player has remaining.

As players progress through the rounds, the number or pursuing enemy cars increases.
nrallyx.desc:
New Rally-X 是一款滾動式、頭頂迷宮賽車遊戲，玩家駕駛賽車繞迷宮行駛，必須在汽車燃料耗盡之前收集十面黃旗。遊戲中的對手由紅色敵方汽車組成，它們會追擊並試圖撞上並摧毀玩家的汽車。敵人的車輛比玩家的車輛移動得更快。

玩家的汽車會自動向推動操縱桿的方向移動，如果撞到牆壁，它會自動轉向並繼續行駛。為了擾亂追擊的敵方車輛，可以激活煙幕，尾隨玩家的車輛，導致任何追擊的車輛墜毀。然而，激活煙幕需要少量燃料，因此玩家必須小心不要過度使用它。

每個迷宮也有岩層，撞到這些岩層會導致玩家汽車損失。比賽區域右側的雷達顯示屏顯示旗幟、岩石和敵方車輛的相對位置。

除了標準的十面旗幟外，每個迷宮還包含一面特殊的旗幟（用字母“S”表示）。如果收集到，該回合剩餘旗幟的價值將翻倍，從 100 點增加到 200 點。如果玩家在該輪結束之前死亡，則標記值將重新設置為 100 分，並且雙倍獎金將丟失。

迷宮還包含一面“幸運旗”。它標有字母“L”，並且 - 假設仍然有剩餘的標准旗幟 - 獎勵玩家剩餘燃料的額外積分，之後回合將照常繼續。完成一輪後，根據玩家剩餘的燃料量獎勵積分。

隨著玩家在回合中的進展，追擊敵方車輛的數量也會增加。

robotron.name: 機器人：2084
robotron.original_desc:
Set in the year 2084, Robotron is a single-screen shoot-em-up in which super-intelligent self-aware robots known as 'Robotrons' - designed and built to help mankind - have revolted against their creators and vowed to either reprogram the humans into Robotrons or, failing this, wipe-out the human race entirely. 

The player must destroy the robots and rescue the Earth's remaining human families. The player's only weapon is a multi-directional Anti-Robot Laser Gun. Used effectively, it will give players the power to destroy all the Robot waves, with the exception of the indestructible 'Hulk' unit. 

At the start of the attack wave, players will have three chances to wipe out the enemy and advance to the next wave. Every 25,000 points players are granted another chance to complete their mission. 

MAN, WOMAN, CHILD: These are the only three types of human clones left on Earth. Defenseless and easy prey to the Robots, they are totally dependent upon players for their survival and will wander aimlessly until the player makes contact with them. Touching them will place them under the player's protective powers and earn them the following points: 1,000 for rescuing the 1st human; 2,000 for the 2nd: 3,000 for the 3rd; 4,000 for the 4th; 5,000 for the 5th; and 5,000 for every additional human saved. At the beginning of each new wave and when the player loses a turn, rescue scoring will again begin at 1,000.
robotron.desc:
《機器人大戰》是一款單屏射擊遊戲，背景設定在 2084 年，其中被稱為“機器人大戰”的超級智能自我意識機器人（為幫助人類而設計和製造）反抗了它們的創造者，並發誓要么將人類重新編程為機器人大戰，要么徹底消滅人類。

玩家必須摧毀機器人並拯救地球上僅存的人類家庭。玩家唯一的武器是多向反機器人激光槍。如果有效使用，它將賦予玩家摧毀所有機器人波的能力，除了堅不可摧的“綠巨人”單位。

在攻擊波次開始時，玩家將有3次消滅敵人並進入下一波次的機會。每獲得 25,000 分，玩家就有一次完成任務的機會。

男人、女人、孩子：這是地球上僅存的三種克隆人。它們毫無防禦能力，很容易成為機器人的獵物，它們完全依賴玩家生存，並且會漫無目的地徘徊，直到玩家與它們接觸。觸摸它們將使它們受到玩家的保護，並獲得以下積分： 拯救第一個人類，獲得 1,000 點；第二次2000；第三次3000；第四次4,000；第5次5,000；每增加一人獲救，即可獲得 5,000 人的救助。在每個新波開始時以及當玩家失去回合時，救援得分將再次從 1,000 開始。

ddragonu.name: 雙龍
ddragonu.original_desc:
Double Dragon is a side-scrolling beat-em-up for one or two players, featuring twin brothers and martial arts masters, "Billy & Jimmy Lee". The brothers must defeat the savage street gang known as the 'Black Warriors' to rescue Billy's kidnapped girlfriend, Marian. Standing between the brothers and Marian are four huge, colorful and varied levels; each populated with a wide variety of thugs.

Many of the game's enemies carry weapons (knives, baseball bats etc.) and should Billy or Jimmy manage to knock the weapons from the enemies' hands, the heroes can pick the weapons up and use them against the enemies.

The Black Warriors is made up of six distinct enemy characters- plus Willy, the game's final boss - with each differing in both physical appearance and fighting style. The members of the Black Warriors consist of the following fighters: 
Williams - A street punk in a tank top. In addition to the standard punches and jump kicks, his signature technique is a body blow to the stomach. He also wields weapons such as baseball bats, knives and dynamite sticks.
Rowper - A punk who wears matching-colored pants and shirtless vest. He wields all the same weapons as Williams, but can also lift and throw heavy objects such as oildrums, boxes and stones.
Linda - Female punk who usually carries a whip. She's not very strong, as she falls down to ground with a couple of punches or a single kick (because of this, she is the only regular-sized enemy who cannot be placed on a headlock).
Abobo - A tall, big-muscled bald guy. His attacks includes punches, a standing kick and a body toss. He can also lift and throw heavy objects like Rowper. Due to his large size, he cannot be put into a headlock.
Boss 1 - The first boss, a head-swap of Abobo with a Mr. T-style mohawk and beard. Fights just like Abobo, only with an added double-handed slap. Unlike Abobo, he does not use weapons. A green version of him appears as the Mission 3 boss.
Boss 2 - The second boss. A head swap of the player who uses almost all the same techniques. 
Willy - The game's final boss, armed, somewhat unfairly, with a machine-gun.

Double Dragon was a huge success due to the many game-play innovations it brought to the genre (see TRIVIA for details), but it demonstrates its final moment of inspired genius at the very end of the game. Should both players still be alive after the final boss has been defeated, they will then have to fight each OTHER. The winner of this fight will be the one who wins Marian's affections.
ddragonu.desc:
《雙截龍》是一款適合一到兩名玩家的橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，主角是雙胞胎兄弟和武術大師“比利和吉米·李”。兄弟倆必須擊敗被稱為“黑武士”的野蠻街頭幫派，以營救比利被綁架的女友瑪麗安。站在兄弟倆和瑪麗安之間的是四個巨大的、色彩繽紛、變化多樣的樓層；每個地方都住著各種各樣的暴徒。

遊戲中的許多敵人都攜帶武器（刀、棒球棒等），如果比利或吉米設法從敵人手中擊落武器，英雄們就可以撿起武器並用它們來對付敵人。

黑武士由六個不同的敵人角色組成 - 加上游戲的最終老闆威利 - 每個角色的外表和戰鬥風格都不同。黑武士的成員由以下戰士組成：
威廉姆斯 - 穿著背心的街頭朋克。除了標準的拳擊和跳踢之外，他的招牌技術是對腹部的身體打擊。他還使用棒球棒、刀和炸藥棒等武器。
Rowper - 穿著同色褲子和赤裸背心的朋克。他使用與威廉姆斯相同的武器，但也可以舉起和投擲重物，如油桶、盒子和石頭。
琳達（Linda） - 通常攜帶鞭子的女性朋克。她不是很強壯，幾拳或一腳就能讓她倒在地上（正因為如此，她是唯一一個不能被鎖頭的常規體型敵人）。
阿波波——一個身材高大、肌肉發達的禿頭傢伙。他的攻擊方式包括拳擊、站立踢和身體拋擲。他還可以像 Rowper 一樣舉起和投擲重物。由於他的體型較大，因此無法對其進行頭部鎖住。
Boss 1 - 第一個 Boss，是 Abobo 的換頭者，留著 Mr. T 風格的莫霍克髮型和鬍鬚。戰斗方式和阿波波一樣，只是多了一個雙手巴掌。與阿波波不同，他不使用武器。他的綠色版本作為 Mission 3 的 Boss 出現。
Boss 2 - 第二個 Boss。使用幾乎所有相同技術的玩家的頭部交換。
威利 - 遊戲的最終首領，帶著機關槍，這有點不公平。

《雙截龍》之所以取得巨大成功，是因為它為該類型帶來了許多遊戲創新（詳情請參閱 TRIVIA），但它在遊戲的最後展現了其天才般的靈感。如果最終 Boss 被擊敗後兩名玩家仍然活著，那麼他們將不得不互相戰鬥。這場戰鬥的勝利者將是贏得瑪麗安芳心的人。

bubbobr1.name: 泡泡龍
bubbobr1.original_desc:
One or two players take on the role of Bub and Bob, two cute dinosaurs who must battle through 100 platform-packed single screen levels to rescue their girlfriends. Bub and Bob are armed only with the ability to blow bubbles, in which the game's many enemies can be trapped and killed. The bubbles can also be used as temporary platforms, to help the dinosaurs reach previously inaccessible areas of a level. 

Any trapped enemies who are not killed quickly enough will turn red and escape their bubble prison. These angry enemies are much faster than before, making them harder to kill. Enemies also become angry if players are taking too long to complete a level. Defeated enemies are turned into bonus fruit items that can be collected for points.
bubbobr1.desc:
一到兩名玩家扮演巴布和鮑勃的角色，這兩隻可愛的恐龍必須通過 100 個平台豐富的單屏關卡來拯救他們的女朋友。巴布和鮑勃的武裝只有吹泡泡的能力，遊戲中的許多敵人都可以被困住並殺死。這些氣泡還可以用作臨時平台，幫助恐龍到達以前無法到達的關卡區域。

任何被困的敵人如果沒有足夠快地被殺死，都會變成紅色並逃離他們的泡泡監獄。這些憤怒的敵人比以前更快，更難殺死。如果玩家完成關卡的時間過長，敵人也會生氣。擊敗的敵人會變成獎勵水果，可以收集積分。

wildfang.name: 特庫摩騎士
wildfang.original_desc:
Wild Fang is a sideways scrolling beat-em-up for 1 or 2 players with a medieval setting. Players take on a variety of orcs, ogres, demons and other mythical creatures in their bid to destroy Satan, decapitating each enemy they encounter in order to collect their skulls for points and power-ups.

The player's character is an armor wearing beastmaster who sits atop of a fist-fighting giant.  Upon the player's command, the player may switch his mount into a tiger and attack with his mace.  Within each stage, there are also power-ups that allow the player to morph into a laser breathing dragon for a limited period of time.

The player's life bar is represented by a fire breathing dragon in the upper corner.  With each hit the player takes, the fire breath grows smaller.  Once the life bar is depleted the player's mount is killed and the player travels on foot and fights with throwing daggers.  If hit in this form then the player loses a life.  The game is over when all of a players lives are lost.
wildfang.desc:
Wild Fang 是一款適合 1 或 2 名玩家的橫向捲軸清版遊戲，背景為中世紀。玩家要對抗各種獸人、食人魔、惡魔和其他神話生物，以消滅撒旦，斬首他們遇到的每個敵人，以收集他們的頭骨以獲得積分和能量提升。

玩家的角色是一位穿著盔甲的馴獸師，坐在一個用拳頭戰鬥的巨人身上。根據玩家的命令，玩家可以將坐騎變成老虎並用狼牙棒攻擊。在每個階段中，還有一些能力提升，可以讓玩家在有限的時間內變身為激光呼吸龍。

玩家的生命條由右上角的一條噴火龍代表。玩家每受到一次攻擊，火焰氣息都會變小。一旦生命條耗盡，玩家的坐騎就會被殺死，玩家會步行並用投擲匕首進行戰鬥。如果以這種形式被擊中，那麼玩家就會失去生命。當所有玩家都失去生命時，遊戲就結束了。

pang3.name: 嘭！3
pang3.original_desc:
Pang! 3 is the second sequel to the superb 1989 original, Pang! 3 retains the same gameplay of its predecessors but adds vastly improved graphics and a choice of three difficulty levels; Beginner, Normal and Panic. On both the 'Normal' and 'Panic' skill levels, players can choose from 4 different playable characters; each possessing different strengths and weaknesses, such as a double harpoon or quick shots. On the beginner level, players can only use the Mexican character.

Another notable difference is in the game's use of backdrops: instead of the world landmarks of the first two games, Pang! 3 features classical works of art in the form of paintings and sculptures.
pang3.desc:
嘭！《Pang! 3》是 1989 年精彩原作《Pang!》的第二部續集。3 保留了與前作相同的遊戲玩法，但增加了大幅改進的圖形和三個難度級別的選擇；初學者、正常和恐慌。在“正常”和“恐慌”技能級別上，玩家可以從 4 個不同的可玩角色中進行選擇；每個都有不同的優點和缺點，例如雙魚叉或快速射擊。在初級階段，玩家只能使用墨西哥角色。

另一個顯著的區別是遊戲背景的使用：而不是前兩款遊戲的世界地標，Pang！3 以繪畫和雕塑形式呈現古典藝術作品。

arknoidu.name: 打磚塊
arknoidu.original_desc:
The original Breakout concept involves controlling a bat at the bottom of the screen and using it to catch and direct a ball so as to hit all the bricks which are arranged at the top of the screen. It was unpopular for over a decade, before Taito revived it with some new ideas in this arcade game.
The game's plot redefines the bat as a Vaus spaceship, the ball as an energy bolt, and the bricks form a mysterious wall stopping the ship from progressing to safety.
By the mid-80s, power-ups were popular in most types of arcade games, and Arkanoid features them. They are caught by positioning the bat below them as they fall (meaning that you risk missing the ball if you go for them at the wrong time). The power-ups include lasers (which are mounted to each side of the ship and allow you to shoot out the blocks), a catching device (so as to be able to fire the ball off at a different angle every time you hit it) and one that slows the bolt down.
arknoidu.desc:
最初的Breakout概念是控制屏幕底部的球棒，並用它來接住並引導球，從而擊中屏幕頂部排列的所有磚塊。它在十多年來一直不受歡迎，直到 Taito 在這款街機遊戲中通過一些新想法使其重新煥發活力。
遊戲的情節將蝙蝠重新定義為沃斯宇宙飛船，將球重新定義為能量螺栓，而磚塊則形成一堵神秘的牆，阻止飛船駛向安全。
到了 80 年代中期，強化道具在大多數類型的街機遊戲中都很流行，而《打磚塊》就是其中之一。當他們下落時，通過將球棒放在他們下方來抓住他們（這意味著如果你在錯誤的時間去抓住他們，你就有可能錯過球）。動力裝置包括激光器（安裝在船的每一側，讓你可以射出方塊）、捕捉裝置（以便每次擊中球時都能以不同的角度發射球）和減慢螺栓速度的裝置。

gijoeu.name: 特種兵喬
gijoeu.original_desc: Soldiers fight in a futuristic war against the army of an evil emperor. Unlike most army themed games, even trees and buildings can be destroyed if enough bullets are pumped into them.
gijoeu.desc: 士兵們在一場未來戰爭中對抗邪惡皇帝的軍隊。與大多數軍隊主題遊戲不同，如果注入足夠的子彈，甚至樹木和建築物也可能被摧毀。

ssprint.name: 超級衝刺
ssprint.original_desc: Like "Championship Sprint", released the same year, Super Sprint is an updated version of the old Atari Sprint series; with added the ability to allow players to upgrade their vehicles as the game progresses. Upgrades are won by collecting wrenches that appear once per track. After a player has collected four wrenches, they will be presented with an upgrade screen; giving them the opportunity to choose better traction, increased top speed, faster acceleration, or a faster helicopter. The only discernible difference between this and "Championship Sprint" is the addition of brand new tracks.
ssprint.desc: 與同年發布的《Championship Sprint》一樣，Super Sprint 是舊 Atari Sprint 系列的更新版本；增加了允許玩家隨著遊戲的進展升級他們的車輛的能力。通過收集每個軌道出現一次的扳手來贏得升級。玩家收集四把扳手後，會出現升級界面；讓他們有機會選擇更好的牽引力、更高的最高速度、更快的加速度或更快的直升機。這與“冠軍衝刺”唯一明顯的區別是增加了全新的賽道。

metamrph.name: 變形力
metamrph.original_desc: The evil one, Death Shadow, has risen from the dead to rule the world once more. The Greek goddess Athena has summoned the souls of four ancient guardians and bestowed their power upon four heroes to stop evil once again. These guardians wield the ability to morph into anthropomorphic beasts to fight their enemies.
metamrph.desc: 邪惡的死亡陰影已經復活，再次統治世界。希臘女神雅典娜召喚了四位古代守護者的靈魂，並將他們的力量授予四位英雄，以再次阻止邪惡。這些守護者擁有變身為擬人化野獸的能力來對抗敵人。

cyvern.name: 賽文：龍之武器
cyvern.original_desc: Take control of 3 artificially enhanced elemental dragons and battle against tons of enemy airships and hulking bosses in this excellent overhead shooter. Features awesome graphics & sound effects as well as responsive controls and a high level of challenge.
cyvern.desc: 在這款出色的俯視射擊遊戲中，控制 3 條人工增強的元素龍，與大量敵方飛艇和龐大的 Boss 作戰。具有出色的圖形和聲音效果以及靈敏的控制和高水平的挑戰。

xevious.name: 澤維奧斯
xevious.original_desc:
It's a nightmare, but it's true! Research shows that we are the actual aliens on Earth, and the ruthless Xevions are the original inhabitants.

Now the Xevions want Earth back -- minus humans! Their invasion forces are fierce -- the land is crawling with deadly Domogram Rovers; the sky is black with Toroid Patrol Fleets and Zoshi Death Squads.

Our puny weapons offer no defense. Earth's only hope is our powerful new Solvalou Fighter Plane. Its pilot will have a single mission: Penetrate the enemy ranks and destroy the Xevious Mother Ship.

The mission is dangerous. We can't guarantee success. But at this point, it's do or die!

One small problem. We still need a pilot. Any volunteers?
xevious.desc:
這是一場噩夢，但這是真的！研究表明，我們才是地球上真正的外星人，而無情的 Xevion 才是地球上的原始居民。

現在，Xevion 想要奪回地球——除了人類！他們的入侵力量非常兇猛——大地上爬滿了致命的多摩圖流浪者；天空一片漆黑，有環形巡邏艦隊和佐西敢死隊。

我們微弱的武器無法提供任何防禦。地球唯一的希望是我們強大的新型索爾瓦盧戰鬥機。它的飛行員將執行一個任務：滲透敵方隊伍並摧毀 Xevious 母船。

任務很危險。我們不能保證成功。但此時此刻，要么生，要么死！

一個小問題。我們仍然需要一名飛行員。有志願者嗎？

mazinger.name: 無敵鐵金剛
mazinger.original_desc: Vertical shoot'em up with 3 selectable characters: Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger and Grendizer.
mazinger.desc: 垂直射擊遊戲有 3 個可選角色：Mazinger Z、Great Mazinger 和 Grendizer。

drtoppel.name: 托佩爾博士的冒險
drtoppel.original_desc: Dr. Toppel's Adventure is a cutesy vertically scrolling shoot'em up where you play as a cute green creature.
drtoppel.desc: Dr. Toppel's Adventure 是一款可愛的垂直滾動射擊遊戲，您將扮演一個可愛的綠色生物。

punksht2.name: 朋克射擊
punksht2.original_desc:
Punk Shot takes up to four players to downtown NYC for some two-on-two street basketball, no referee, no rules. The opposing two-man teams face off for a match played in four quarters (2 to 5 minutes each), on improvised courts in 3 different locations: the alley, the park, and the harbor.

Naturally, it ain't just about being cool and shooting some b-ball outside of the school: on each side you have a couple of guys who are up to no good, with a constant enthusiasm for making trouble in the neighborhood. As such, Punk Shot joyfully turns basketball into a full-contact sport - heads will be bashed, noses punched, and private parts kicked. To top it off, each court features an assortment of environmental hazards, from slippery banana peels and having your butt set on fire, to the park dogs and their special taste for pants.
punksht2.desc:
Punk Shot 最多可容納四名玩家前往紐約市中心進行二對二的街頭籃球比賽，沒有裁判，沒有規則。雙方兩人球隊在 3 個不同地點（小巷、公園和港口）的臨時場地上進行四節比賽（每節 2 至 5 分鐘）。

當然，這不僅僅是在校外耍酷和打籃球：雙方都有幾個不懷好意的人，總是熱衷於在附近製造麻煩。因此，《朋克射擊》愉快地將籃球變成了一項全面接觸的運動——頭部會被毆打，鼻子會被拳打，私處會被踢。最重要的是，每個球場都有各種各樣的環境危害，從滑滑的香蕉皮和讓你的屁股著火，到公園裡的狗和它們對褲子的特殊品味。

lwings.name: 傳奇之翼
lwings.original_desc:
The human race was about to achieve the evolution from an ancient civilization to a state of millennium with the help of DARK, a super powerful computer left by spacemen long ago. DARK suddenly began to malfunction.

The world was in a panic. The human race was on the brink of extinction.

ARES, god of war, gave two young men Wings of Love and Courage and entrusted them with the survival and future of the human race. Time is of the essence. Destroy DARK Take wings, legendary soldiers.
lwings.desc:
人類即將在太空人很久以前留下的超級強大計算機DARK的幫助下，實現從遠古文明到千年狀態的進化。DARK突然開始出現故障。

世界陷入恐慌。人類正處於滅絕的邊緣。

戰神阿瑞斯賜予兩個年輕人愛與勇氣的翅膀，並託付給他們人類的生存與未來。時間至關重要。消滅黑暗，帶上翅膀，傳奇戰士。

buckyua.name: 巴基·奧黑爾
buckyua.original_desc:
Bucky O'Hare is a scrolling shoot-em-up for up to four players based on the TV cartoon series Bucky O'Hare and the Toad Wars. Players must stop the Toad Empire from invading their home planets in the 'Aniverse' and enslaving their people. To achieve their goal they must shoot their way through an army of brainwashed toads to destroy their evil leader, a computer program known as 'KOMPLEX' and release the 'Interplanetary Life Force.'

Players choose to play as either Blinky (a one-eyed android), Bucky (the heroic rabbit captain), Dead-Eye Duck (a four-armed mallard) or Jenny (an 'Aldebaran cat' and telepath). Differences between the characters are purely visual as each plays the same.
buckyua.desc:
《巴基·奧黑爾》是一款最多可容納 4 名玩家的滾動射擊遊戲，改編自電視卡通片《巴基·奧黑爾與蟾蜍大戰》。玩家必須阻止蟾蜍帝國入侵他們在“Aniverse”中的家園星球並奴役他們的人民。為了實現他們的目標，他們必須射殺一群被洗腦的蟾蜍，消滅他們的邪惡領袖，一個名為“KOMPLEX”的計算機程序，並釋放“星際生命力”。

玩家可以選擇扮演 Blinky（獨眼機器人）、Bucky（英雄兔子隊長）、死眼鴨（四臂野鴨）或 Jenny（一隻“畢宿五貓”和心靈感應者）。角色之間的差異純粹是視覺上的，因為每個角色的扮演方式都相同。

tetris.name: 俄羅斯方塊
tetris.original_desc: Tetris was a very popular game in Japan. Taito partner up with Sega to convert unpopular games like "Master of weapon" or "Rastan saga 2" to Tetris (on the Taito B system). Later, Taito produced Sega's tetris on the Taito H system.
tetris.desc: 俄羅斯方塊在日本是一種非常流行的遊戲。Taito 與世嘉合作，將“武器大師”或“Rastan saga 2”等不受歡迎的遊戲轉換為俄羅斯方塊（在 Taito B 系統上）。後來Taito在Taito H系統上製作了世嘉的俄羅斯方塊。

bombjack.name: 炸彈傑克
bombjack.original_desc:
Bomb Jack is a fast-moving platform game in which the aim is to collect all of the bombs on each level before progressing to the next. A variety of constantly spawning mechanical enemies patrol the platforms and airspace so the longer a player takes to collect all of the bombs, the more difficult progress becomes. 

Extra point bonuses are awarded for collecting bombs with their fuses lit. Only one bomb at any time has a lit fuse, and collecting twenty or more of these lit bombs on any given level will earn the player points bonus (see TIPS AND TRICKS for details). Jack is pursued around each level by the spawning enemies and when he gets killed, he drops down to the nearest platform, always landing on his head.
