A 'Powerball' appears at semi-regular intervals and moves diagonally around the screen. If the player manages to grab this, all of the level's monsters are frozen for several seconds and can then be killed by having Jack fly into them (similar to the 'Powerpill' feature in "Pac-Man"). Collecting the Bonus 'B' symbols will increase the amount of points awarded for collecting bombs with their fuses lit. Picking up an 'Extra' symbol awards the player with an additional life, while catching the 'Special' symbol will give the player an extra credit. 

Each of Bomb Jack's levels feature one of five different background pictures, some of which represent famous historical landmarks. They are: the Sphinx in Egypt, the Acropolis in Greece, Castle Neuschwanstein in Bavaria, skyscrapers and a cityscape by night. While the backgrounds themselves are repeated as the game progresses, the platform layouts for each level are completely different. At least until level 18, after which the levels are repeated. 

The basic play mechanic of collecting objects to clear a level, as well as the powerball feature, is hugely reminiscent of Namco's seminal "Pac-Man".
bombjack.desc:
Bomb Jack 是一款快速移動的平台遊戲，其目標是在進入下一關之前收集每個關卡中的所有炸彈。各種不斷產生的機械敵人在平台和空域巡邏，因此玩家收集所有炸彈所需的時間越長，進展就越困難。

收集引信點燃的炸彈可獲得額外積分獎勵。任何時候只有一顆炸彈具有點燃的引信，並且在任何給定級別收集二十個或更多這些點燃的炸彈將贏得玩家積分獎勵（有關詳細信息，請參閱提示和技巧）。傑克在每個關卡中都會被生成的敵人追趕，當他被殺時，他會掉到最近的平台上，總是頭著地。

“強力球”以半規則的間隔出現，並在屏幕上沿對角線移動。如果玩家設法抓住這個，所有關卡的怪物都會被凍結幾秒鐘，然後可以通過讓傑克飛向它們來殺死它們（類似於“吃豆人”中的“Powerpill”功能）。收集獎勵“B”符號將增加收集引信點燃的炸彈所獲得的積分。拾取“額外”符號將為玩家提供額外的生命，而抓住“特殊”符號將為玩家提供額外的積分。

Bomb Jack 的每個關卡都有五張不同的背景圖片之一，其中一些代表著著名的歷史地標。它們是：埃及的獅身人面像、希臘的衛城、巴伐利亞的新天鵝堡、摩天大樓和夜晚的城市景觀。雖然背景本身隨著遊戲的進展而重複，但每個級別的平台佈局卻完全不同。至少直到 18 級，之後會重複這些級別。

收集物品以通關的基本遊戲機制以及強力球功能，非常讓人想起 Namco 的開創性“吃豆人”。

mercs.name: 僱傭兵
mercs.original_desc: The US faces a grave crisis! The former president has been kidnapped by a group of revolutionaries while on a trip on Central Africa meant to promote world peace. Take control of three highly skilled anti-terrorist soldiers and venture through enemy lines to save the former president & annihilate the rebel army in the process. Features solid graphics & sound, plenty of weapons & vehicles to use and hulking bosses to defeat.
mercs.desc: 美國面臨嚴重危機！這位前總統在前往中部非洲促進世界和平的途中被一群革命者綁架。控制三名技藝高超的反恐士兵，冒險穿越敵軍防線，拯救前總統並在此過程中消滅叛軍。具有堅實的圖形和聲音，大量的武器和車輛可供使用，還有巨大的頭目可供擊敗。

seawolf.name: 海狼
seawolf.original_desc: The game screen is a side view of a underwater scene (with the surface towards the top). You control a crosshair at the surface level. The object is to shoot as many ships as possible, before the time runs out. Your torpedoes are launched from the bottom of the screen, and must move upwards to hit the enemy ships (while avoiding the mines that float at different levels of the water). Your submarine can shoot 5 shots before it has to reload (an automatic action that takes about a second). Your game will be extended if you reach a certain score before time runs out (the score is operator adjustable).
seawolf.desc: 遊戲屏幕是水下場景的側視圖（水面朝上）。您可以在表面控制十字準線。目標是在時間耗盡之前射擊盡可能多的船隻。你的魚雷從屏幕底部發射，必須向上移動才能擊中敵艦（同時避開漂浮在不同水位的水雷）。你的潛艇在重新裝彈之前可以發射 5 發子彈（自動動作大約需要一秒鐘）。如果您在時間用完之前達到一定分數（分數可由操作員調整），您的遊戲將延長。

docastle.name: 多先生的城堡
docastle.original_desc: The player controls a clown, named “Mr. Do!”. Mr. Do is in his garden, and wants to collect the cherries there. Monsters roam there, and will not let Mr. Do quietly collect. If a monster touches Mr. Do, it dies, and the player loses a life. At each level a path is dug through the garden, going from the bottom to the top of the screen, passing through the center. Monsters can only take paths that have already been dug. Mr. Do is able to dig new paths, at the cost of slower movement speed.
docastle.desc: 玩家控制一個小丑，名叫“Mr. Do!”。Do 先生在他的花園裡，想要摘那裡的櫻桃。怪物在那裡游盪，不會讓Mr. Do悄悄收集。如果怪物接觸到 Mr. Do，它就會死亡，玩家也會失去生命。在每一層，都有一條穿過花園的路徑，從屏幕的底部到頂部，穿過中心。怪物只能走已經挖好的路。Mr. Do 能夠挖掘新的路徑，但代價是移動速度變慢。

s1945ii.name: 前鋒1945 II
s1945ii.original_desc: Continuing where the last game ended, the forces of CANY had been demolished by the previous Strikers' line-up. However, a small group known as the FGR stole the sources and technology responsible for the last events and planned to continue CANYs work by initiating world-warfare with massive mech technology. Once again, the Strikers are called into action.
s1945ii.desc: 延續上一場比賽的結束，CANY的戰力被之前的前鋒陣容擊垮了。然而，一個名為 FGR 的小團體竊取了造成最後事件的資源和技術，併計劃通過大規模機甲技術發動世界大戰來繼續 CANY 的工作。前鋒們再一次被召集起來行動。

720.original_desc:
A one or two-player arcade game with players taking on the role of a skateboarder, and must perform various tricks and maneuvers to earn the points and tickets needed to compete for medals in the game's numerous skate parks. 

The bulk of the action takes place in a 'Skate City', a small urban area made up of ramps, jumps and hazards. Players can skate anywhere they wish as they perform the tricks and jumps needed to reach the score thresholds that will earn them entry tickets to Skate City's skate parks to compete for medals and cash prizes. 

Each score threshold must be reached and a park entered within a tight time limit. Failure to do so sees the skater persued by a swarm of bees and the words SKATE OR DIE appear. Should the bees touch the skater before he enters a park, the game ends. Skate City's roads and pavements are populated with moving traffic and pedestrians and any collision with them will result in the skater being knocked from his board, costing the player precious seconds. 

The parks themselves each feature one of four different disciplines: Slalom, Jump, Downhill and Ramp. Each park has a timer and players can earn either a bronze, silver or gold medal - together with a cash prize - depending on how quickly the park is completed. If the park target score or finish line is not reached before the timer expires, no medal or money is awarded. 

Money won can be used to buy equipment upgrades from the stalls that litter Skate City. Players can buy upgraded boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Boards give faster speed; helmets allow for more risky maneuvers; pads give a faster recovery from falls and shoes provide more height on jumps, as well as giving a quicker standing start. 

At the start of each new game, players can select from one of two play modes. 'Training Level' is available for beginners and gives players numerous playing hints and tips. 'Experienced Level' is more challenging as well as offering fewer hints. It does, however, include the 'add-a-coin' feature, which allows for awards and items already won to be carried over to a new game. 

The main objective is to compete in as many skate parks as possible. There are numerous city hazards to be avoided, such as BMX riders, cars, Frisbee throwers and other skaters. To guide the player around Skate City are map tiles. Riding over one of these will temporaily pause the action and display the layout of the city, including the locations of the skate parks and equipment stalls.
720.desc:
一種單人或兩人的街機遊戲，玩家扮演滑板手的角色，必須執行各種技巧和動作才能贏得在遊戲中眾多滑板公園爭奪獎牌所需的積分和門票。

大部分動作發生在“滑板城”，這是一個由坡道、跳躍點和危險區組成的小城區。玩家可以在任何他們想要的地方滑冰，同時表演所需的技巧和跳躍來達到分數閾值，這將為他們贏得滑板城滑板公園的入場券，爭奪獎牌和現金獎勵。

必須在嚴格的時間限制內達到每個分數閾值並進入公園。如果不這樣做，滑冰者就會被一群蜜蜂追趕，並且會出現“SKATE OR DIE”字樣。如果蜜蜂在滑冰者進入公園之前接觸到他，遊戲就會結束。滑板城的道路和人行道上擠滿了移動的車輛和行人，任何與他們的碰撞都會導致滑冰者被從滑板上撞下來，浪費玩家寶貴的幾秒鐘。

每個公園本身都設有四種不同項目之一：迴轉、跳躍、速降和坡道。每個公園都有一個計時器，玩家可以獲得銅牌、銀牌或金牌，以及現金獎勵，具體取決於公園的完成速度。如果在計時器到期之前未達到公園目標分數或終點線，則不會頒發獎牌或獎金。

贏得的錢可以用來從滑板城的攤位上購買裝備升級。玩家可以購買升級板、頭盔、護墊和鞋子。板提供更快的速度；頭盔允許進行更危險的操作；護墊可以讓您更快地從跌倒中恢復，鞋子可以提供更高的跳躍高度，並可以更快地站立。

在每個新遊戲開始時，玩家可以從兩種遊戲模式中選擇一種。“訓練級別”可供初學者使用，並為玩家提供大量的遊戲提示和技巧。“經驗級別”更具挑戰性，並且提供的提示也更少。然而，它確實包括“添加硬幣”功能，允許將已贏得的獎勵和物品轉移到新遊戲中。

主要目標是在盡可能多的滑板公園進行比賽。有許多城市危險需要避免，例如小輪車騎手、汽車、飛盤投擲者和其他滑冰者。地圖圖塊可以引導玩家遊覽滑板城。騎在其中一個上將暫時暫停動作並顯示城市的佈局，包括滑板公園和設備攤位的位置。

sidearmr.name: 側臂 - Hyper Dyne
sidearmr.original_desc:
An evil alien race called the 'Bozon' are trying to wipe out Mankind, and Lieutenant Henry and Sergent Sanders are given the responsibility of saving the Human Race. They each climb into a Mobilsuit - a jet-powered, heavily armoured combat suit - and set out on their mission. 

Side Arms is a horizontally - and occasionally vertically - scrolling shoot-em-up for one or two players. Each player has two fire buttons, one for shooting ahead and one for shooting behind; crucial for a game in which enemies attack from all directions. Shooting certain enemies will reveal power-ups - displayed as 'POW' icons - and shooting the icons will either change their type, or reveal a special weapon.
sidearmr.desc:
一個名為“Bozon”的邪惡外星種族正試圖消滅人類，亨利中尉和桑德斯中士被賦予拯救人類的責任。他們每個人都穿上機動服——一種噴氣動力的重裝甲戰鬥服——然後出發執行他們的任務。

Side Arms 是一款水平（有時是垂直）滾動的射擊遊戲，適合一到兩名玩家。每個玩家有兩個開火按鈕，一個用於向前射擊，一個用於向後射擊；對於敵人從各個方向攻擊的遊戲來說至關重要。射擊某些敵人將顯示能量提升 - 顯示為“戰俘”圖標 - 射擊圖標將改變其類型，或顯示特殊武器。

airwolf.name: 飛狼
airwolf.original_desc: Airwolf is a horizontally scrolling shoot'em up game.
airwolf.desc: Airwolf 是一款水平滾動射擊遊戲。

gangwars.name: 幫派戰爭
gangwars.original_desc: 2 street brawlers fight their way through a gang of hoodlums that like to laugh incessantly at you while they're beating you up! Features customizable statistics for your fighter.
gangwars.desc: 兩個街頭鬥毆者在一群流氓中殺出一條血路，他們在毆打你的同時還不停地嘲笑你！為您的戰鬥機提供可定制的統計數據。

buckrog.name: 巴克·羅傑斯：變焦星球
buckrog.original_desc: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom is a forward-scrolling rail shooter where the user controls a spaceship in a behind-the-back third-person perspective that must destroy enemy ships and avoid obstacles. The game was notable for its fast pseudo 3-D scaling and detailed sprites. The game would later go on to influence the 1985 Sega hit Space Harrier. Buck is never seen in the game, except presumably in the illustration on the side of the arcade cabinet, and its only real connections to Buck Rogers are the use of the name and the outer space setting. In Japan, the game was known as Zoom 909.
buckrog.desc: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom 是一款向前滾動的軌道射擊遊戲，用戶以第三人稱視角控制一艘宇宙飛船，摧毀敵方船隻並避開障礙物。該遊戲以其快速的偽 3D 縮放和詳細的精靈而聞名。該遊戲後來影響了 1985 年世嘉的熱門遊戲《太空鷂》。巴克在遊戲中從未出現過，除了在街機櫃側面的插圖中，它與巴克羅傑斯的唯一真正聯繫是名稱的使用和外太空設置。在日本，這款遊戲被稱為 Zoom 909。

llander.name: 月球著陸器
llander.original_desc:
Lunar Lander is a 1-player coin-op electronic game that simulates landing a manned spaceship on the moon. Various video-display phrases indicate score, time elapsed during this landing mission, fuel units consumed, altitude above the moon, and horizontal and vertical speed. The fuel consumption and both speed readings are important for the player to determine how to land the craft. Realistic engine rumble and crash sounds accompany game play. A high beep warns of an almost-depleted fuel supply, whereupon players can add coins to automatically extend the game and 'fill up' their fuel tanks. Depending on the quality of the landing or the crash, various messages are displayed on the screen.

Game play begins with engine rumble and the lander drifting towards the bottom
right corner of the screen. Horizontal and vertical speeds are constantly displayed, including two arrows to show horizontal and vertical directions of travel. Altitude is measured in distance above the surface of the mountain - not above 'sea level'. The screen also shows time in actual seconds, representing time elapsed in the current mission.
llander.desc:
Lunar Lander 是一款單人投幣電子遊戲，模擬載人飛船登陸月球。各種視頻顯示短語顯示分數、這次著陸任務所用的時間、消耗的燃料單位、月球上方的高度以及水平和垂直速度。燃油消耗和速度讀數對於玩家確定如何著陸很重要。遊戲過程中伴隨著逼真的引擎隆隆聲和碰撞聲。一聲高聲警告燃料供應幾乎耗盡，玩家可以添加硬幣來自動延長游戲時間並“填滿”他們的油箱。根據著陸或墜機的質量，屏幕上會顯示各種消息。

遊戲從發動機隆隆聲和著陸器漂向底部開始
屏幕右上角。水平和垂直速度不斷顯示，包括兩個箭頭來顯示水平和垂直方向的行進。海拔高度是指距山表面的距離，而不是“海平面”以上的距離。屏幕還以實際秒數顯示時間，表示當前任務所經過的時間。

ssf2t.name: 超級街頭霸王 II 渦輪增壓
ssf2t.original_desc:
Super Street Fighter II Turbo, released in Japan as Super Street Fighter II X: Grand Master Challenge, is a competitive fighting game released for the arcades by Capcom in 1994. It is the fifth arcade installment in the Street Fighter II sub-series of Street Fighter games, following Super Street Fighter II. Like its predecessor, it ran on the CP System II hardware.

Super Turbo introduced several new play mechanics to the game system from the previous Street Fighter II installments, including the addition of powered-up Special Moves called Super Combos. It also introduced the hidden character of Akuma, who would go on to become a recurring character in later Street Fighter installments and other Capcom fighting games.
ssf2t.desc:
《超級街頭霸王 II Turbo》在日本發行時名為《超級街頭霸王 II X：大師挑戰》，是 Capcom 於 1994 年為街機版推出的一款競技格鬥遊戲。它是繼《超級街頭霸王 II》之後《街頭霸王 II》子系列的第五款街機遊戲。與其前身一樣，它在 CP System II 硬件上運行。

Super Turbo 在《街頭霸王 II》之前的遊戲系統中引入了一些新的遊戲機制，包括添加了名為“超級組合”的強力特殊動作。它還引入了隱藏角色 Akuma，他將成為後來的《街頭霸王》系列和其他 Capcom 格鬥遊戲中的反復出現的角色。

bnj.name: 碰撞和跳躍
bnj.original_desc: Bump 'n' Jump (Burnin' Rubber in Japan) is an overhead driving game where you jump or bump enemy cars for points.
bnj.desc: Bump 'n' Jump（日本的 Burnin' Rubber）是一款高架駕駛遊戲，您可以通過跳躍或碰撞敵方汽車來獲得分數。

gtmr2.name: Mille Miglia 2：偉大的 1000 英里拉力賽
gtmr2.original_desc: You have 60 seconds to get from the starting line to the finish line. Finishing within 60 seconds allows you to go on to the next race. If you lose, a continue option is available. The screen scrolls fast. The only way you know about a turn coming up is by a little indicator that flashes with a picture of the turn. There are zig-zags, hairpins and all other cool turns, most of which you have to steer into in order to make it though.
gtmr2.desc: 你有 60 秒的時間從起跑線到達終點線。在 60 秒內完成比賽即可繼續參加下一場比賽。如果您輸了，可以選擇繼續。屏幕快速滾動。您了解即將到來的轉彎的唯一方法是通過一個閃爍著轉彎圖片的小指示器。這裡有之字形彎道、髮夾彎道和所有其他很酷的轉彎，但其中大部分都需要您轉向才能通過。

vendet2p.name: 仇殺隊
vendet2p.original_desc:
The hero gang, called The Cobras, numbers five members: Blood (former prizefighter, with a passing resemblance to Mike Tyson), Hawk (former professional wrestler, with strong resemblance to Hulk Hogan), Boomer (a martial artist, possibly based on Jean-Claude Van Damme), Sledge (a military ex-convict with passing resemblance to Mr. T), and Kate, the damsel in distress, described as Hawk's protegee and wearing blue clothing similar to his.

One day, Kate is kidnapped by the Dead End Gang under the leadership of Faust. The four men go save her, fighting through the waves of enemies that are sent against them.
vendet2p.desc:
這個名為“眼鏡蛇”的英雄幫有 5 名成員：布拉德（前職業拳擊手，與邁克·泰森非常相似）、霍克（前職業摔跤手，與浩克·霍根非常相似）、布瑪（一名武術家，可能以尚格·雲頓為原型）、斯萊奇（一名軍事前罪犯，與 T 先生有些相似）和凱特，陷入困境的少女，被描述為霍克的門徒和穿著和他相似的藍色衣服。

有一天，凱特被浮士德領導的死胡同綁架了。四個人前去拯救她，並與一波又一波的敵人戰鬥。

ghostb.name: 真正的捉鬼敢死隊
ghostb.original_desc: Adapted from the animated cartoon of the same name. Up to three players, each controlling a Ghostbuster, must run around a top-down universal scrolling terrain, shoot creatures and then try to suck up ghosts with their plasma guns. Players can shoot and then collect various power-ups, including a protective Aura, shot and beam boosters, and a "Green Ghost" Slimer shield satellite. Has interesting screen transition effects and a well-orchestrated version of the movie's popular theme song.
ghostb.desc: 改編自同名動畫。最多三名玩家，每人控制一輛捉鬼敢死隊，必須在自上而下的通用滾動地形中奔跑，射擊生物，然後嘗試用等離子槍吸走鬼魂。玩家可以射擊，然後收集各種能量道具，包括保護光環、射擊和光束助推器，以及“綠幽靈”史萊姆護盾衛星。具有有趣的屏幕過渡效果和精心編排的電影流行主題曲版本。

punchout.name: 出拳！ ！
punchout.original_desc:
The player assumes the role of a green-haired boxer, who must fight his way through six increasingly larger-than-life boxers to earn the title of 'Champ' in this superb 1-on-1 fighting game.

During matches, the player's boxer is viewed from behind as a wire-frame (so the player's opponent can be seen). Players must time their punches, dodges and blocks in order to defeat the opposing boxer.

The player's opponents are each rendered as humorous cartoon-like caricatures - adding much to the game's atmosphere - and each boxer fights in a slightly different style, forcing players to adapt to their strategy. The top monitor is used for statistics while the bottom one is used to display the actual fight.
punchout.desc:
玩家扮演一名綠髮拳擊手，必須在這場精彩的一對一格鬥遊戲中與六名日益傳奇的拳擊手戰鬥，才能贏得“冠軍”的稱號。

在比賽期間，玩家的拳擊手從後面被視為線框（因此可以看到玩家的對手）。玩家必須把握出拳、閃避和格擋的時機，才能擊敗對方拳擊手。

玩家的對手都被渲染成幽默的卡通漫畫——這增加了遊戲的氣氛——而且每個拳擊手的戰鬥風格都略有不同，迫使玩家適應他們的策略。頂部顯示器用於統計，底部顯示器用於顯示實際戰鬥情況。

blktiger.name: 黑虎
blktiger.original_desc:
"Black Dragon/Tiger is a scrolling platform shoot-em-up set in a fantasy world and is the spiritual successor to the Capcom classic, ""Ghosts'n' Goblins"".
The player takes on the role of a barbarian who must jump and fight his way through a variety of levels, collecting treasure and weapon power-ups and rescuing the trapped 'wise old men' that litter them. Rescuing them awards 'Zeny coins'; these allow the player to buy weapon and armor upgrades, keys for treasure chests, and potions.Occasionally, a rescued wise man will also offer to sell the player weapon and armor power-ups.
The barbarian hero is armed with a spiked mace as well as unlimited throwing daggers. Both these and the armor worn by the barbarian can be upgraded by finding or buying power-ups.
The sprawling, eight-way scrolling levels are packed with hidden bonuses to encourage and reward exploration. Many levels also include a hidden dungeon. Special items can be found by attacking certain walls."
blktiger.desc:
“Black Dragon/Tiger 是一款以奇幻世界為背景的捲軸平台射擊遊戲，是 Capcom 經典作品《Ghosts'n' Goblins》的精神繼承者。
玩家扮演一個野蠻人的角色，他必須跳躍並通過各種關卡戰鬥，收集寶藏和武器能量，並拯救被困的“聰明的老人”。營救他們會獎勵“Zeny 硬幣”；這些允許玩家購買武器和盔甲升級、寶箱鑰匙和藥水。偶爾，獲救的智者也會向玩家出售武器和盔甲強化道具。
野蠻人英雄裝備有尖刺狼牙棒和無限的投擲匕首。這些和野蠻人穿的盔甲都可以通過尋找或購買能量提升來升級。
廣闊的八向滾動關卡充滿了隱藏的獎勵，以鼓勵和獎勵探索。許多關卡還包括一個隱藏的地牢。攻擊某些牆壁可以找到特殊物品。”

pacland.name: 太平洋樂園
pacland.original_desc:
Pac-Land is a horizontally-scrolling platform game set in the cartoon world of the game's title. A fairy has lost her way and needs Pac-Man to help her get back to her home of Fairyland. Pac-Man, with the fairy safely hidden beneath his hat, must run and jump through the colourful world until he reaches and enters the magical door to Fairyland. Upon being rescued, the fairy gives Pac-Man a pair of magical shoes for his trip back home. These enable him to jump wherever he wants, without the need for a platform to jump from. This effectively means Pac-Man can 'sky-jump' back home if he so wishes.

Directional buttons make Pac-Man walk left and right and it's possible to make him run by tapping the desired directional button twice. Pac-Man is pursued by his ever-present enemies in the form of five ghosts - Pinky, Inky, Blinky, Clyde and Sue. Pac-Man must avoid the ghosts and other deadly objects that populate the levels. As with previous games in the series, a small number of 'Powerpills' appear. Eating a Powerpill makes Pac-Man temporarily invincible and turns the ghosts purple and vulnerable to being eaten. On some stages, Pac-Man must use a springboard to jump over large ponds by leaping from the springboard and rapidly moving left and right while in the air.

The game's stages are called 'trips', with players able to start on any one of the first five. Each trip made up of four rounds (three rounds to reach Fairyland and one round to return home) with a short interval between each one. The objective in all trips is to get the fairy safely back to Fairyland then return home to Pac-Man's family. The majority of the trip involves moving from left to right, avoiding various obstacles such as the enemy ghosts, water spurts and quicksand traps. The journey home, however, scrolls right to left.

Each stage must be completed within a set time limit and if the player runs out of time before finishing a round, Sue (the purple ghost) will speed up considerably and kill Pac-Man. At the end of each round, players are awarded bonus points based on how much of the time limit remains. On each stage, cherries and other items can be collected for extra points. There are a total of 8 different trips in the game, totalling 32 levels. After the 8th trip, the 9th trip is a repeat of the 5th trip, with level 33 effectively being level 17, with an increased difficulty level.
pacland.desc:
Pac-Land 是一款以遊戲標題的卡通世界為背景的水平滾動平台遊戲。一位仙女迷路了，需要吃豆人幫助她回到仙境之家。吃豆人將仙女安全地隱藏在他的帽子下，他必須在色彩繽紛的世界中奔跑跳躍，直到到達並進入仙境的神奇之門。獲救後，仙女送給吃豆人一雙神奇的鞋子，供他回家時使用。這些使他能夠跳到任何他想去的地方，而不需要跳台。這實際上意味著吃豆人可以“跳”回家，如果他願意的話。

方向按鈕可以讓吃豆人左右行走，並且可以通過點擊所需的方向按鈕兩次來讓他奔跑。吃豆人被五個幽靈（Pinky、Inky、Blinky、Clyde 和 Sue）的永遠存在的敵人追趕。吃豆人必須避開關卡中的鬼魂和其他致命物體。與該系列之前的遊戲一樣，出現了少量的“強力藥丸”。吃下強力藥丸可以使吃豆人暫時無敵，並使鬼魂變成紫色並容易被吃掉。在某些階段，吃豆人必須使用跳板，通過從跳板上跳躍並在空中快速左右移動來跳過大池塘。

遊戲的階段被稱為“旅程”，玩家可以從前五個階段中的任何一個開始。每趟旅程由四輪組成（三輪到達仙境，一輪迴家），每輪之間有很短的間隔。所有旅程的目標都是讓仙女安全返回仙境，然後回到吃豆人的家人身邊。行程的大部分內容是從左向右移動，避開各種障礙物，如敵人的幽靈、水噴和流沙陷阱。然而，回家的旅程是從右向左滾動的。

每個階段都必須在設定的時限內完成，如果玩家在完成一輪之前用完時間，蘇（紫色幽靈）將大幅加速並殺死吃豆人。每輪結束時，玩家將根據剩餘時間限制獲得獎勵積分。在每個階段，都可以收集櫻桃和其他物品以獲得額外積分。遊戲中共有8個不同的旅程，總共32個關卡。第 8 趟之後，第 9 趟是第 5 趟的重複，33 級實際上是 17 級，難度級別有所增加。

knightsu.name: 圓桌騎士
knightsu.original_desc: Knights of the Round is an arcade game released by Capcom in 1991. A side-scrolling beat 'em up based loosely on the legend of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table, the game features an role-playing video game-like level advancement system, with fighters getting new weapons and armour as they advance through the game, however the player can not choose how to upgrade his/her character - the level up system is static.
knightsu.desc: 《圓桌騎士》是 Capcom 於 1991 年推出的一款街機遊戲。一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲，大致基於亞瑟王和圓桌騎士的傳說，該遊戲具有類似角色扮演視頻遊戲的升級系統，戰士在遊戲中前進時會獲得新的武器和盔甲，但玩家無法選擇如何升級他/她的角色 - 升級系統是靜態的。

marble.name: 大理石瘋狂
marble.original_desc:
Marble Madness is an abstract maze game for one or two players. The game's goal is to guide a small glass marble over a three-dimensional maze and reach the finish line before the level's timer has expired. Any seconds that remain on the timer when the finish line is crossed are carried over to the next level. 

As well as having to negotiate the marble over treacherous walkways and ramps, numerous obstacles and unfriendly creatures will try to slow the marble's progress or knock it over the edge of a platform, wasting yet more precious seconds until a replacement marble appears. The two-player game has players competing to reach the goal first. 

Marble Madness features six different mazes.
marble.desc:
Marble Madness 是一款適合一兩個玩家的抽象迷宮遊戲。遊戲的目標是引導小玻璃彈珠穿過三維迷宮，並在關卡計時器到期之前到達終點線。當衝過終點線時，計時器上剩餘的任何秒數都會轉入下一級別。

除了必須在危險的走道和坡道上通過大理石之外，許多障礙和不友好的生物也會試圖減慢大理石的前進速度或將其撞到平台邊緣，浪費更多寶貴的時間，直到替換的大理石出現。兩人遊戲要求玩家競爭先達到目標。

Marble Madness 有六個不同的迷宮。

donpachi.name: 棟八
donpachi.original_desc:
An excellent vertically scrolling shoot'em up. The player assumes the role of a pilot who is sent by their squadron to fight their former allies until one side destroys the other, all of which is a part of a mission to strengthen the military power that controls each side. The player flies their selected fighter over 5 areas of various terrain, encountering a number of land, sea and air enemies. The player's ship has two modes of fire: by tapping the fire button, shots are fired; holding it down produces a concentrated vertical beam, but also reduces the ship's speed.

The player can choose one of 3 aircraft at the start of the game, or upon continuing:
Type A: A red (or yellow/orange, for player two) fighter, which fires a narrow stream of shots
Type B: A green (or purple, for player two) helicopter, which fires its main guns forward, but has side guns that rotate in the direction of movement
Type C: A blue (or black, for player two) fighter, which fires a wide, three-way spread of shots
donpachi.desc:
一款出色的垂直滾動射擊遊戲。玩家扮演一名飛行員的角色，被中隊派去與以前的盟友作戰，直到一方摧毀另一方，所有這一切都是加強控制雙方軍事力量的任務的一部分。玩家駕駛自己選擇的戰鬥機飛越 5 個不同地形的區域，遭遇大量陸地、海上和空中的敵人。玩家的飛船有兩種射擊模式：點擊射擊按鈕，射擊；點擊射擊按鈕，射擊。按住它會產生集中的垂直光束，但也會降低船的速度。

玩家可以在遊戲開始時或繼續時選擇 3 架飛機中的一架：
A 型：紅色（或黃色/橙色，對於玩家二）戰鬥機，可發射狹窄的射擊流
B型：綠色（或紫色，對於玩家二）直升機，其主砲向前射擊，但側炮可沿移動方向旋轉
C 型：藍色（或黑色，對於二號玩家）戰鬥機，可向三向射擊

centtime.name: 蜈蚣
centtime.original_desc:
Centipede is a vertically oriented single screen shoot-em-up in which the aim is to use the 'Bug Blaster' to shoot the centipedes that snake down towards the bottom of the screen to amass as high a score as possible. 

The play-field is littered with randomly placed mushrooms and the rapidly descending Centipede changes direction when it runs into a mushroom. When a segment of the Centipede is shot, the segment is destroyed and a mushroom appears in its place, the Centipede then breaks into two smaller centipedes, each with its own head, and continues its descent. 

Players can move the Bug Blaster vertically as well as horizontally, although only for the lower fifth of the play-field. Mushrooms can also be shot for points and to clear blocked areas. Once a Centipede reaches the bottom of the screen, it starts snaking back up, but remains within the lower section of the play-field near the player's Bug Blaster.

Additionally, any Centipede that reaches the very bottom of the screen without being shot releases its tail section which then becomes a new head. Other new heads also enter the screen from the bottom corners of the play-field as time progresses.

Randomly moving Spiders also appear in the first wave. Spiders can destroy any mushrooms they move over, eliminating many mushroom targets for a player. If the Bug Blaster and a Spider collide, both are destroyed. the Spider either moves at a 45-degree angle or vertically up and down, never simply left or right like the centipede does.

A bombardment of Fleas appears from the second wave onward. As a Flea descends, it leaves a trail of new mushrooms behind it. Fleas appear when a certain number of mushrooms remains at the bottom of the screen. This number increases as the game progresses, meaning Fleas appear more often later on in the game. The Bug Blaster must hit a Flea twice to destroy it; the first shot simply speeds up its descent.

When a Centipede with fewer than eleven segments appears, a Scorpion enters from either side, moving at a relatively slow speed. As the player earns more points, the Scorpion's speed increases. As the Scorpion travels across the screen, it 'poisons' the mushrooms that it moves over and changes their colours. These mushrooms cause any Centipedes that would collide with them to head straight towards the bottom of the screen, rather than continue snaking left and right. The Bug Blaster can stop a poisoned Centipede by shooting its head.

If a player earns at least 60,000 points, two things happen to increase the challenge: the Fleas descend at a faster speed and the Spiders restrict their movement to a smaller area at the bottom of the screen.
centtime.desc:
Centipede 是一款垂直方向的單屏射擊遊戲，其目標是使用“Bug Blaster”來射擊蜿蜒向屏幕底部移動的蜈蚣，以獲得盡可能高的分數。

遊戲場上散佈著隨機放置的蘑菇，快速下降的蜈蚣在遇到蘑菇時會改變方向。當蜈蚣的一段被射中時，該段被破壞，並在其位置出現蘑菇，然後蜈蚣分裂成兩個較小的蜈蚣，每個蜈蚣都有自己的頭，並繼續下降。

玩家可以垂直和水平移動 Bug Blaster，但僅限於比賽場地的下五分之一。還可以射擊蘑菇來得分並清除封鎖區域。一旦蜈蚣到達屏幕底部，它就會開始蜿蜒向上，但仍停留在玩家的 Bug Blaster 附近的比賽場地下部。

此外，任何到達屏幕最底部而沒有被射擊的蜈蚣會釋放其尾部，然後成為新的頭部。隨著時間的推移，其他新頭像也會從比賽場地的底角進入屏幕。

隨機移動的蜘蛛也會出現在第一波中。蜘蛛可以摧毀它們移動過的任何蘑菇，從而消除玩家的許多蘑菇目標。如果 Bug Blaster 和蜘蛛發生碰撞，兩者都會被摧毀。蜘蛛要么以 45 度角移動，要么垂直上下移動，而不是像蜈蚣那樣簡單地左右移動。

從第二波開始，跳蚤的轟炸就會出現。當跳蚤降落時，它會在身後留下一串新蘑菇。當一定數量的蘑菇留在屏幕底部時，跳蚤就會出現。隨著遊戲的進行，這個數字會增加，這意味著跳蚤在遊戲後期會更頻繁地出現。Bug Blaster 必須擊中跳蚤兩次才能將其消滅；第一顆子彈只是加速了它的下降。

當少於十一節的蜈蚣出現時，蝎子就會從兩側進入，移動速度相對較慢。隨著玩家獲得更多積分，蝎子的速度也會增加。當蝎子在屏幕上移動時，它會“毒害”它所移動的蘑菇並改變它們的顏色。這些蘑菇會導致任何與它們碰撞的蜈蚣直接朝屏幕底部移動，而不是繼續左右蜿蜒。Bug Blaster 可以通過射擊中毒的蜈蚣的頭部來阻止它。

如果玩家獲得至少 60,000 分，有兩件事會增加挑戰：跳蚤以更快的速度下降，而蜘蛛則將其移動限制在屏幕底部的較小區域。

19xx.name: 19XX：與命運的戰爭
19xx.original_desc: 19XX: The War Against Destiny is a vertical scrolling shooter arcade game made by Capcom in 1995 (copyrighted in 1996). The game is the 4th of a series of World War II vertical shooters made by Capcom. The story takes place before a fictional war (Hence, the 19XX) as a lone pilot tries to defeat an entire army/evil organization from starting another World War, which soon escalates to a nuclear apocalypse.
19xx.desc: 《19XX：命運之戰》是Capcom於1995年製作的一款垂直捲軸射擊街機遊戲（1996年版權所有）。該遊戲是 Capcom 製作的二戰垂直射擊遊戲系列的第四款。故事發生在一場虛構的戰爭（因此，19XX）之前，一名孤獨的飛行員試圖擊敗整個軍隊/邪惡組織，以免引發另一場世界大戰，這場戰爭很快升級為核災難。

tmnt2po.name: 忍者神龜
tmnt2po.original_desc: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is a side-scrolling beat 'em up released by Konami in 1989. It is based on the first Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles animated series which began airing in the winter of 1987. The player chooses from one of the four Ninja Turtles: Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael. After Shredder kidnaps the Turtles' friend April O'Neil and their mentor Splinter, they must give chase, save their comrades, and defeat the evil Shredder. Up to four players (two in some versions) can take control of any of the Turtles. Donatello has slower attacks but a longer range, Michelangelo and Raphael have faster attacks but a shorter range, and Leonardo is a well-rounded Turtle with average range and speed. Most of the enemies the Turtles face are the Foot Soldiers, all color-coded to indicate their attack patterns and weapon of choices. Some enemies, such as the standard purple-clad Foot Soldiers and Roadkill Rodney robots, have the ability to restrain the Turtles' mobility and drain their health, leaving the player open to attack for other enemies. The bosses in the game include Rocksteady and Bebop (individually at first in that order, and later the two of them together), Baxter Stockman, Granitor, General Traag, Krang, and Shredder himself.
tmnt2po.desc: 《忍者神龜》是 Konami 於 1989 年發行的橫向捲軸清版動作遊戲。它基於 1987 年冬天開始播出的首部《忍者神龜》動畫系列。玩家可以從四位忍者神龜中選擇一個：萊昂納多、米開朗基羅、多納泰羅和拉斐爾。施萊德綁架了海龜們的朋友阿普麗爾·奧尼爾和他們的導師斯普林特後，他們必須追擊，拯救他們的戰友，並擊敗邪惡的施萊德。最多四名玩家（某些版本中為兩名）可以控制任何海龜。多納泰羅的攻擊速度較慢，但射程較遠，米開朗基羅和拉斐爾的攻擊速度較快，但射程較短，萊昂納多是一隻全面的海龜，射程和速度均屬中等。海龜面臨的大多數敵人都是步兵，所有敵人都用顏色編碼來指示他們的攻擊模式和選擇的武器。一些敵人，例如標準的紫衣步兵和路殺羅德尼機器人，有能力限制海龜的移動性並消耗它們的生命值，讓玩家可以攻擊其他敵人。遊戲中的 Boss 包括 Rocksteady 和 Bebop（一開始按順序單獨出現，後來兩人一起出現）、Baxter Stockman、Granitor、General Traag、Krang 和 Shredder 本人。

gaiden.name: 忍者龍劍傳
gaiden.original_desc: Ryu, the Dragon Ninja, travels the world to defeat evil wherever he finds it.
gaiden.desc: 龍忍者龍環遊世界，無論發現哪裡都有邪惡勢力。

gunnail.name: 槍釘
gunnail.original_desc: Gunnail is a fast-paced vertical space shoot'em-up. The player controls a spacecraft flying straight through waves of relentless enemies. Armed with a powerful gun that can be upgraded using power-ups and special weapons, the player must blast through hordes of enemies to survive. At the end of each level, a heavily armed and challenging boss awaits, putting your skills and firepower to the test.
gunnail.desc: Gunnail 是一款快節奏的垂直太空射擊遊戲。玩家控制一艘宇宙飛船直線飛行，穿過一波又一波無情的敵人。玩家配備了一把強大的槍，可以使用能量提升和特殊武器進行升級，必須擊退成群的敵人才能生存。在每個關卡的最後，都會有一個全副武裝且具有挑戰性的頭目等待著您，考驗您的技能和火力。

kungfum.name: 如果你是福大師
kungfum.original_desc:
Regarded as the first beat 'em up brawler, Kung-Fu Master, known as Spartan X in Japan, is a side-scrolling game developed by Irem for arcades in 1984.
Designed by Takashi Nishiyama, the game is loosely based on Jackie Chan and Bruce Lee martial arts films.
The player controls Thomas, the titular Kung-Fu Master, as he fights his way through the five levels of the Devil's Temple to rescue his girlfriend Sylvia from the crime boss Mr. X.
kungfum.desc:
《功夫大師》（在日本稱為 Spartan X）被認為是第一款格鬥格鬥遊戲，是 Irem 於 1984 年為街機開發的一款橫向捲軸遊戲。
該遊戲由西山隆設計，大致以成龍和李小龍武術電影為基礎。
玩家控制名義上的功夫大師托馬斯，在惡魔聖殿的五個關卡中殺出一條血路，從犯罪頭目 X 先生手中救出他的女朋友西爾維婭。

lightbr.name: 地下城魔法
lightbr.original_desc: Four mythical heroes traverse dungeons and castles to find and defeat the source of evil corruptive power that is threatening their land. Gameplay is refreshingly less linear than most beat'em ups.
lightbr.desc: 四位神話英雄穿越地下城和城堡，尋找並擊敗威脅他們土地的邪惡腐敗力量的根源。與大多數清版遊戲相比，遊戲玩法的線性度較低，令人耳目一新。

moonwalk.name: 邁克爾·傑克遜的月球漫步者
moonwalk.original_desc: Based on the movie of the same name, Moonwalker is a scrolling, isometric beat' em up in which Michael Jackson (1958-2009), along with his chimp Bubbles, attempts to save children and defeat the evil 'Mr. Big'. During each round, the player must defeat each and every one of Mr. Big's henchmen and the deadly enemy machines that patrol the levels. This is achieved either by shooting them with Michael Jackson's 'magical energy', or by using his Dance Magic - the game's equivalent of a smart bomb. Some enemies take only one shot to defeat whereas others take several shots before they are destroyed. The longer the player holds down on the fire button, the greater the amount of magical energy Michael can inflict. At the start of each round, the player is given 2 dance magic smart bombs. Towards the end of each round, Michael's pet chimpanzee, Bubbles, will be seen moving about. If Michael touches Bubbles, he will turn into a powerful robot (the 'Moonwalker' of the game's title). After Michael has become Moonwalker, he will be able to shoot lasers and fire missiles. Michael must defeat every boss enemy at the end of each round in order to proceed to the next.
moonwalk.desc: 改編自同名電影的《月球行者》是一款滾動等距動作遊戲，其中邁克爾·傑克遜（1958-2009）和他的黑猩猩泡泡試圖拯救兒童並擊敗邪惡的“月球先生”。大的'。在每一輪中，玩家必須擊敗大先生的每一個追隨者以及在關卡中巡邏的致命敵方機器。這可以通過使用邁克爾·傑克遜的“魔法能量”射擊它們或使用他的舞蹈魔法（遊戲中相當於智能炸彈）來實現。有些敵人只需一槍即可擊敗，而另一些敵人則需要數次射擊才能被消滅。玩家按住開火按鈕的時間越長，邁克爾可以施加的魔法能量就越大。每輪開始時，玩家都會獲得2個舞動魔法智能炸彈。每輪結束時，都會看到邁克爾的寵物黑猩猩巴布斯四處走動。如果邁克爾觸摸泡泡，他就會變成一個強大的機器人（遊戲標題中的“月球行者”）。邁克爾成為月球行者後，他將能夠發射激光和發射導彈。邁克爾必須在每輪結束時擊敗所有頭目敵人才能進入下一輪。

growlu.name: 咆哮
growlu.original_desc: Beat-em-up with an outback Indiana Jones type theme to it. The arcade original allowed you to play up to four players. The game would later get a port done for the Sega Genesis.
growlu.desc: 帶有內陸印第安納瓊斯類型主題的格鬥遊戲。街機原版允許您最多玩四名玩家。該遊戲後來為世嘉創世紀完成了移植。

1943.name: 1943年：中途島海戰
1943.original_desc:
Set in the Pacific theater of World War II, off the coast of the Midway Atoll. The goal is to attack the Japanese Air Fleet that bombed the players' American aircraft carrier, pursue all Japanese air and sea forces, fly through the 16 levels of play, make their way and destroy the Japanese battleship Yamato. 11 levels consist of an air-to-sea battle (with a huge battleship or an aircraft carrier as an End-Level Boss), while 5 levels consist of an all-aerial battle against a squadron of Japanese bombers and a mother bomber that needs to be destroyed.
As in 1942, players pilot a P-38. Two buttons are used: one for regular attacks and one for special actions that executes either a loop or one of three special attacks that damage the plane. Unlike in 1942, the player only has one life, with one refillable energy meter. Destroying a complete formation of red enemy planes will result in a power-up, such as a health boost or a temporary special weapon that replaces the default twin gun.
1943.desc:
故事發生在第二次世界大戰的太平洋戰區，中途島環礁附近。目標是攻擊轟炸玩家美國航空母艦的日本空軍艦隊，追擊所有日本空軍和海軍，飛過16個關卡，殺出一條血路並摧毀日本戰列艦大和號。11個關卡包括空對海戰鬥（以一艘巨大的戰列艦或一艘航空母艦作為最終級Boss），而5個關卡包括與一個日本轟炸機中隊和一架需要摧毀的母轟炸機的全空戰鬥。
與 1942 年一樣，玩家駕駛 P-38。使用兩個按鈕：一個用於常規攻擊，另一個用於執行循環或損壞飛機的三種特殊攻擊之一的特殊操作。與 1942 年不同的是，玩家只有一次生命，並有一個可補充的能量計。摧毀完整的紅色敵機編隊將導致能量提升，例如生命值提升或替代默認雙槍的臨時特殊武器。

bionicc.name: 仿生突擊隊
bionicc.original_desc:
Bionic Commando is a scrolling platform shoot-em-up set ten years after the end of World War III, with the player taking on the role of 'Super Joe'; an elite Commando tasked with infiltrating the enemy's heavily defended military base to discover their secrets plans and destroy their missile silos. 

To aid him in his mission, Joe is equipped with a bionic arm; a telescopic grappling hook that is used to traverse the many platforms and ledges that make up the game's levels. The arm can also be used to temporarily stun enemies or knock them from platforms, as well as to retrieve the bonus items, wooden crates and weapons that are occasionally dropped into the war zone by parachute. 

As well as the bionic arm, Joe is armed with a shotgun used to kill enemies and destroy obstructions. The shotgun can only be fired left and right, however, and cannot be used at the same time as the bionic arm. More powerful guns can be picked up throughout the game.
bionicc.desc:
《Bionic Commando》是一款滾動平台射擊遊戲，背景設定在第三次世界大戰結束十年後，玩家扮演“超級喬”的角色；精英突擊隊的任務是滲透敵人戒備森嚴的軍事基地，發現他們的秘密計劃並摧毀他們的導彈發射井。

為了幫助他完成任務，喬配備了一條仿生手臂；一個伸縮式抓鉤，用於穿越構成遊戲關卡的許多平台和壁架。該手臂還可以用來暫時擊暈敵人或將他們從平台上擊落，以及取回偶爾通過降落傘掉落到戰區的獎勵物品、木箱和武器。

除了仿生手臂之外，喬還配備了一把獵槍，用於殺死敵人並摧毀障礙物。不過，霰彈槍只能左右射擊，不能與仿生手臂同時使用。在整個遊戲過程中可以拾取更強大的槍支。

xmcotau.name: X戰警:原子之子
xmcotau.original_desc: X-MEN UNLEASHED! It's here! Ultimate combat! Mutant mayhem! X-Power! Special moves! Mid-air action! Big characters! Sizzling graphics! Exactly like you played in the arcade! You will need all your mutant powers, all your speed, all your strength... for this is the ultimate combat! Have you got enough to defeat Magneto, Omega Red and the Sentinel? Are you tough enough for Wolverine, powerful enough for Cyclops, cool enough for Iceman... are you good enough to join the new breed of mutant heroes? X-Men Children of the Atom - the fighting game to end them all!
xmcotau.desc: X戰警釋放！就在這裡！終極戰鬥！變種人大亂鬥！X-力量！特別動作！空中動作！大人物！火熱的圖形！就像您在街機遊戲中玩的一樣！你將需要你所有的變異力量、你所有的速度、你所有的力量……因為這是終極戰鬥！你有足夠的能力來擊敗萬磁王、紅歐米茄和哨兵嗎？對於金剛狼來說，你足夠堅強嗎？對於獨眼巨人來說，你足夠強大嗎？對於冰人來說，你足夠冷靜嗎？你足夠優秀，可以加入新一代變種人英雄嗎？X戰警原子之子 - 消滅他們的格鬥遊戲！

qix.name: 齊克斯
qix.original_desc: The objective of Qix is to claim a certain proportion of the playing field as your own. At the start of each level, the playing field is just a large, empty rectangle, containing the Qix - a stick-like entity that performs peculiar, erratic motions within the confines of the rectangle. The player controls a small marker that can move around the edges of the rectangle. To claim an area of the screen, the player must detach from an edge and draw Stix within the rectangle. Stix are simply lines traced out by moving the marker. When the marker traces out a closed shape, the area enclosed by the shape becomes solid and has been claimed. The player may draw either Fast Stix, which appear blue when solid, or Slow Stix, which appear red. Slow Stix take longer to draw, but are worth twice as many points. Once the player has claimed an area, the marker can safely move along the border of that claimed area. To complete a level, the player must claim 75% or more of the rectangle's area.
qix.desc: Qix 的目標是佔據一定比例的競爭環境。在每個關卡開始時，比賽場地只是一個大的空矩形，其中包含 Qix - 一種棒狀實體，可以在矩形範圍內執行奇特且不穩定的運動。玩家控制一個可以在矩形邊緣移動的小標記。要佔據屏幕區域，玩家必須脫離邊緣並在矩形內繪製 Stix。Stix 是通過移動標記畫出的簡單線條。當標記描繪出一個閉合形狀時，該形狀所包圍的區域就會變成實心並已被聲明。玩家可以抽取 Fast Stix（固體時呈藍色）或 Slow Stix（呈紅色）。緩慢的 Stix 需要更長的時間來繪製，但其價值是兩倍。一旦玩家佔領了一個區域，標記就可以沿著該佔領區域的邊界安全地移動。要完成關卡，玩家必須佔據矩形面積的 75% 或更多。

loht.name: 英雄傳說 湯瑪
loht.original_desc: A little caped hero fights his way to the boss' castle through a cute scrolling world. Enemies can be killed by fireballs or stunned when jumped upon. Killed enemies and chests leave coins to increase a person's score and options give aiming shots and bouncing fireballs.
loht.desc: 一位披著斗篷的小英雄穿過可愛的滾動世界，一路殺到了 Boss 的城堡。敵人可能會被火球殺死，也可能被跳上來擊暈。被殺死的敵人和箱子會留下硬幣來增加一個人的分數，而選項則提供瞄準射擊和彈跳火球。

bosco.name: 波斯尼亞
bosco.original_desc: Bosconian is a multi-directional space shooter where the player must destroy several enemy bases on each round while evading enemy ships, asteroids and mines. Enemy bases are destroyed either with a shot to the center or by shooting out all six base cannons. The player's ship is always positioned in the center of the screen with everything else scrolling around it as the player flies. A radar map to the right shows the position of the player, enemy bases, and occasional formation attack groups.
bosco.desc: 《Bosconian》是一款多向太空射擊遊戲，玩家必須在每輪中摧毀多個敵方基地，同時躲避敵方船隻、小行星和地雷。敵方基地可以通過向中心射擊或發射所有六門基地大砲來摧毀。玩家的飛船始終位於屏幕中央，當玩家飛行時，其他所有內容都在其周圍滾動。右側的雷達圖顯示了玩家的位置、敵人的基地以及偶爾出現的編隊攻擊組的位置。

strider.name: 神行者
strider.original_desc:
Strider is a multi-directional scrolling platform beat-em-up in which the player takes control of 'Strider Hiryu', a ninja-style warrior who must defeat a legendary being known as 'Grandmaster Meio'. 

Set in a dystopian future in the year 2048, Meio has been watching Earth from his own distant galaxy and has created a space station (known as 'The Third Moon') between Earth and its moon in order to rule over the Human race.
strider.desc:
《Strider》是一款多向捲軸平台格鬥遊戲，玩家控制“Strider Hiryu”，一位忍者風格的戰士，必須擊敗傳奇人物“Meio 大師”。

故事發生在 2048 年的反烏托邦未來，Meio 一直在自己遙遠的星系中觀察著地球，並在地球和月球之間創建了一個空間站（稱為“第三月亮”），以統治人類。

loderndf.name: 淘金者：挖掘之戰
loderndf.original_desc:
Lode Runner: The Dig Fight is an arcade sequel to Lode Runner. It is very similar to its predecessor. You must find all gold on the map and several enemies chase you. You can dig temporary holes in the ground to catch and eliminate enemies. The game uses a new graphics set and has some story elements, presented through static cut-scenes.
Maintenance Code: In test mode enter this code...
5-0-8-2-0: Some nice features appear include stages select, obj test, etc... and a complete Map editor!!
loderndf.desc:
Lode Runner: The Dig Fight 是 Lode Runner 的街機續作。它與其前身非常相似。你必須找到地圖上的所有黃金，並且有幾個敵人追趕你。你可以在地上挖臨時的洞來捕捉並消滅敵人。該遊戲使用了新的圖形設置並具有一些故事元素，通過靜態過場動畫呈現。
維護代碼：在測試模式下輸入此代碼...
5-0-8-2-0：出現了一些不錯的功能，包括階段選擇、對象測試等......以及完整的地圖編輯器！

sharrier.name: 太空鷂
sharrier.original_desc:
Space Harrier is a sprite-scaling 3D shoot-em-up set in the 'Fantasy Zone'; a surreal world composed of abstract structures and a checkerboard landscape. The game's enemies are as abstract as its setting; with creatures including prehistoric Mammoths, alien pods, giant mushrooms and, at the end of most stages, a huge, fireball-spitting Chinese Dragon.
nnThe player's on-screen counterpart carries a portable jetpack under his arm which allows him to fly. The player can also run along the ground to avoid overhead structures and enemies.
nnIn addition to its flight capability, the jetpack is also equipped with a laser, used to destroy both the game's many enemies as well as some (but not all) obstructions, such as the trees and floating rocks on the first stage.
sharrier.desc:
《太空鷂》是一款以“幻想區”為背景的精靈縮放 3D 射擊遊戲；一個由抽象結構和棋盤景觀組成的超現實世界。遊戲的敵人和它的背景一樣抽象。遊戲中的生物包括史前猛獁象、外星豆莢、巨型蘑菇，以及在大多數關卡結束時出現的巨大的、噴火球的中國龍。
玩家在屏幕上的對應角色腋下夾著一個便攜式噴氣背包，可以讓他飛行。玩家還可以沿著地面奔跑，避開頭頂的建築物和敵人。
除了飛行能力之外，噴氣背包還配備了激光，用於摧毀遊戲中的許多敵人以及一些（但不是全部）障礙物，例如第一階段的樹木和漂浮的岩石。

parodius.name: 帕羅狄烏斯 是的！
parodius.original_desc:
Parodius Da! is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up in which the Great Octopus has threatened Earth. To help Parodius save the planet, the player and his friends must begin their search across the world to find the enemy and destroy him.   

Parodius Da! was created as a parody of Konami's own "Gradius" series of shoot-em-ups but adopted a graphical style that was entirely its own; something that becomes evident at the very start of the game when players can chose to pilot either a penguin or an octopus rather that the traditional Gradius ship.
parodius.desc:
帕羅狄烏斯達！是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，其中大章魚威脅了地球。為了幫助 Parodius 拯救地球，玩家和他的朋友必須開始在世界各地尋找敵人並消滅他。

帕羅狄烏斯達！是對 Konami 自己的射擊遊戲“Gradius”系列的模仿，但採用了完全屬於其自己的圖形風格；這在遊戲一開始就變得很明顯，玩家可以選擇駕駛企鵝或章魚，而不是傳統的 Gradius 飛船。

pitfight.name: 坑鬥士
pitfight.original_desc: Three digitized brawlers face off co-operatively against a variety of street thugs, with gameplay featuring crowd interference and usable weapons. Players also get to fight each other in a 'Grudge Match'. Pit-Fighter featured impressive camera zoom and side-to-side pan but was somewhat flawed as a gameplay experience. On the dedicated cabinet version, up to three players can play simultaneously.
pitfight.desc: 三個數字化鬥毆者合作對抗各種街頭暴徒，遊戲玩法以人群干擾和可用武器為特色。玩家還可以在“怨恨比賽”中互相戰鬥。《Pit-Fighter》具有令人印象深刻的相機變焦和左右平移功能，但作為遊戲體驗存在一些缺陷。在專用機櫃版本上，最多可以三個玩家同時玩。

batman.name: 蝙蝠俠
batman.original_desc: Batman is a horizontally scrolling beat 'em up arcade game released by Atari Games, Midway Games, Data East and Namco in 1990 in North America, and in 1991 in Japan and Europe. The storyline is based on the eponymous 1989 movie. It features stages based on locations in the film, including first-person control of the Batmobile and the Batwing. The game features audio clips of Batman (Michael Keaton) and the Joker (Jack Nicholson) as well as digitized photos from the film. Batman can use various weapons, such as batarangs and gas grenades, as he takes on various goons and the Joker.
batman.desc: 《蝙蝠俠》是一款橫向捲軸清版街機遊戲，由 Atari Games、Midway Games、Data East 和 Namco 於 1990 年在北美髮行，並於 1991 年在日本和歐洲發行。故事情節改編自 1989 年的同名電影。它的舞台基於電影中的地點，包括第一人稱控制蝙蝠車和蝙蝠翼。該遊戲包含蝙蝠俠（邁克爾·基頓）和小丑（傑克·尼科爾森）的音頻片段以及電影中的數字化照片。蝙蝠俠在對抗各種暴徒和小丑時可以使用各種武器，例如蝙蝠鏢和毒氣手榴彈。

hooku.name: 鉤
hooku.original_desc: Straight out of the Peter Pan saga and based on the feature film starring Robin Williams, the Never-Never Land children fight to stop the evil Captain Hook from ruining their fun!
hooku.desc: 直接取自彼得·潘傳奇故事，改編自羅賓·威廉姆斯主演的故事片，夢幻島的孩子們奮力阻止邪惡的胡克船長破壞他們的樂趣！

ramprt2p.name: 壁壘
ramprt2p.original_desc:
Rampart is a superb arcade puzzle game in which up to three players must build up a castle using Tetris shaped pieces to form a castle wall and enclose their keep. Each player must then place a limited number of cannons inside their castle wall before the timer expires. Once the cannons have been placed the battle itself begins. Players must target their cannons onto the enemy's castle (or, in the one-player game, enemy ships and peons) and destroy as much of the enemy army as possible before the time limit expires. 

Once the battle is over the players must repair their castles, again using tetris shapes. The players' Keep must be completely encircled with castle wall or the game is over. In the single-player sea attack game, any enemy ships that manage to reach the coast nearest the player will unload peons that will attack the player's castle by land.
ramprt2p.desc:
Rampart 是一款出色的街機益智遊戲，最多三名玩家必須使用俄羅斯方塊形狀的碎片建造一座城堡，形成城堡牆並包圍他們的城堡。然後，每個玩家必須在計時器到期之前在其城堡牆內放置有限數量的大砲。一旦大砲被放置好，戰鬥就開始了。玩家必須將大砲瞄準敵人的城堡（或者，在單人遊戲中，瞄準敵方船隻和苦工），並在時間限製到期之前摧毀盡可能多的敵軍。

戰鬥結束後，玩家必須再次使用俄羅斯方塊形狀來修復他們的城堡。玩家的要塞必須被城牆完全包圍，否則遊戲結束。在單人海上攻擊遊戲中，任何設法到達距離玩家最近的海岸的敵方船隻都會卸下苦工，這些苦工將從陸地上攻擊玩家的城堡。

hvysmsh.name: 重擊
hvysmsh.original_desc:
Heavy Smash is a futuristic handball game. You start by choosing a team from the United States, Japan, Spain, Brazil, Germany, England, Italy, Egypt, Australia or a special team of cyborgs.
 
The game is controlled with three buttons: one to throw the ball, another to pass it to another teammate, and a third button to jump. You have a power indicator that fills up quickly over time and when it's completely full, you can perform a super launch.
hvysmsh.desc:
Heavy Smash 是一款未來風格的手球遊戲。首先，你可以選擇一支來自美國、日本、西班牙、巴西、德國、英格蘭、意大利、埃及、澳大利亞的球隊或一支由機器人組成的特殊球隊。

遊戲由三個按鈕控制：一個用於投球，另一個用於將球傳給另一位隊友，第三個按鈕用於跳躍。您的電源指示器會隨著時間的推移而快速充滿，當它完全充滿時，您可以執行超級啟動。

gngt.name: 鬼與妖精
gngt.original_desc:
Ghosts 'n Goblins is a platform game where the player controls a knight, named Sir Arthur, who must defeat zombies, ogres, demons, cyclops, dragons and other monsters in order to rescue Princess Prin Prin, who has been kidnapped by Satan, king of Demon World. Along the way the player can pick up new weapons, bonuses and extra suits of armor that can help in this task.

The player can only be hit twice before losing a life. If the player loses a life, they are returned to the start of the level, or the halfway point if they have managed to get that far. Furthermore, each life can only last a certain length of time. After defeating the final boss, the player must then replay the entire game on a higher difficulty level to reach the genuine final battle.
gngt.desc:
《Ghosts 'n Goblins》是一款平台遊戲，玩家控制一位名為亞瑟爵士的騎士，他必須擊敗殭屍、食人魔、惡魔、獨眼巨人、龍等怪物，以營救被惡魔世界之王撒旦綁架的普林普林公主。一路上，玩家可以拾取新武器、獎勵和額外的盔甲，以幫助完成這項任務。

玩家在失去生命之前只能被擊中兩次。如果玩家失去生命，他們將返回到關卡的起點，或者如果他們已經成功到達了中間點。而且，每一個生命只能持續一定的時間。擊敗最終boss後，玩家必須以更高的難度重玩整個遊戲，才能達到真正的最終戰鬥。

aerofgt.name: 航空戰鬥機
aerofgt.original_desc: A superb vertically scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player chooses an ace fighter pilot from a selection of 4 countries (USA, Japan, Sweden and Britain) and takes to the skies to destroy enemy jets, boats, helicopt
aerofgt.desc: 一款出色的垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家從 4 個國家（美國、日本、瑞典和英國）中選擇一名王牌戰鬥機飛行員，並飛向天空摧毀敵方噴氣式飛機、船隻和直升機

valkyrie.name: 瓦爾基里耶傳說
valkyrie.original_desc: A top-down action-adventure game somewhat similar to The Legend of Zelda.
valkyrie.desc: 一款自上而下的動作冒險遊戲，有點類似於《塞爾達傳說》。

btoads.name: 戰蟾蜍
btoads.original_desc:
Battletoads is a (mostly) horizontally-scrolling beat-em-up in which up to three players take on the roles of Rash, Pimple, or Zitz and must punch and kick their way through six enemy-infested stages to save their alternate universe from the Dark Queen.

The Toads each vary in fighting style: Rash is nimble, Pimple is burly and strong, and Zitz is a balance of the two. Each Toad also has its own signature exaggerated power and attack, in which their limbs turn into objects such as axes and drills.

In a visually unique twist, the Toads can knock the game's enemies 'off-screen' so that they appear to fly towards the players, breaking the fourth wall. Enemies include aliens, mutant rodents and snowmen.

The game's stages, in addition to having their own unique visual theme, often differ in gameplay style. Some levels are Double Dragon-style 2.5D brawlers, while others are strictly two-dimensional, platform-like stages. In one level, the Toads wear jet-packs and descend a tunnel and in the final level, the Toads shoot enemies from a vehicle.
btoads.desc:
《Battletoads》是一款（大部分）水平滾動的格鬥遊戲，最多三名玩家扮演 Rash、Pimple 或 Zitz 的角色，必須拳打腳踢地穿過六個敵人出沒的關卡，從黑暗女王手中拯救他們的平行宇宙。

每隻蟾蜍的戰鬥風格各不相同：拉什（Rash）敏捷，皮普勒（Pimple）魁梧而強壯，而齊茲（Zitz）則是兩者的平衡。每隻蟾蜍都有自己標誌性的誇張力量和攻擊力，它們的四肢會變成斧頭和鑽頭等物體。

在視覺上獨特的扭曲中，蟾蜍可以將游戲中的敵人擊出“屏幕外”，使他們看起來飛向玩家，打破第四堵牆。敵人包括外星人、變異囓齒動物和雪人。

遊戲的關卡除了擁有自己獨特的視覺主題外，遊戲風格也往往有所不同。有些關卡是雙截龍風格的 2.5D 格鬥遊戲，而另一些關卡則是嚴格的二維平台式關卡。在一個關卡中，蟾蜍們穿著噴氣背包並沿著隧道下降，在最後關卡中，蟾蜍們從車輛上射擊敵人。

tmnt22p.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtles in Time
tmnt22p.name: 忍者神龜：時之龜
tmnt22p.original_desc:
The sequel to 1989's hugely successful original, 'Turtles in Time' once more sees the four heroes taking on Shredder and his army. Gameplay remains similar to the original game, but the experience is enhanced further with the obligatory improved graphics and sound effects. 'Turtles in Time' also features a larger variety of levels, as now the battle between good and evil rages across time as the Turtles travel to prehistoric, pirate and Wild West times in their pursuit of the elusive Splinter. 

Yet again, Konami's mastery of the genre was in evidence as the manic energy and humour of the cartoon and comic-book series upon which the game is based was captured perfectly.
tmnt22p.desc:
1989 年大獲成功的原著《時之海龜》的續集再次見證了四位英雄與施萊德和他的軍隊的較量。遊戲玩法仍然與原始遊戲相似，但通過必要的改進圖形和聲音效果進一步增強了體驗。《時之海龜》的關卡種類也更加豐富，隨著海龜們前往史前、海盜和狂野西部時代，追尋難以捉摸的碎片，正義與邪惡之間的戰鬥正在跨越時空進行。

科樂美對這一類型的掌握再一次得到了證明，因為遊戲所基於的卡通和漫畫系列的狂躁能量和幽默被完美地捕捉到了。

darkseal.name: 黑暗封印
darkseal.original_desc:
Dark Seal is a fantasy hack and slash game in which up to four people can play at the same time, choosing from three stock fantasy characters (Knight, Wizard and Bard) and, for some reason, a Ninja. Players must then fight their way through enemy-packed levels, plundering treasure and avoiding the game's many traps. Gameplay is highly reminiscent of Atari's legendary 1985 classic, "Gauntlet".

The original USA arcade release was entitled Gate of Doom.
darkseal.desc:
《Dark Seal》是一款奇幻砍殺遊戲，最多可四人同時玩，從三個常用奇幻角色（騎士、巫師和吟遊詩人）中進行選擇，並且出於某種原因還可以選擇忍者。然後，玩家必須在充滿敵人的關卡中殺出一條血路，掠奪寶藏並避開遊戲中的許多陷阱。遊戲玩法非常讓人想起 Atari 1985 年的傳奇經典遊戲“Gauntlet”。

最初的美國街機版本名為《末日之門》。

bbros.name: 龐
bbros.original_desc: One or two players control safari-suited characters armed with harpoon guns, who must destroy the numerous different-sized balloons that litter each stage. When hit by a harpoon, the balloons break down into smaller fragments.
bbros.desc: 一到兩名玩家控制穿著狩獵服、手持魚叉槍的角色，他們必須摧毀每個階段散落的眾多不同大小的氣球。當被魚叉擊中時，氣球會分解成更小的碎片。

sonson.name: 聲音 聲音
sonson.original_desc: Son Son is a 2-D sidescrolling platformer. The screen scrolls automatically, only stopping to fight major enemies. The screen features six continuous platforms that occasionally feature small gaps. Sonson and Tonton walk automatically across these platforms. Pressing up or down will cause them to jump up or down to the next platform. Pressing left causes them to move more slowly than the screen scrolls, and right, faster. The duo have only one attack - the ability to fire energy blasts from their staves. Touching an enemy or an unfriendly projectile causes the player to lose a life. If a player has any additional lives, they will return to the screen riding on a cloud that will give them temporary invincibility. If the player presses the control stick in any direction, the cloud will disappear and the character will resume its usual walking mode. The cloud will eventually disappear on its own if the control stick is not used.
sonson.desc: 《Son Son》是一款 2D 橫向捲軸平台遊戲。屏幕自動滾動，只有在與主要敵人戰鬥時才會停下來。屏幕有六個連續的平台，偶爾會有小間隙。Sonson 和 Tonton 自動走過這些平台。向上或向下按將使它們向上或向下跳到下一個平台。按左鍵會使它們移動得比屏幕滾動更慢，按右鍵則移動得更快。兩人只有一種攻擊——從法杖發射能量爆炸的能力。接觸敵人或不友好的射彈會導致玩家失去生命。如果玩家有額外的生命，他們將騎著雲返回屏幕，這將使他們暫時無敵。如果玩家向任意方向按下控制桿，雲就會消失，角色將恢復其通常的行走模式。如果不使用控制桿，雲最終會自行消失。

seganinu.name: 世嘉忍者
seganinu.original_desc: A run & gun shooter arcade game released by Sega in 1985, also known as Sega Ninja or The Ninja.
seganinu.desc: 世嘉於 1985 年推出的跑槍射擊街機遊戲，也稱為世嘉忍者或忍者。

superman.name: 超人
superman.original_desc: Superman is a horizontal video game and may be played by one or two players interactively. The second player controlling a red Superman character, teams up with the first player in this battle against the evil Alien Powers.
superman.desc: 超人是一款水平視頻遊戲，可以由一個或兩個玩家交互玩。第二名玩家控制著紅色超人角色，與第一位玩家聯手對抗邪惡的外星勢力。

rtypeu.name: R-Type
rtypeu.original_desc:
RType is a sideways-scrolling shoot-em-up in which the evil Bydo Empire rules the galaxy through fear and intimidation and it's up to the player - piloting their heavily-armed R-9 space ship - to battle through eight tough levels to the heart of the Bydo stronghold and defeat them.

The game's revolutionary weapons system is its real stroke of genius. The first of numerous innovations that R?Type bought to the genre is the beam weapon: when the fire button is held down, a 'power meter' starts to charge up; once the meter is full, releasing the fire button unleashes a very powerful plasma burst capable of inflicting much greater damage to enemy ships or even destroying numerous enemies simultaneously. The trade-off is that charging the weapon takes up valuable seconds, giving the Bydo ships time to attack.

The most significant addition to R-type's arsenal is the now-legendary 'Force Pod'. This takes the form of an invincible, detachable laser-firing pod that can be attached to either the front or rear of the player's ship, or can be detached completely, after which the pod sits some distance either ahead or behind the player's ship, tracking its movements and providing additional fire power. When attached to the R9 ship, the pod acts as a shield. This forms a crucial part of R?Type's gameplay and has to be fully utilised to navigate certain sections of the game, such as the huge mothership that comprises the game's 3rd stage.

R?Type's levels are designed to make full use of its unique weapons system, making for very linear and demanding gameplay in which losing or picking up the wrong weapon at the wrong time often leads to an instant death. Its intelligent, precise and demanding level design, gave the world its first truly 'strategic' shoot-em-up.
rtypeu.desc:
RType 是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，其中邪惡的 Bydo 帝國通過恐懼和恐嚇統治銀河系，玩家需要駕駛全副武裝的 R-9 太空飛船，通過八個艱難的關卡，到達 Bydo 要塞的中心並擊敗他們。

遊戲的革命性武器系統是其真正的天才之舉。R?Type 對該類型的眾多創新中的第一個是光束武器：按住開火按鈕時，“功率計”開始充電；一旦儀表滿了，釋放開火按鈕會釋放出非常強大的等離子爆發，能夠對敵方船隻造成更大的傷害，甚至同時摧毀大量敵人。代價是武器充電需要花費寶貴的時間，讓拜多艦艇有時間進行攻擊。

R-type 武器庫中最重要的補充是現已具有傳奇色彩的“Force Pod”。它採用無敵的、可拆卸的激光發射吊艙的形式，可以連接到玩家飛船的前部或後部，也可以完全拆卸，之後吊艙位於玩家飛船的前方或後方一定距離，跟踪其運動並提供額外的火力。當連接到 R9 飛船時，吊艙充當盾牌。這構成了 R?Type 遊戲玩法的重要組成部分，必須充分利用它來導航遊戲的某些部分，例如構成遊戲第三階段的巨大母艦。

R?Type 的關卡旨在充分利用其獨特的武器系統，打造出非常線性和高要求的遊戲玩法，在錯誤的時間丟失或拿起錯誤的武器往往會導致立即死亡。其智能、精確和高要求的關卡設計，為世界帶來了第一個真正的“戰略”射擊遊戲。

landmkrp.name: 土地製造者
landmkrp.original_desc: The objective of Land Maker is to shoot a certain colored block to other blocks of the same color to create a building. The larger the building the greater damage that is done to the player's opponent which in effect speeds up the moving counter which pushes the blocks ever closer to the edge after which the player or opponent will lose the battle.
landmkrp.desc: Land Maker 的目標是將特定顏色的方塊射擊到其他相同顏色的方塊上以創建建築物。建築物越大，對玩家對手造成的傷害就越大，這實際上會加速移動計數器，從而將方塊推向邊緣，之後玩家或對手將輸掉戰鬥。

volfied.name: 沃爾菲德
volfied.original_desc:
You play the pilot of the spaceship Monotros, returning to his home planet, Volfied, to save it from an alien invasion. At the start of each level, the game board takes the form of a rectangle: your ship moves around the perimeter (the edge), while several aliens move around the inside. 
Any incursion by the ship into the rectangle allows it to cut through the board, leaving it vulnerable to enemy attack. Each closed zone you draw will then be validated.
You will need to reclaim at least 80% of the game board to complete a level.
volfied.desc:
你扮演宇宙飛船 Monotros 的飛行員，返回他的家鄉 Volfied 星球，以拯救它免受外星人入侵。在每個關卡開始時，遊戲板採用矩形形式：您的飛船繞著周邊（邊緣）移動，而幾個外星人則在內部移動。
船隻對矩形的任何入侵都會使其切穿木板，使其容易受到敵人的攻擊。您繪製的每個封閉區域都將得到驗證。
您需要收回至少 80% 的遊戲板才能完成關卡。

tigeroad.name: 老虎路
tigeroad.original_desc: Tiger Road is a beat 'em up in which you (as Lee Wong) must rescue the village children from the evil Ryo Ken Oh. Many levels are horizontally scrolling, although with high ledges to jump onto and follow for a slightly different path. Magic urns containing improved weapons appear frequently. Most enemies are easy to attack and only need one hit to kill, although they come at you in large hordes. Once you get to the indoor sections you will find big enemies with the ability to kill you with one hit, in sections set on multiple levels complete with stairways.
tigeroad.desc: 《Tiger Road》是一款清版動作遊戲，您（飾演 Lee Wong）必須從邪惡的 Ryo Ken Oh 手中拯救村里的孩子們。許多關卡都是水平滾動的，儘管有很高的壁架可以跳上並遵循稍微不同的路徑。裝有改良武器的魔法甕經常出現。大多數敵人都很容易攻擊，只需要一擊即可殺死，儘管他們會成群結隊地向你襲來。一旦你到達室內區域，你會發現巨大的敵人，它們有能力一擊殺死你，這些區域設置在多個層次上，並配有樓梯。

stdragon.name: 聖龍
stdragon.original_desc: The galaxy is under threat from a malevolent race of cyborgs. Half animal, half machine, the cyborgs have already conquered most of the galaxy and now have their sights set on the galaxy's last hope, 'The Planet of the Golde
stdragon.desc: 銀河係正受到邪惡的機器人種族的威脅。一半是動物，一半是機器，半機械人已經征服了銀河系的大部分地區，現在他們的目光投向了銀河系最後的希望，“黃金星球”

polepos.name: 杆位
polepos.original_desc:
Pole Position is a 1-player game using a color raster-scan video display. Game action takes place at the Fuji Speedway in Japan. The country around the speedway consists of green meadows, hills, and snow-capped Mt. Fuji. 

The player drives a Formula-1 race car on the track. The first objective of the game is to finish the qualifying lap as quickly as possible. If the player beats the clock, he or she qualifies for the race. If not, he or she drives out the remainder of the time along the qualifying course.
polepos.desc:
Pole Position 是一款使用彩色光柵掃描視頻顯示器的單人遊戲。遊戲發生在日本富士賽車場。高速公路周圍的鄉村由綠色的草地、丘陵和白雪皚皚的富士山組成。

玩家在賽道上駕駛一級方程式賽車。比賽的首要目標是盡快完成排位賽圈。如果玩家擊敗了時間，他或她就有資格參加比賽。如果沒有，他或她將在排位賽中剩餘的時間中行駛。

zaxxon.name: 扎克森
zaxxon.original_desc: Zaxxon is an isometric scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player pilots an armed spaceship and must penetrate heavily-fortified enemy bases, destroying enemy ships and installations before reaching the final confrontation with a giant armoured robot.
zaxxon.desc: Zaxxon 是一款等距捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家駕駛一艘武裝宇宙飛船，必須穿透戒備森嚴的敵方基地，摧毀敵方船隻和設施，然後與巨型裝甲機器人進行最終對抗。

varthu.name: 價值：雷暴行動
varthu.original_desc: Varth: Operation Thunderstorm is an arcade game in the vertical scrolling shooter genre, published in 1992. The game did not see a console port following its initial release, but 14 years later Digital Eclipse Software would port the game onto the PlayStation 2, PSP and Xbox as part of the Capcom Classics Collection Vol. 2.
varthu.desc: 《Varth：雷暴行動》是一款垂直捲軸射擊遊戲類型的街機遊戲，於 1992 年發布。該遊戲在首次發布後並未出現在控制台端口，但 14 年後，Digital Eclipse Software 將游戲作為 Capcom Classics Collection Vol 的一部分移植到 PlayStation 2、PSP 和 Xbox 上。2.

missile.name: 導彈司令部
missile.original_desc:
Missile Command is a one or two-player game depicting the outbreak of a nuclear war. Players must defend six cities from waves of incoming nuclear missiles by launching their own anti-ballistic missiles (ABMs) from one of three missile batteries. 

The game is played by moving a cross-hair across the sky and pressing one of three buttons to launch an ABM from the corresponding battery (either Alpha Base, Delta Base or Omega Base). Upon reaching the cross-hair the player's ABM explodes, creating a fireball that lasts for several seconds and destroys any enemy missiles that enter it. Each battery is initially armed with ten anti-ballistic missiles and becomes useless when either all of its missiles have been fired or it's been destroyed by enemy missiles.
missile.desc:
Missile Command 是一款描繪核戰爭爆發的單人或兩人遊戲。玩家必須從三個導彈連之一發射自己的反彈道導彈（ABM），保衛六個城市免受一波又一波來襲核導彈的襲擊。

遊戲的玩法是在天空中移動十字準線，然後按下三個按鈕之一，從相應的電池（阿爾法基地、德爾塔基地或歐米茄基地）發射反導導彈。到達十字準線後，玩家的反導系統會爆炸，產生持續數秒的火球，並摧毀任何進入其中的敵方導彈。每個砲台最初配備十枚反彈道導彈，當所有導彈都已發射或被敵方導彈摧毀時，砲台就變得毫無用處。

dbreed.name: 龍種
dbreed.original_desc:
Zambaquous has done everything to make life hell for the people of Agamen, and as their King Kayus, the time has come to head out to destroy him. This leads to six levels of horizontally-scrolling shoot 'em up action, although with some vertical movement as well.

The thing which sets the game apart from every other horizontally-scrolling shoot 'em up (except Saint Dragon) is that you are riding on the back of a dragon, called Bahamoot. Both you and the dragon have firepower, and holding down the fire button increases Bahamoot's energy bolt's ferocity. The dragon's tail can be controlled indirectly, and because it is indestructible, it can be used either as a shield, or as a weapon in its own right.

There are power-ups to collect by dismounting from the dragon and walking into them. These include fiery breath, bolts shot from Bahamoot's tail, homing missiles of sorts, and lightning bolts, with only one ever active at a time. Each level has a time limit.
dbreed.desc:
贊巴庫斯竭盡全力讓阿伽門人民的生活變得地獄，而作為他們的國王卡尤斯，現在是時候去消滅他了。這導致了六個級別的水平滾動射擊動作，儘管也有一些垂直移動。

該遊戲與其他水平捲軸射擊遊戲（《聖龍》除外）的不同之處在於，你騎在一條名為“巴哈莫特”的龍背上。你和龍都有火力，按住開火按鈕會增加巴哈莫特能量箭的兇猛程度。龍尾可以間接控制，而且由於它堅不可摧，因此它既可以用作盾牌，也可以單獨用作武器。

從龍身上下來並走進它們可以收集能量提升。這些包括熾熱的呼吸、從巴哈莫特尾巴射出的閃電、各種尋的導彈和閃電，一次只有一個處於活動狀態。每個級別都有時間限制。

mtwins.name: 巨型雙胞胎
mtwins.original_desc: The game features two twins who are attempting to re-take control of their land, Alurea, after a monster unexpectedly attacks, destroying everything in its path. The people of Alurea have lived in peace for a thousand years and have forgotten how to fight, yet the land's only survivors, the twin sons of the king, must take up the challenge and return their kingdom to its former glory. The two twins, aged around 15 at the time the game takes place, venture forth in search of a legendary stone known as "Dragon Blue Eyes", which is rumored to be able to put everything back to rights.
mtwins.desc: 遊戲講述了兩個雙胞胎試圖重新控制他們的土地 Alurea，因為怪物突然發起攻擊，摧毀了其路徑上的一切。阿魯雷亞的人民已經和平地生活了一千年，已經忘記瞭如何戰鬥，然而這片土地上唯一的倖存者，國王的雙胞胎兒子，必須接受挑戰，讓他們的王國恢復昔日的輝煌。遊戲開始時，這對雙胞胎年齡在 15 歲左右，他們冒險前去尋找一顆名為“龍藍眼”的傳奇寶石，據說它可以讓一切恢復正常。

elvactr.name: 電梯動作返回
elvactr.original_desc:
Elevator Action Returns is a scrolling platform shoot-em-up for one or two players who each take on the role of a special task force operative and must foil a terrorist group that has planted nuclear bombs in various facilities. Players must also obtain the secret intelligence data scattered throughout each facility in order to disarm the bombs. 

The objective of the game is to enter all of the red-coloured doors in each stage, then proceed to the exit. If players miss one of the red doors, they will be unable to progress beyond a certain point. There are also blue-coloured doors and entering these will award the player a special item, these include health refills, special firearms, sub-weapons and bonus points.
elvactr.desc:
《電梯行動歸來》是一款滾動平台射擊遊戲，適合一到兩名玩家，每人扮演一名特殊特遣部隊特工，必須挫敗在各種設施中安放核彈的恐怖組織。玩家還必須獲取散佈在每個設施中的秘密情報數據，以便拆除炸彈。

遊戲的目標是進入每個階段的所有紅色門，然後前往出口。如果玩家錯過其中一扇紅色門，他們將無法超越某一點。還有藍色的門，進入這些門將獎勵玩家一個特殊的物品，其中包括生命補充品、特殊槍支、副武器和獎勵積分。

spnchout.name: 超級一拳出擊！ ！
spnchout.original_desc:
Super Punch-Out!! is an update of the superb boxing game, "Punch-Out!!", featuring five new larger-than-life opponents. The player once again assumes the role of a green-haired boxer who must fight his way up through five boxers to earn the title of 'Champ'. 

As with the original game, the player's boxer is viewed from behind with his torso rendered with wire-frame graphics (allowing the player's opponent to be easily seen). Punches, dodges and blocks must all be well-timed in order to defeat the opponent. 

Both the player and the opponent have stamina meters displayed at the top of the screen. These decrease when either boxer takes a punch and boxers will get knocked down if their stamina meter runs out completely. Faster knockdowns will cause the fallen boxer to recover less stamina upon getting up; the same happens if a boxer is knocked down by a knockout punch. 

Thanks to the refined roster of new and hugely distinctive enemy fighters, Super Punch-Out!! is considered to be an improvement over the first game.
spnchout.desc:
超級一拳出擊！ ！是精彩拳擊遊戲“Punch-Out!!”的更新版，其中包含五位傳奇般的新對手。玩家再次扮演一名綠髮拳擊手的角色，他必須從五名拳擊手中奮力拼搏，才能贏得“冠軍”的稱號。

與原版遊戲一樣，玩家的拳擊手是從後面觀察的，他的軀幹是用線框圖形渲染的（讓玩家的對手很容易被看到）。出拳、閃避、格擋都必須把握好時機，才能擊敗對手。

玩家和對手的體力計都顯示在屏幕頂部。當任何一個拳擊手受到拳擊時，這些都會減少，如果拳擊手的體力完全耗盡，他們就會被擊倒。更快的擊倒會導致倒下的拳擊手在站起來時恢復的體力更少；如果拳擊手被擊倒，也會發生同樣的情況。

得益於全新且極具特色的敵方戰鬥機的精緻名單，Super Punch-Out！被認為比第一場比賽有所進步。

ringdest.original_name: Ring of Destruction: Slam Masters II
ringdest.name: 毀滅之環：大滿貫大師 II
ringdest.original_desc:
Ring of Destruction: Slam Masters II, is the 1994 sequel to Saturday Night Slam Masters and the second game in the series. It was not ported to home consoles.

Unlike the first game, which played like a traditional wrestling game, Ring of Destruction's format was changed to play like a traditional one-on-one 2D fighting game (similar to Super Street Fighter II), with the action restricted to one plane. The game's configuration was changed to a five-button setup (two punch buttons, two kick buttons and a grappling button). The objective of each match is to deplete the opponent's life bar in two out of three rounds. It is no longer necessary for the player to pin their opponent to win a match, although all the other moves have been retained.
ringdest.desc:
《毀滅之環：大滿貫大師 II》是 1994 年《週六夜大滿貫大師》的續集，也是該系列的第二款遊戲。它沒有移植到家用遊戲機上。

與第一款遊戲的傳統摔跤遊戲不同，《毀滅之環》的玩法改為傳統的一對一 2D 格鬥遊戲（類似於《超級街頭霸王 II》），動作僅限於一架飛機。遊戲的配置更改為五按鈕設置（兩個拳擊按鈕、兩個踢球按鈕和一個擒抱按鈕）。每場比賽的目標是在三輪中的兩輪中耗盡對手的生命條。儘管所有其他動作都被保留，但玩家不再需要壓制對手來贏得比賽。

hangon.name: 不掛斷
hangon.original_desc:
Hang-On is a superb point-to-point sprite scaling racing game in which the player takes control of a superbike and must race over five twisting circuits, avoiding rival bikers and trying to reach the end of each stage before the time limit expires.

Hang-On's handling and superb graphics were unlike anything seen before in the arcades and, like many Yu Suzuki games that followed, revolutionised the racing genre.
hangon.desc:
Hang-On 是一款出色的點對點精靈縮放賽車遊戲，玩家控制一輛超級摩托車，必須在五個蜿蜒的賽道上比賽，避開競爭對手的摩托車手，並試圖在時間限製到期之前到達每個賽段的終點。

《Hang-On》的操控性和出色的圖形與以前在街機中看到的任何東西都不同，並且像鈴木裕隨後的許多遊戲一樣，徹底改變了賽車類型。

enduror.name: 耐力賽車手
enduror.original_desc:
Enduro Racer is an off-road racing game in which players ride a dirt bike across five extremely hilly and twisting courses. Each course is littered with logs, rocks, trees and rival racers that must be either jumped over or avoided.

Jumps can only be performed at specific locations on each track. These locations feature a dirt ramp that spreads across the width of the track. Players must have the bike in the 'wheelie' position when the ramp is struck, the bike will then be launched into the air. If the bike is not in a wheelie position when the ramps are struck, the bike will still clear the ramp, but will land front-wheel first and crash.

Enduro Racer is perhaps best remembered for its 'Wheelie' feature, which required the player to physically lift the cabinet's handlebars to raise the front wheel of the game's on-screen counterpart.
enduror.desc:
Enduro Racer 是一款越野賽車遊戲，玩家騎著越野車穿越五個極其丘陵和曲折的賽道。每個賽道都散佈著原木、岩石、樹木和競爭對手，必須跳過或避開。

跳躍只能在每個軌道上的特定位置進行。這些地點設有遍布賽道寬度的土坡道。當撞擊坡道時，玩家必須將自行車置於“前輪離地”位置，然後自行車將被發射到空中。如果在撞擊坡道時自行車未處於前輪離地位置，則自行車仍會越過坡道，但會前輪先著陸並發生碰撞。

《Enduro Racer》最為人所銘記的或許是它的“Wheelie”功能，該功能要求玩家親自抬起櫃子的把手，以抬起遊戲屏幕上對應項的前輪。

gradius.name: 復仇女神
gradius.original_desc:
Gradius / Nemesis is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player pilots a spacecraft known as the Vic Viper as they search through unexplored galaxies looking for a lost armada. These new galaxies are teaming with alien life set upon destroying the Viper. 

The game features a power-up system based on a selection meter at the bottom of the screen called a 'power meter', this allows players to 'buy' weapons and upgrades. To achieve this, players must destroy special individual enemies - usually red in colour - or enemy waves that then drop orange capsules. These capsules can be collected and used to upgrade the Viper's weapons. Each collected capsule advances the power meter by one step. Players can activate the highlighted item at any point, after which the power meter resets.
gradius.desc:
《Gradius / Nemesis》是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家駕駛一艘名為 Vic Viper 的宇宙飛船，在未探索的星系中搜尋失落的艦隊。這些新星係正在與外星生命聯手摧毀毒蛇號。

該遊戲具有基於屏幕底部稱為“功率計”的選擇儀表的加電系統，這允許玩家“購買”武器和升級。為了實現這一目標，玩家必須消滅特殊的單個敵人（通常是紅色）或敵人的波浪，然後掉落橙色膠囊。這些膠囊可以收集並用於升級毒蛇的武器。每個收集到的膠囊都會使功率計前進一級。玩家可以隨時激活突出顯示的項目，之後功率計將重置。

mpatrol.name: 月球巡邏隊
mpatrol.original_desc:
Moon Patrol is a horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player takes the role of a Luna City police officer assigned to Sector Nine, home of the toughest thugs in the galaxy. 

The player controls a moon buggy that travels over the moon's surface, trying to avoid or destroy any obstacles in its path, including craters, rocks and mines. UFOs attack the buggy from above by dropping bombs, some UFO bombs will create a new crater when they hit the ground, generating a new obstacle to avoid.

The buggy can jump to avoid craters, mines and rocks, it also has both front and vertically-mounted cannons that fire missiles simultaneously. The vertical cannon is to destroy UFOs while the front-cannon can take out obstacles that lie in the buggy's path.

Moon Patrol has five different stages spread over 26 check-points, each designated a letter of the English alphabet. The five checkpoints that denote a new stage are E, J, O, T and Z and each new stage sees a change in background graphics as well as an increase in difficulty. One example of this is the introduction of landmines in the third stage (stage 'J').

A status panel is displayed at the top of the screen that gives the player useful information. A progress bar showing the five major checkpoints and the player's current position is displayed at the bottom of the panel. Above the progress bar is an indicator of the current checkpoint, the time spent in the stage and three indicator lights: the top light indicates upcoming enemy aerial attacks, the middle one indicates an upcoming minefield and the bottom one indicates enemies approaching from behind.

At the end of each stage bonus points are awarded based on how quickly the stage was completed.
mpatrol.desc:
《月球巡邏》是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家在遊戲中扮演一名被派往第九區的盧納市警察，這裡是銀河系最兇惡暴徒的所在地。

玩家控制一輛月球車在月球表面行駛，試圖避開或摧毀路徑上的任何障礙物，包括隕石坑、岩石和地雷。不明飛行物通過投擲炸彈從上方攻擊越野車，一些不明飛行物炸彈在撞擊地面時會形成一個新的彈坑，從而產生新的障礙物來躲避。

越野車可以跳躍以避免彈坑、地雷和岩石，它還擁有前置和垂直安裝的大砲，可以同時發射導彈。垂直大砲用於摧毀不明飛行物，而前置大砲可以消滅越野車路徑上的障礙物。

月球巡邏隊有五個不同的階段，分佈在 26 個檢查點，每個檢查點都指定一個英文字母。表示新階段的五個檢查點是 E、J、O、T 和 Z，每個新階段的背景圖形都會發生變化，難度也會增加。其中一個例子是在第三階段（“J”階段）引入地雷。

屏幕頂部顯示狀態面板，為玩家提供有用的信息。面板底部顯示進度條，顯示五個主要檢查點和玩家當前位置。進度條上方是當前檢查點的指示器、在該階段所花費的時間和三個指示燈：頂部的燈表示即將到來的敵人空襲，中間的燈表示即將到來的雷區，底部的燈表示敵人從後面接近。

在每個階段結束時，根據階段完成的速度獎勵積分。

nbbatman.name: 忍者棒球蝙蝠俠
nbbatman.original_desc:
Ninja Baseball Batman is an abstract, horizontally-scrolling beat-em-up for in which up to four players control a team of robotic baseball-star ninjas who must fight their way through a variety of levels, defeating the game's many enemies. 

The object of the game is to recover a number of artifacts stolen from the Baseball Hall of Fame, a task prescribed to them by the Commissioner of Baseball. Each stage takes place in several parts of the United States, with a boss character appears at the end of each stage.

The game's enemies are themed entirely around the sport of Baseball; taking the form of Baseballs, Catcher's mitts, bats etc. The game also allows players to perform combos, throws and dash attacks against multiple enemies. When a player's health bar flashes red, more moves can be performed as long as the player does not restore or completely lose health. 

Health restoring food and drink items appear throughout the game, as well as throwable weapon pick-ups, including baseballs and shuriken. Occasionally players will find a pink heart, collecting this summons cheerleaders who either damage all on-screen enemies or drop a large amount of food.

The four characters of "Ninja Baseball Batman" and their traits are:

Captain Jose - Head of the team and technician. Well-balanced and a good choice for beginners. 
    
Twinbats Ryno - Very fast and wields two bats, but is the weakest of the four.
    
Beanball Roger - He is a powerful buster, but not as fast as others. 
    
Stick Straw - A long-reach hitter, making him the best choice for long-range moves.
nbbatman.desc:
《忍者棒球蝙蝠俠》是一款抽象的橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，最多四名玩家控制一隊機器人棒球明星忍者，他們必須在各個關卡中殺出一條血路，擊敗遊戲中的眾多敵人。

遊戲的目標是找回從棒球名人堂被盜的一些文物，這是棒球專員給他們規定的任務。每個階段都發生在美國的多個地區，每個階段的末尾都會出現一個 Boss 角色。

遊戲中的敵人完全以棒球運動為主題；採用棒球、捕手手套、球棒等形式。遊戲還允許玩家對多個敵人進行連擊、投擲和衝刺攻擊。當玩家的生命條閃爍紅色時，只要玩家沒有恢復或完全失去生命值，就可以執行更多的動作。

整個遊戲中都會出現恢復健康的食物和飲料，以及可投擲的武器拾取物，包括棒球和手裡劍。有時玩家會發現一顆粉紅色的心，收集它會召喚拉拉隊隊員，他們要么傷害屏幕上的所有敵人，要么掉落大量食物。

《忍者棒球蝙蝠俠》的四個角色及其特點是：

何塞隊長 - 團隊負責人和技術人員。平衡性好，對於初學者來說是一個不錯的選擇。

Twinbats Ryno - 速度非常快，揮舞著兩支球棒，但是四支球棒中最弱的。

Beanball Roger - 他是一個強大的剋星，但速度不如其他人。

Stick Straw - 一名長距離擊球手，使他成為遠距離移動的最佳選擇。

kodu.name: 龍王
kodu.original_desc:
The King of Dragons is a 1991 side-scrolling hack and slash video game by Capcom that allows players to choose from five characters (Elf, Wizard, Fighter, Cleric, and Dwarf) in order to travel through the kingdom of Malus and defeat the monsters that have taken over, as well as their leader, the red dragon Gildiss. Like Capcom's Knights of the Round, it features a level advancement system, allowing character attributes to be upgraded as players progress through the game. The setting is very similar to that of Dungeons & Dragons and other medieval fantasy worlds, with familiar monsters such as Orcs, Gnolls, Harpies, Wyverns, Cyclopes, and Minotaurs.

The game was ported to the Super NES and released in 1994. An emulated version of the game was released as part of Capcom Classics Collection Vol. 2 and Capcom Classics Collection: Reloaded.
kodu.desc:
《龍之王》是 Capcom 於 1991 年推出的一款橫向捲軸砍殺視頻遊戲，玩家可以從五個角色（精靈、巫師、戰士、牧師和矮人）中進行選擇，穿越馬魯斯王國並擊敗佔領的怪物及其首領紅龍吉爾迪斯。與 Capcom 的《圓桌騎士》一樣，它也具有等級提升系統，允許角色屬性隨著玩家在遊戲中的進展而升級。遊戲的設定與《龍與地下城》和其他中世紀奇幻世界非常相似，有獸人、豺狼人、鷹身女妖、雙足飛龍、獨眼巨人和牛頭怪等熟悉的怪物。

該遊戲被移植到 Super NES 並於 1994 年發布。遊戲的模擬版本作為 Capcom Classics Collection Vol 的一部分發布。2 和卡普空經典合集：重裝上陣。

tnzsb.name: 新西蘭的故事
tnzsb.original_desc:
Set in Antipodean country of the game's title, The New Zealand Story is an eight-way scrolling platform game featuring Tiki the Kiwi bird. Tiki and his friends have been kidnapped by the evil 'Wally', a large blue leopard seal who wants the birds for his next meal. Tiki quickly escapes and sets about rescuing his trapped friends.  

The game's stages are made up of platforms with a caged kiwi bird awaiting rescue at the end of each. Touching the cage releases the trapped Kiwi and an open window appears, indicating the completion of the stage.
tnzsb.desc:
《新西蘭故事》以遊戲名稱中的澳大利亞國家為背景，是一款以新西蘭鳥 Tiki 為主角的八向滾動平台遊戲。蒂基和他的朋友們被邪惡的“沃利”綁架了，這是一隻巨大的藍豹海豹，他想要這些鳥作為他的下一頓飯。蒂基很快逃脫並開始營救被困的朋友。

遊戲的舞台由多個平台組成，每個平台的盡頭都有一隻關在籠子裡的奇異鳥等待救援。觸摸籠子會釋放被困的獼猴桃，並出現一個打開的窗口，表明該階段已完成。

ssrdrubc.name: 日落騎士
ssrdrubc.original_desc:
Sunset Riders is a horizontally-scrolling platform shoot-em-up for up to four players set in America's Wild West. Four sharpshooter bounty hunters (Steve, Billy, Bob and Cormano) set out to claim the bounties for killing the most wanted outlaws in the West, before a final showdown against the infamous Sir Richard de la Rose.

The action takes place both on foot and on horseback, with play sometimes broken up with a wild west pursuit; such as having to run along the backs of a herd of fleeing Buffalo. Each level ends with players entering a one-on-one battle against one of the wanted men they have been pursuing. 

Power-ups and bonus items can be obtained by entering saloons or defeating certain sack-carrying bandits. The power-ups comes in the form of either a golden sheriff badge (that gives the player's weapon auto-fire) or a silver badge that gives the player a second gun (making it possible to shoot in two directions simultaneously). Both power-ups can be equipped at the same time. 

Other weapons that can be used by players include sticks of dynamite carried by female bandits that can be thrown back at the enemy before they explode and a mounted Gatling gun available only in the last stage. 

A bonus mini-game appears at the end of Stages 2 and 5 in which players must shoot at enemies from a first-person perspective before the timer runs out.

Sunset Riders features eight stages of play.
ssrdrubc.desc:
Sunset Riders 是一款水平滾動平台射擊遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家，背景設定在美國狂野西部。四名神槍手賞金獵人（史蒂夫、比利、鮑勃和科馬諾）出發去領取賞金，以殺死西部的頭號通緝犯，然後與臭名昭著的理查德·德拉羅斯爵士進行最後的對決。

比賽以步行和騎馬的方式進行，有時會間斷進行狂野的西部追逐。比如必須沿著一群逃跑的水牛背奔跑。每個關卡結束時，玩家都會與他們一直追捕的一名通緝犯進行一對一的戰鬥。

進入酒吧或擊敗某些背著麻袋的強盜可以獲得能量提升和獎勵物品。能量提升以金色警長徽章（讓玩家的武器自動射擊）或銀色徽章的形式出現，讓玩家擁有第二把槍（可以同時向兩個方向射擊）。兩個電源可以同時裝備。

玩家可以使用的其他武器包括女強盜攜帶的炸藥棒，可以在爆炸前將其扔回敵人身上，以及僅在最後階段可用的安裝加特林機槍。

第 2 階段和第 5 階段結束時會出現一個獎勵迷你游戲，玩家必須在計時器耗盡之前以第一人稱視角射擊敵人。

Sunset Riders 有八個比賽階段。

umk3.name: 終極真人快打3
umk3.original_desc: This game is the same as Mortal Kombat 3 except for the inclusion of new backgrounds and more charactors (22 playable in all). This version marks the return of Scorpion, Reptile, Kitana and Jade (not to mention the endurance rounds). Hidden characters include Human Smoke, Classic Sub-Zero, Mileena, Ermac, Rain and Noob Saibot (Rain and Noob Saibot are not selectable in any way).
umk3.desc: 該遊戲與《真人快打 3》相同，只是包含了新的背景和更多的角色（總共 22 個可玩角色）。這個版本標誌著蝎子、爬行動物、Kitana 和 Jade 的回歸（更不用說耐力回合了）。隱藏角色包括 Human Smoke、Classic Sub-Zero、Mileena、Ermac、Rain 和 Noob Saibot（Rain 和 Noob Saibot 無法以任何方式選擇）。

aliensu.name: 外星人
aliensu.original_desc: Aliens is an arcade game based loosely on the 1986 movie Aliens. You and a friend play female Marines and you must explore and destroy all aliens who have taken over a now abandoned space settlement LV426 Acheron. If you can find any survivors try to rescue them. As well as your normal gun there are other weapons that can be used to help you. A Caterpillar P-5000 can also be found and used. Aliens is mainly a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls as you move from left to right. Some parts of the game require you to look behind the hero firing into the screen as aliens come towards from the distance as well as moving in other directions like in a lift. You can also be driving into the screen trying to shoot aliens.
aliensu.desc: 《異形》是一款街機遊戲，大致改編自 1986 年的電影《異形》。你和一個朋友扮演女性海軍陸戰隊員，你必須探索並消滅所有佔領了現已廢棄的太空定居點 LV426 Acheron 的外星人。如果你能找到倖存者，請嘗試營救他們。除了普通的槍之外，還有其他武器可以幫助您。還可以找到並使用 Caterpillar P-5000。《外星人》主要是一款側視水平射擊遊戲，當你從左向右移動時，屏幕會滾動。遊戲的某些部分要求你看著英雄向屏幕射擊的背後，因為外星人從遠處而來，或者像在電梯裡一樣向其他方向移動。你也可以開車進入屏幕試圖射殺外星人。

avspu.name: 異形大戰鐵血戰士
avspu.original_desc:
San Drad, California, has been overrun by the Aliens, and the cybernetically-enhanced Major Dutch Schaefer and Lieutenant Linn Kurosawa have been abandoned by their superiors and are cornered by a swarm of the Alien drones. Before they can be killed, a pair of the Predators appear and destroy the Aliens. The Predators offer an alliance with the two humans in order to stop the Alien infestation.

The players take control of up to three of four characters: Dutch, Linn, a Predator hunter, and a Predator warrior, and battle the Aliens through several environments. In the process, the characters discover that the Alien presence on Earth is the result of an experiment headed by a renegade General Bush of the U.S. Colonial Marines in conjunction with the Weyland-Yutani corporation. They destroy the Alien hive by crashing a military ship into San Drad, causing a huge explosion. The Predator warrior then gives his wrist blades to Dutch and Linn in recognition of their skills as warriors, before the Predators depart back into space.
